Obtenha o fluido corporal dos monstros
O Herbalista Ash quer impedir que a grama cresça. Para isso obtenha o fluído do monstro
Polvilhe o fluído do monstro pela grama
Derramando o fluído do monstro na grama impedirá que ela volte a crescer. Desta forma, polvilhe o fluído de monstro na grama
Você terminou de polvilhar todo o fluído! Fale com o Herbalista Ash
Druid Leja se machucou enquanto perseguia os furões que roubavam a comida. Para recuperar a saúde, encontre a erva apropriada no lugar que ela lhe contou
Traga de volta os alimentos roubados pelos furões
Recupere os alimentos roubados pelos furões e devolva-os às pessoas da cidade. Você só podera obter os Alimentos Roubados usando Paralysis Power em furão enquanto seu HP estiver 50% ou abaixo disso
Recupere %s dos furões

Você encontrou a garota misteriosa mais uma vez no meio do caminho enquanto voltava para devolver a comida roubada aos habitantes da cidade. A garota misteriosa saiu correndo depois de perceber que o povo da cidade estava se aproximando. Devolva a comida recuperada ao ancião da cidade.
Destrua os totens demoníacos controlando os furões
Ah, ancião fala que os furões ficaram ferozes após a invasão dos demônios. Ele acredita que os totens demoníacos são os culpados e pede que você os destrua.
Reúna o 'Gigantic Fruit Juice' dos furões

Uma das maiores preocupações dos cidadãos é a falta de água potável, uma vez que não é só a água do rio, mas também os frutos das arvores, plantas, nas proximidades são envenenados. Os furões, por outro lado, parecem saber uma maneira de purificar o suco das frutas gigantes e beber. As pessoas da cidade pedem para você trazer o suco de frutas extraído e purificado dos furões.
Há muitas frutas gigantescas dos furões. Traga para o Residente da Aldeia.
Roube %s dos furões
Enquanto você estava fora, 'pegando' o suco de frutas gigantescas, os furões invadiram a cidade novamente e roubaram os alimentos da cidade. Fale com os cidadões para saber sobre o ocorrido.

Os cidadãos dizem que, se você contaminar os alimentos com a água contaminada, os furões não roubarão mais a comida da cidade. Mas esta proeza só deve ser feito com os alimentos que recentemente foram saqueados. Traga a água vermelha do poço antigo para o povo da cidade.
Isso! A quantidade de água vermelha que você tem é suficiente para contaminar a comida. O povo da cidade lhe dirá onde estão os alimentos. Fale com os cidadões.

O povo da cidade informaram que os furões escondem os alimentos roubados dentro de cestas de frutas que estão espalhada por alguns lugares. Só que... alguns dos alimentos roubados não são frescos. Inspecione cada um com cuidado para encontrar apenas os novos e despeje um pouco da água vermelha sobre ele.

O neto do ancião deu uma olhada nos furões para ver se eles voltaram ao normal depois que os totens demoníacos foram destruídos, mas a expressão em seu rosto parece trazer péssimas noticias. Fale com o neto do ancião.

O neto do ancião explica que, embora os totens demoníacos tenham sumido, os furões continuam daquele jeito, ferozes. Consulte o 'Dievdirbys Widas' para saber o jeito de reverter esta situação, e trazer os furões de volta ao normal.

Dievdirbys Widas lhe diz que trata-se de uma escultura da paz, que ele descobriu em seus longos anos de pesquisa, poderia fazer com que isso acontecesse. Monte a escultura da paz para que os furões voltem ao normal e sejam mansos novamente.
A escultura da paz foi montada, mas isso apenas irritou os furões tornando eles mais violentos ainda. Conte ao Widas sobre o ocorrido.

Druid Leja estava a caminho para analisar a estátua gigante da Deusa, mas os furões controlados por demônios amarraram seus pés deixando-a de ponta-cabeça. E quando menos se esperava, a garota misteriosa aparece e os furões vão atrás dela.
Derrote os furões e encontre algum rastro da garota misteriosa.
Druid Leja aponta a direção que a garota foi. Ela diz que os furões estão indo atrás dela, então dê um fim nos que aparecerem no caminho enquanto vai atrás da garota.
Derrote os furões
Enquanto os furões estão sendo derrotados, você tem aquela sensação estranha novamente. Siga essa sensação, ela vai levar você até a garota.

Druid Leja diz que os furões estavam carregando uma bolsa esquisita e arrastando para algum lugar. Ela informa onde é o esconderijo do furão. Leja diz que é muito perigoso ir sozinho, então ela fará um perfume que fará os furões ficarem fracos. Mas primeiro, pegue-lhe um pouco de Drowsy Herb.
Druid Leja, juntamente com o Drowsy Scent(perfume) que ela prometeu, lhe dirá também os possíveis locais onde os furões poderiam ter levado a garota. Fale com o Leja.
Inspecione o esconderijo dos furões depois de aplicar o drowsy scent (perfume).

Você deve salvar a garota enquanto os furões estão sonolentos com o cheiro. Tenha em mente que o cheiro requer uma fogueira para poder se espalhar no local, e não se esqueça que a sua duração não é tão longa.
Salve a garota enquanto os furões estão sonolentos.
A tarefa da Deusa
No momento em que você liberta a garota, ela corre para algum lugar. Pasmem. Siga os rastros que ela deixou para trás e vá atrás dela.
Fale com a garota misteriosa
Você finalmente encontrou a garota em pé de frente com a Estátua da Deusa gigante. Fale com a garota.
A garota misteriosa está vagamente olhando para uma plantinha misteriosa. Fale com ela.
Desenterre sob as Plantinhsa
A garota misteriosa fala, com receio, que há algo enterrado sob a plantinha. Examine a plantinha e o local.
Verifique o Orbe da Deusa
Encontre o Orbe da Deusa sob a misteriosa Plantinha e verifique-o.
Fale com o Druid Benes
Druid Benes estuda os furões e o que os tornou ferozes. Pergunte se existe alguma maneira de torna-los mansos.
Anote os comportamentos dos furões

Druid Benes diz que se você se transformar em um furão, você pode se comunicar com os furões. No entanto, os furões conhecem o cheiro de Benes, então eles fogem dele mesmo que ele esteja na forma de furão. Então Benes escreverá para você o Ferret Transformation Scroll e o que você precisa fazer é anotar os comportamentos dos furões nele.
Entregue o Pergaminho ao Druid Benes
Você anotou com sucesso os comportamentos dos furões. Entregue para o Druid Benes.
Você anotou os comportamentos dos furões em um pergaminho vazio. Fale com Benes.
Compreendendo os furões
O Ferret Transformation Scroll que o Druid Benes deu, fará com que você tenha a habilidade de se transformar em um furão. Pergunte aos furões e descubra por que eles estão atacando as pessoas.
O motivo dos furões atacar as pessoas era com a intenção de expulsa-los. Volte ao Druid Benes e relate suas descobertas.
Realidade inacreditável
Você se transformou em um furão e conversou com eles como se fosse um furão. Relate o verdadeiro motivo ao Druid Benes.
Coloque o bloco de madeira modificado e observe as reações dos furões

Druid Benes diz que é muito difícil determinar se os furões estão realmente pensando nisso ou se é meramente devido ao controle mental do demônio. Druid Benes pede que você monte um bloco de madeira modificado em forma de um homem ferido perto dos furões. Se o que eles dizem é realmente verdade, eles não atacarão um homem ferido.
Os furões atacaram o bloco de madeira em forma de um homem da cidade ferido. Volte ao Druid Benes.
Realidade inacreditável
Os furões atacaram o bloco de madeira em forma de um homem da cidade ferido. Volte ao Druid Benes.
Use o perfume terrível para expulsar os furões
Druid Benes acredita que, considerando que eles estão atacando até mesmo os feridos, eles devem estar sob o controle do demônio.
Volte para o Druid Benes
Use o perfume terrível para expulsar os furões. Volte para o Druid Benes
Procure Deusa Lada
A Deusa Laima pede para você encontrar a aprisionada Deusa Lada para então acabar com o plano do demônio.
Fale com a Deusa Lada
Enquanto lutava contra o Lorde Demônio Zaura, a força que o impedia de se aproximar da Deusa Lada desapareceu. Fale com a Deusa Lada.
Enquanto lutava contra o Lorde Demônio Zaura, a força que o impedia de se aproximar da Deusa Lada desapareceu. Fale com a Deusa Lada.
Você deve encontrar uma maneira de libertar a Deusa Lada. Fale com ela.
Destrua o objeto que lhe impede
Você deve destruir o objeto que esta mantendo a Deusa Lada como refém.
Deusa sussura bem baixinho: O objeto que está mantendo-me presa esta restringindo meu poder e me mantendo prisioneira. O poder do orbe é suficiente para destruir esse objeto.
Todos os objetos de restrição e aprisionamento são destruídos. Fale com a Deusa Lada.

O Dispositivo-Objeto de Absorção de Vitalidade é feito para absorver a vitalidade da Deusa Lada e enviá-la para o Kruvina Suppressor. Junte o sangue do demônio e despeje-o sobre a máquina para desativá-lo.

Deusa sussura baixinho: O Dispositivo de Absorção de Vitalidade está drenando minha força vital para o círculo mágico. {nl}O dispositivo é projetado para absorver apenas a vitalidade pura de uma deusa, qualquer outra forma de força vital irá parar o dispositivo. Especialmente, sangue de demônios imundos teria um consideravel efeito sobre isso.
Você juntou bastante sangue de demônio. Despeje sobre o dispositivo de absorção de vitalidade.
Derrote os demônios para coletar % s
Destrua o Kruvina Suppressor
O Suppressor Kruvina usa uma parte da vitalidade da Deusa Lada para injetar em si e fazer dele um Deus. O orbe da Deusa Laima pode fazer com que o Supressor Kruvina sofra uma sobrecarga de feitiço.

Deusa sussura baixinho: O Suppressor Kruvina usa uma parte da vitalidade da Deusa Lada para injetar em si e fazer dele um Deus. O orbe da Deusa Laima pode fazer com que o Supressor Kruvina sofra uma sobrecarga de feitiço.
Destrua todas as três máquinas seguindo as instruções da Deusa Lada. E volte a falar com a Deusa Lada.
Você destruiu os Geradores/Maquinas de Kruvina conforme a Deusa Lada lhe instruiu. Fale com a Deusa Lada.
Destrua a Kruvina Incompleta
A Deusa Lada diz que, embora o Gerador de Kruvina seja destruído, ainda existe uma Kruvina incompleta. É extremamente perigoso mesmo estando em sua forma imperfeita, então deve ser destruído logo.
O Observador interveio abruptamente e tomou a Kruvina. No entanto, você já derrotou o Lorde Demônio Zaura. Volte para a Deusa Lada.
Derrote o Lorde Demônio Zaura
O Observador levou a Kruvina Incompleto para longe antes que você pudesse fazer algo sobre isso. Relate isso à Deusa Lada.
Olhe atentamente para o orbe da Deusa

A Deusa Laima disse à outra, antes de partir, que se um viajante vier com o orbe de Laima, guie-o para a estátua gigante. Ela pediu então para você ir para até mão da estátua gigante com o orbe da deusa Lada que teve seu poder enfraquecido.

Nas mãos da gigante Estátua da Deusa, você percebe que a Deusa Demoníaca Giltine está mantendo a Deusa Laima como refém. A Deusa Laima deu a você uma missão de herói. Relate essa descoberta imediatamente à Deusa Lada.
Preparação para Reconstrução do Templo
Fale com o Padre da Aldeia
O Padre da Aldeia parece querer lhe pedir um favor. Fale com o Padre da Aldeia.
Derrote os demônios

O Padre da Vila está tentando reconstruir o templo de Laima na esperança de que um dia ela retorne, e que quando esse dia chegar esteja tudo pronto. Mas limpar os demônios restantes e purificar a terra seria o primeiro passo. O Padre da Aldeia pediu vossa ajuda nesta arriscada missão de expulsar os demônios.
Muito bem! Você derrotou os demônios restantes. Informe ao Padre da Aldeia.
Os demônios restantes
Você derrotou os demônios restantes conforme o padre da aldeia lhe pediu. Fale com o Padre da Aldeia.
Encontre o mestre em Orsha que sabe melhor sobre o assunto de purificar a terra e como fazer isto.
O padre da aldeia está procurando uma maneira de purificar a terra corrompida.
Fale com o Padre da Aldeia
O mestre?? Você o conheceu em Orsha você tem 'Purification Scroll' (item). Volte para o Padre da Aldeia.
Obtenha % s do Mestre em Orsha
Voce adquiriu 'Purification Scroll' do mestre em Orsha. Fale com o Padre da Aldeia.
Purifique a Evil Aura

Enquanto você estava fora adquirindo o pergaminho, o padre localizou vários totens demoníacos plantados em toda a área. O padre suspeita até que os totens sejam a causa da corrupção. O padre pediu-lhe para destruir os totens e purificar a terra.
Volte para o Padre da Aldeia
Você destruiu os totens demoníacos e purificou a terra como o padre pediu para você. Volte para o Padre da Aldeia.
O oficial da aldeia tem um favor para lhe pedir. Fale com o oficial.
Florescimento de uma Earth Flower

A terra rica em força vital foi encontrada durante uma busca por um local de construção do templo. O oficial pede que você plante uma Semente de Earth Flower. E ele, o oficial, disse que a Earth Flower vai absorvendo a força vital fértil ai ajudará a Deusa Lada a se recuperar muito mais rápido.
Fale com a Deusa Lada
Earth Flower finalmente floresce! Fale com a Deusa Lada.
A pedrita de luz, eu também vi!{nl}Os Demonios estão colecionando isso por todo lugar{nl}
As Esculturas de Coruja estão enviando-as para algum lugar ... {nl}Talvez, você possa encontrar a trilha da Escultura de Coruja que acabou de ver, pode?
Se fosse qualquer outra pessoa, eu teria parado você, mas sendo você de nada adiantara muito.{nl}Não tenho certeza se é bravura ou imprudência...{nl}
Pelas deusas! Eu preciso descansar um pouco.{nl}Estou exausto, sinto minhas forças sumindo de mim.{nl}Se eu ficar mais um minuto com voce, a minha vida nunca mais será tranquila. Deuses me livre!
Eu não sei sobre a real identidade das pedritas de luz.{nl}Mas eu sei que elas não tem a mesma energia que os deomônios que as colecionam tem.
Chefe da coruja
Obrigadissimo! Obrigado mesmo!{nl}Só de saber da influencia que esses demônios tem....{nl}Chego arrepiar só de pensar o que poderia ter acontecido com as pobres almas.
As pedritas de luz que você acabou de ver é uma alma humana.{nl} Almas muito puras. Elas foram mortas pelos demônios invasores.{nl}

As Esculturas de Coruja costumavam levar essas almas para o caminho certo.{nl}Mas os demônios corromperam a floresta e as controlaram.{nl}No momento, os meus companheiros são controlados pelos demônios{nl}eles lideram aquelas pobres almas como bem entendem...{nl}
Eu sei que não mereço isso, mas ...{nl}Eu não quero ver as almas sendo perdidas.{nl}Por favor, destrua a Torre de Controle da Mente que está controlando meus companheiros.
Oh, graças as deusas, ela me escutou! Ela te enviou!{nl}
Se a Torre de Controle da Mente for destruída, o impacto também poderá afetar negativamente meus companheiros{nl}Então, antes de destruir a torre, junte a energia da floresta{nl}
Restaure o Altar de Karolis e a energia da floresta também será restaurada.{nl}Vou lhe dar a Vontade da Coruja Guia.{nl}Ela vai direcioná-lo para as ruínas do Altar Karolis Altar.
O Altar Karolis costumava coletar a energia da floresta. {nl}Desde que ela foi destruída, a energia da floresta ficou muito fraca.{nl}
O Altar da Floresta ainda é forte e funcional, mas precisamos que a Luz de Karolis espalhe o poder por toda a floresta. A luz enfraquecida é a causa da energia não se espalhar muito. {Nl}
Os companheiros retornarão às suas mentes em paz, {nl} se o Altar de Karolis e o da floresta forem restaurados.{nl}Nós, Esculturas da Coruja, iremos viver nas proximidades da Floresta
Eu estive esperando por você.{nl}Eu sabia que você conseguiu desde que a energia da floresta foi aumentada.

Eu tive minhas esperanças, mas parece que o Altar Karolis não esta sendo o suficiente{nl}para restaurar totalmente a energia da floresta. A energia do altar da floresta também precisa ser espalhada.{nl}

O altar da floresta está atravessando uma lagoa.{nl}Se você chegar lá, a Luz de Karolis poderá espalhar a energia do altar para toda a floresta. {nl}A luz quase extinta precisa ser reacendida e{nl}então a energia se espalhará para todos os cantos da floresta.

Há quatro lugares onde a Luz de Karolis pode se fazer presente.{nl}Porem, cada um dura pouco tempo, se você conseguir iluminar todos os quatro, essas luzes podem sustentar uma a outra. {nl}Seja rápido e ágil ao acender todos os quatro.
Nos velhos tempos, havia vários altares, agora só existe um.{nl}Os demônios de fato arruinaram a nossa floresta.

A energia do altar é espalhada com sucesso.{nl}Agora todas as outras corujas não estão mais sob controle.{nl}A única coisa que resta é destruir a Torre de Controle da Mente e a segurança desta área estara garantida.

A Torre de Controle da Mente está carregada de energia maligna. Se você relar nele {nl}até poderá correr risco. Os meus camaradas da Escultura de Coruja recuperaram os seus sentidos, {nl}embora, minuto a minuto, emprestemos a nossa força. Ainda não terminamos, mas, estamos juntos, {nl}e seremos o suficiente para lutar contra a energia maligna da Torre de Controle da Mente.
Fale com as Esculturas de Coruja, que você conheceu no caminho aqui. {nl}Eles querem agradecer quem os salvou. {nl}E emprestarão o poder deles a voce.
Por favor, volte para mim depois de reunir o poder de todas as Esculturas de Coruja. {nl}Vou combinar seu poder em um só.
Espero que nenhum dos meus companheiros tenha dito alguma coisa que tenha te chateado ou algo assim. {nl}Eles são muito gratos pelo que você fez por nós.{nl}
Agora, eu adicionei meu poder junto aos dos outros. Eu os transformarei em um.
Eu estava com receio, mas felizmente, quando vi o poder combinado, confirmei que é mais forte do que eu esperava. {nl}Isso ajudará você a destruir a Torre de Controle da Mente.
Sinto muito não podermos retribuir tanto {nl}pela tremenda ajuda que você nos deu. {nl}Mas sei que a deusa ira lhe retribuir por isso. {nl}De alguma forma, eu sei que vai.
Há uma Escultura de Coruja meio longe daqui. Ainda não esta correspondendo corretamente. {nl}Estou um pouco preocupado ... {nl}Mas temos assuntos mais importantes para ver primeiro.
Você destruiu a Torre de Controle da Mente também?!?!? {nl}Fi-finalmente, a paz retornará a Karolis Springs depois de todo esse trabalho.
Mardas veio falar com você. {nl}Ele testemunhou muitas atrocidades demoníacas.
Parece que o Letas Stream está sob o reino dos demônios. {nl}Você poderia nos emprestar sua força mais um pouco? {nl}Você é nossa única esperança.
Poderíamos chegar a uma solução se Mardas e eu combinarmos o que sabemos e vimos. {nl}Aí então, encontraremos o caminho para afastar os demônios. {nl}

Em primeiro lugar, precisamos de Romuva of Suppression que é infundida com o poder divino da floresta. {nl}O guia Owl Sculpture em Letas Stream, de certo modo, será capaz de torná-lo um. {nl}Mas ela não esta correspondendo, isso significa que ainda está sob o controle do demônio.{nl}
Por favor, encontre o Guia Owl Sculpture no Letas Stream. {nl}Salve-o e diga que eu te enviei e você precisa do Romuva of Suppression.
Ao norte de Karolis Springs, você encontrará o ponto alto da energia da floresta. {nl}Lá você encontrará a energia de Karolis Springs.{nl}

Ao Aproximar-se da energia de Karolist Springs, eles se aproximarão de você. {nl}Quando houver o suficiente, eles criarão a essência cristalizada de Karolis Springs. {nl}Leve-o para o Guia Owl Sculpture.
Oh céus! o horror dos horrores, Mardas testemunhou. {nl}Não devemos deixar que isso continue assim{nl}
{nl} Poxa aquelas pobres almas ... São incontaveis o numero de almas que demos aos demônios. {nl}Isso realmente parte o meu coração.
Guia Owl Sculpture
Ugh ... O que aconteceu ... Quem é você? {nl}Você me salvou??!
A Escultura do Chefe Coruja mandou você? {nl}A Romuva of Suppression ... a crise deve ser esmagadoramente grande, se isso for necessário. {nl}

A Romuva of Suppression não é algo que se deva fazer tranquilamente, mas a situação desesperadora exige uma medida desesperada. {nl}Para o bem de todos, eu vou fazer um a você. Para fazer um, o Letas' Sacred Branch é necessário. {nl}É um ramo da Árvore Sagrada de Letas. Mas para isso, é necessario uma parte da energia da floresta...
Ah, é isso a sua esquerda? {nl}Tudo bem. Vá para o norte, em lugar vazio de Letas Stream, polvilhe a essência cristalizada. {nl}
A árvore sagrada não é fácil de se encontrar tão rapido. {nl}Continue polvilhando a essência até que a árvore se mostre.

A Árvore Sagrada de Letas é algo como uma vontade manifestada da floresta. {nl}Antes da invasão do demônio, a árvore podia ser facilmente vista, mas agora, está completamente desaparecida. {nl}Mas acredito que ela se mostrará novamente quando sentir a energia da da floresta.
Você encontrou a Árvore Sagrada de Letas?{nl}
Eu temia que a árvore sagrada não aparecesse mesmo na presença da energia. {nl}Estou feliz por estar errado. Eu suspeito que... De certa forma... você seja especial meu nobre.
Os demônios enfraqueceram o Ramo Sagrado de Letas. {nl}Ele precisa ser revigorado.{nl}
Purifique a energia do mal que os monstros possuem e alimente-a com o ramo. {nl}Use o ramo nos monstros para seguir o procedimento acima mencionado.
Monstros fracos não têm chance contra o ramo sagrado {nl}O poder sagrado arde através da escuridão.
É altamente confiável para você, pois foi a escultura da coruja chefe que o enviou.
A energia armazenada no ramo é suficiente?{nl}
Agora, usarei a Romuva Of Suppression

Romuva of Suppression está pronto, mas ... Eu temo que isso não será suficiente. {nl}Eu não sei o que a Escultura Chefe da Coruja é, na verdade. {nl}Eu sou muito fraco. Então, não posso ajudá-lo com isso.
Uma pessoa chamada Mardas poderia saber a solução?! {nl}O que você está esperando então? Vá falar com ele. {nl}Talvez ele já esteja aqui.

Somos gratos por Mardas nos ajudar, mas o que aconteceu com ele é uma verdadeira tragédia. {nl}Nós, as Esculturas de Coruja, de fato cumprimos o plano do demônio. Com certeza sentimos grande culpa por ter parte com isso.
Você chegou na hora! {nl}Então, você conseguiu Romuva of Suppression?

Ao conversar com a Escultura do Coruja Chefe, tive a sensação de que poderíamos resolver isso. {nl}Os demônios estão usando a energia maligna para corromper o Letas Stream. {nl}E extraindo essa energia para prender almas. {nl}
A Soul Starvation deve ser destruída, mas a energia maligna é muito densa e é protegida pelo círculo mágico. {nl}Primeiro, elimine a energia maligna.

A energia maligna está sendo gerada a partir do centro da floresta. Você pode chegar até ele seguindo o caminho certo. {nl}Monte a Romuva de Suppression perto dele, isto irá suprimir a santissima energia.
Parte o meu coração de pensar sobre as pessoas que poderiam estar em suas casas, mas estou fraco no momento. Tudo o que posso fazer agora é ajudá-lo. Aí então me sentirei reconfortado.
Voce quer dizer que de algum modo a energia do mal ainda esta vindo??{nl}
A corrupção maligna é muito mais grave do que eu pensava. {nl}Precisamos nos apressar e eliminar a fumaça negra que esta extraindo a energia da floresta.

Sem a fumaça preta as estruturas demoníacas serão enfraquecidas. {nl}No entanto, pelo que tenho visto. Existem Eyes of Surveillance (Olhos de vigilância) instalados. Isso pode dificultar a abordagem. {nl}

Pode ser quase impossível, mas você precisa se infiltrar no local, evitando {nl}a esfera de vigilância em torno dos olhos de vigilância. {nl}No fim do caminho - que esta cheio de olhos de vigilância- existem círculos mágicos. {nl}Destrua os círculos mágicos para destruir os Olhos de Vigilância.
Cuide dos olhos de vigilância. Então, use a Romuva de Suppression para eliminar a Fumaça Negra. {nl}É muito perigoso, então, por favor, tome cuidado.
A Escultura de Chefe Coruja com certeza sabia muito. Deve ter passado toda a sua vida nesta floresta, mas como ela obteve um conhecimento tão profundo e amplo?
Bom trabalho. {nl}Você está ferido?
Agora, a Soul Starvation é destrutível. {nl}Deve haver círculos mágicos ao redor, mas eles podem ser facilmente desativados. Então Mãos a obra.{nl}
Existe uma ordem específica que voce deve seguir para desativar os círculos mágicos. {nl}Mesmo se você falhar, não tenha medo. Você pode tentar novamente até encontrar a ordem.
Os demônios podem estar suspeitando. Afinal, a energia maligna e a Fumaça Negra desapareceram. {nl}Você precisa andar logo!
Se as almas forem libertadas, talvez, essa tristeza e raiva que eu sinto possam ir embora. {nl}Não posso ter tanta certeza sobre isso no momento.
É assim mesmo. Todas as almas são libertadas. {nl}A Escultura de Coruja Chefe diz que essas almas seriam novamente levadas pelo bem da coruja. {nl}
Seria melhor dar a Romuva of Suppression para o Guia Owl Sculpture. {nl}Ajudará outras esculturas de coruja a recuperarem os seus poderes. {nl}Entregarei a notícia a Escultura de Coruja chefe.
É seguro dizer que o Letas Stream está livre da ameaça dos demônios. {nl}Não sei nem como te agradecer, grande guerreiro.{nl}
Não acredito que não seja por acaso que você tenha vindo até nós. {nl}Sinto a vontade divina da deusa guiando você até aqui. {nl}Eu oro para que ela o guie sempre.
A gratidão enche meu coração. {nl}Peço desculpas pela minha grosseria inicial. Eu estava muito confuso sobre tudo.
Jurus
Esta carta é ...{nl}
escrito por Eras. {nl}Ele está morto ... esta é a primeira notícia que ouvi sobre ele em anos. Isso é muito triste e horrivel.{nl}
Obrigado por me entregar esta carta. {nl}Pelo menos agora sei o que aconteceu com ele.

Os meus companheiros com quem compartilhamos essa mesma vontade provavelmente estão sendo perseguidos assim como eu. {nl}Nós marcamos o ponto de encontro em Orsha, mas sinto em meu coração uma preocupção ...

Alina ... também? {nl}Como Ignas poderia fazer algo assim! Ele estava fora de si?{nl}
Alina está morta já não esta entre nós, mas ela estara sempre em meu coração. Vou continuar o que Lydia Schaffen começou. {nl}Eu vou sobreviver e chegar a Orsha!{nl}

Quando eu te conheci, você era fraco e distraído, mas agora, olhe para você! {nl}Bom, eu vou te ensinar a habilidade final dos bárbaros. {nl}Vou ser franco, eu tenho minhas dúvidas se voce dara conta de aprender esta habilidade..

Falar é fácil. O que mais importa é você conseguir fazer isso! {nl}Este líquido medicinal não é realmente medicinal. Pelo contrário, é um veneno. De volta para casa, nós a bebemos como parte do treinamento. {nl}Beba e mate os monstros no Apsimesti Crossroads enquanto seu corpo ainda estara sob a influência deste liquido.
Não vai ser fácil, isso eu te digo! Você já é forte, então eu não irei menosprezar você se você não quiser passar por esse rigoroso treinamento.
Eu mesmo, não consigo me igualar sua paixão em buscar mais força. {nl}Assim seja. Eu lhe ensinarei todas as habilidades que um bárbaro pode ter.
Amarelando
Perguntando sobre o cordão de luz
Eu vou atrás
Parece perigoso, hein?! Estou fora!
O cordão de luz foi até a colina e desapareceu! {nl}Continue seguindo-o, guiando o seu caminho.
Não esquenta! Eu vou fazer isso.
Você tem mãos, certo? Por que você mesmo não faz isso?
Você encontrou o cristal do Altar de Karolis {nl}Agora, é hora de encontrar os fragmentos do Altar de Karolis.

Eu vou espalhar a energia do altar
Empresta-me o teu poder

Vou explodi-lo

Eu estou fora para salvar o Guia Owl Sculpture
Mardas fará o resto

Mostre o cristal formado pela energia de Karolis Springs

Pegue o galho e vá
Você tem certeza absoluta?
Fale sobre Mardas
Também me preocupa
Onde eu poderia encontrar essa energia maligna?

Pode confiar

Pegando a carta
Você encontrou uma carta deixada por alguém {nl}Procure pelo destinatário
Falando sobre a carta
Altar Letas
A energia do Altar Letas é suprimida pela força {nl}maliciosa dos monstros próximos {nl}Purifique-a de seus pecados!
A Luta contra o extremo [Barbarian Advancement]
As habilidades que eu uso agora são boas o suficiente
Derrote % s que estão depois da Escultura de Coruja
Use o Guia Coruja para encontrar % s
Recupere % s dos monstros usando o Guia Coruja
Você restaurou com sucesso o Altar de Karolis. Informe a Escultura do Coruja Chefe.
Para espalhar a energia do Santuário de Karolis, todas as quatro luzes de Karolis devem ser acesas. Se houver menos de 4 luzes acesas as demais serão apagadas rapidamente.
A energia do Santuário de Karolis está se espalhando. Reporte-se para o Owl Chief Sculpture.
A Escultura do Coruja Chefe pediu-lhe para recolher energia o suficiente de Karolis Springs e entregá-lo ao Guia Own Sculpture. Encontre o Guia Owl Sculpture.
Árvore Sagrada da Floresta
O guia Owl Sculpture recuperou sua consciência. Conte sobre o que a Escultura de Coruja Chefe lhe disse.
Encontre o ramo sagrado de Letas
O Guia Owl Sculpture diz que para combater os demônios é necessário o Ramo Sagrado de Letas. Use a Essência Cristalizada de Karolis Springs para encontrar a Árvore Sagrada de Letas e obter seu ramo.
Reporte ao Guia Owl Sculpture
Consiga o ramo sagrado de Letas. E volte para o Guia Owl Sculpture.
Pergunte ao Guia Owl Sculpture o que o ramo pode fazer.
Absorva a energia purificada
O guia Owl Sculpture diz que o ramo pode purificar os monstros e sua energia. Absorva a energia purificada e colete-a.
O ramo sagrado de Letas purificou e absorveu energia suficiente. Volte para o Guia Owl Sculpture.
A Romuva Suppression está completa, mas o Guia Owl Sculpture parece não saber se realmente está. Fale com o Guide Owl Sculpture.
Fale com o Mardas
O Guia Owl Sculpture pede para você falar com Mardas.
Mardas veio com uma solução depois de uma longa discussão com a Escultura do Coruja Chefe. Ouça o que Mardas tem a dizer.
Elimine a energia maligna que está corrompendo a floresta
Mardas afirma que a energia maligna que corrompe a floresta precisa ser eliminada primeiro. Coloque a Romuva Suppression em torno dela para poder parar a energia do mal.
Reporte a Mardas
Você eliminou toda a energia do mal. Relate isso de volta a Mardas.
Toda a energia do mal se foi. Fale com Mardas sobre o que fazer a seguir.
Evite a vigilância e se infiltre.

Mardas explica que, como a fumaça negra está drenando a energia da floresta. Você deve evitar ser detectado pelos olhos de vigilância. Depois de se infiltrar no local, desative o círculo mágico que controla os olhos.
Remova a fumaça negra
Remova a fumaça negra que está drenando a energia da floresta.
Você removeu a fumaça negra. Reporte ao Mardas.
Soul Starvation
Chegou a hora de pôr fim ao esquema do demônio. Fale com Mardas na missão final.
Desative o Círculo Mágico de Proteção

Mardas enfatiza que todos os círculos mágicos de proteção devem ser desabilitados para libertar as almas da inanição da alma. Existe uma certa ordem na qual se deve desabilitar os cinco círculos mágicos. Se você falhar, você deve começar do começo. Experimente e encontre a ordem correta.
Destrua a Soul Starvation
Todos os círculos mágicos que protegem a Soul Starvation estão desativados. Destrua a Soul Starvation com a Romuva of Suppression.
Os demônios alertados foram derrotados. Agora, use a Romuva of Suppression para destruir a Soul Starvation.
Derrote % s
A Soul Starvation esta destruída. Volte ao Mardas.
Mardas inspecionou cuidadosamente a situação e disse que vai denunciá-la ao coruja chefe.
Olhe dentro do Baú Trancado.
Ai está, um misterioso baú. Abra e veja o que tem dentro.
Insira o encantamento dentro do baú.
Uma força desconhecida está mantendo o baú fechado. Derrote os monstros próximos para inserir o encantamento nele.
Abra o baú trancado.
It seems enough of the spell has been injected to the chest. Try opening the chest again.
Check the letter on the ground
A letter lies on the ground. Check if someone has lost it.
Find the recipient to the letter
The sender of the letter is a person called Eras. It is supposed to go to a person called Jurus in Orsha.
Check the Letas Altar
There is a trouble at the Letas Altar, it seems. Check the altar.
Defeat the nearby monsters disrupting the energy of the Letas Altar
Letas Altar is weakened by the evil force from the nearby monsters. Defeat the nearby monsters.
Drink the medicinal fluid and defeat the monsters at Apsimesti Crossroads
Fight the monsters at Apsimesti Crossroads while in a weakened state.
You've overcame the extreme hardship. Report back to Barbarian Submaster.
As a cleric, the best way to approach the goddesses is to serve others.{nl}If you help me heal the soldiers at Miners' Village, I will gladly help you back.
Good work.{nl}I may not be of much help but I will do my best to lead you closer to the goddess.
Brilliant.{nl}You've completed the assignment. When you are ready, let's begin the Elementalist lesson.
The forces of evil will never reach the goddess' revelation.
If you're worried for your safety, I will also give you this Romuva Holy Water.{nl}When you drink this water, you will be invisible to the demons for a short time.
Welcome! {nl} Oh, so you're the Revelator. I really wanted to meet you. {nl}
I heard you successfully removed the seal at Pasagos Cliff.{nl}Now go get the next step from my brothers at the Pillars of the Courtyard.
There's a piece below Seklus Bridge that is suspected to be a piece from the monument.{nl}But Achat is around there so I can't reach it.
The light bead, I saw it too.{nl}The demons are collecting them all over the place.{nl}
The Owl Sculptures are sending them off to somewhere...{nl}Perhaps, you could find its trail from the Owl Sculpture you've just seen, can you?
If it were anyone else, I would have stopped you but to you, words of warning will only fall flat.{nl}Not sure if it is bravery or recklessness...{nl}
I should get some rest here for a little bit. I'm running out of breath.{nl}It's dangerous for me to stay with you, because I don't want to risk my life.
I don't know about the identity of the light bead.{nl}However, it does not have that same feeling that the demons produce.
Thank you. Really, thank you.{nl}If I got under the influence of the demons,{nl}I shudder to think what would have happened to the poor souls...
The light bead you saw is actually... a human soul.{nl}No memory nor will of its own. Just a pure soul.{nl}
They are from those who lived around here, lived until those demons...{nl}
We, owls, lead the souls to the arms of the goddess.{nl}It's a divine duty that Goddess Ausrine gave us.{nl}
But suddenly the demons invaded the forest, corrupting it in the process. {nl}Then they controlled us.{nl}The controlled owls started to send the souls to wherever the demons told them to.{nl}
I am fully aware of how shameless of me to ask you this.{nl}But, I cannot bear to see another soul getting sacrificed. {nl}Please, destroy the Mind Control Tower.
The goddess has not forsaken us after all..{nl}She sent you to us!{nl}
The ripple damage from destroying the Mind Control Tower might harm the owls.{nl}Please, fill my comrades with the energy of the forest before you destroy the Mind Control Tower.{nl}
Please, gather the fragments of the Karolis Altar destroyed by the demons.{nl}Restoring the altar will help to recover some of the forest.{nl}
I will give the Guide Owl's Will to you.{nl}It will guide you to the place where the Karolis Altar used to be.
The Karolis Altar used to pump energy to the forest.{nl}Ever since it was destroyed, the energy of the forest was reduced quite significantly.{nl}
The Forest Altar still stands but to spread the energy {nl}throughout the entire forest, it needs Karolis' lights.{nl}The lights went out so did the spreading of the energy.{nl}
If both the Karolis Altar and the Forest Sanctuary are restored. {nl}My comrades will be back to normal. We, the owls, share lives with the forest.
I've been waiting for you.{nl}I knew you succeeded when I sensed that the energy of the forest had strengthened.
I should not have held my hopes too high up... {nl}The restored Karolis Altar was not enough to completely revive the forest.{nl}The Altar of the Forest needs to be revived as well.{nl}
Ah, the Altar of the Forest is located near the pond across there.{nl}It spreads Karolis' lights throughout the forest.{nl}
The lights are almost all out...{nl}If you can illuminate them the power of the altar will spread out.
There are four Karolis' lights.{nl}By illuminating only one light, it will lose its light quickly,{nl}but illuminating all four will maintain the altar's power.{nl}
Be sure to illuminate them all before they give out.
Back in the yesteryears, there were numerous altars but now, there is only one.{nl}The demons did indeed ruin the forest and us.
You did it! You spread the energy around.{nl}It seems that all the other owls are now back to normal.{nl}
Now, the only thing left to do is to destroy that mind-altering abomination. {nl}Our safety is now guaranteed.
The tower is filled with very malicous energy.{nl}Even you cannot touch it without any precaution.{nl}

The rest of the owls have regained themselves. And they are eager to lend you their power.{nl}Small individually but when collected, strong enough {nl}to fend off the malicious force the tower contains.
Speak with the owls you have come across on the way here,{nl}they want to thank you personally.{nl}
Explain the situation to them and they will surely lend their power.
After getting the powers from all the owls, come back to me.{nl}I will combine them together.
Did any of the owls mention something rude?{nl}They all are deeply grateful for what you have done.{nl}
Now, I will combine their powers along with mine and make them into one.
I was fearful of our combined power not being strong enough...{nl}I am glad to be wrong. It is certainly strong.{nl}
Now, use this power to blow the tower to smithereens!
I am sorry for not being able to repay you for all that you've done for us.{nl}However, what I can say for sure is that{nl}
You certainly are being led by the goddess...{nl}I have that feeling.
Actually, there is one owl a bit far from here...{nl}It's not responding.{nl}
I am worried about that child but..{nl}The crisis on our hand requires our full attention.
The wretched demon tower has fallen?{nl}Peace returns at last! {nl}My heart is content.
Someone named Mardas came here to speak to you.{nl}Mardas has been talking about what he saw. The details on what the demons were doing.
I believe that Letas Stream is under the demons' control.{nl}Could we ask you to help us a bit longer?{nl}
To us, you are our only hope...
Perhaps if Mardas and I can combine both of our knowledges {nl}on what we know about the demons, we can find a solution.{nl}We will be planning here.{nl}
First, we need the Namott of Suppression.{nl}It contains a high level of divine energy from the forest.{nl}
The Guide Owl near Letas Stream can make you one.{nl}But seeing how it is not responding to my call, it must still be under the demons' control.
Please, find the Guide Owl quickly.{nl}When it regains itself, tell it that you need the Namott of Suppression.
On the upper side of Karolis Stream, there is a spot rich with the energy of the forest.{nl}Stand there and the energy will come to you.{nl}
As the energy concentration increases, it gets condensed and crystalized.{nl}Take the condensed energy to the Guide Owl.
Mardas has told me about the atrocities that the demons did. Even{nl}from just the descriptions, it puts a cold spear through my heart.{nl}We cannot allow it to continue.{nl}
O, the poor souls... they are the ones whom we handed over to the demons?{nl}I am made of wood but my wooden heart is aching.
The Owl Chief sent you, eh?{nl}The Namott of Suppression... Now that's an extreme measure. The situation must be that dire.{nl}
The Namott of Suppression is not something to be made lightly...{nl}But for all of us, I will try.{nl}
The first ingredient we need is Letas' Sacred Branch. It's a branch from Letas' Sacred Tree.{nl}However, the energy of the forest is needed to find Letas' Sacred Tree...
Wha..? You already had it on you?{nl}What good news. Bring it to the northern side of Letas Stream and sprinkle the energy around.{nl}
It might not be easy to spot at the first try.{nl}You need to keep spreading the energy around to make the tree appear.
Letas' Sacred Tree is a physical manifestation of the forest's will.{nl}Before the demon invasion, it was not a rare sight to see but now it is.{nl}
However, if the energy of the forest is restored, they will reappear.
How did it go? Did you find the tree?{nl}
I wondered what should we do if the tree does not appear even with the energy of the forest.{nl}What a relief! Perhaps, it was no luck but rather you are the special one.
It seems that Letas' Sacred Branch is weakened by the demons.{nl}Its power is insufficient. We need to fill it up.{nl}
The branch can purify and absorb the malicious force from the monsters.{nl}Use it on monsters to purify their energies and absorb them.
The weak ones will not be able to stand the awesome might of the branch.{nl}They will burn like a piece of paper.
The Owl Chief must trust you very much, seeing that it sent you.
Is the branch all filled up?{nl}Let me make it into the Namott of Suppression.
The Namott is complete but...{nl}I am not confident it will be enough to combat the demons.{nl}
I, myself, am not sure what the Owl Chief was thinking.{nl}I too have lost most of my power, I cannot help you.
There is someone who can help you on your mission?{nl}What are you waiting for? Go and find out the plan.{nl}
Perhaps, you don't have to go after all.
It is a blessing that that Mardas person is helping us out. But the story Mardas told is a very{nl}depressing one.{nl}We are in some ways responsible for such an atrocity. I feel guilty.
You are just in time.{nl}Did you get the Namott of Suppression?
After talking with the Owl Chief, we might have a plan that can work.{nl}The demons are using the evil energy to corrupt Letas Stream and trap the stolen souls there.{nl}
A thing called Soul Starvation is keeping the souls locked up. It must be destroyed but..{nl}The evil energy is far too thick and it is protected by the magic circles.{nl}
Removing the evil energy corrupting the forest would be first in order.
Follow the right path and go straight to find the center of the forest, you will find the evil energy.{nl}Set up Namott of Suppression around it to remove the evil energy.
When I think about the folks back home, I cannot bear it any longer but..{nl}I am powerless. Helping you is my way of doing 'something at all'.
The evil energy is continuously spawning?{nl}It's more serious than I thought.{nl}
We need to fill up the spots where the energy of the forest is getting drained quickly. {nl}The Black Smoke spots.
If we remove Black Smoke, the demon structures will be weakened as well.{nl}But the way to get there is guarded by Surveillance Eyes. So, approaching it will not be a cake walk.{nl}

It's rather risky but... I want you to infiltrate the place without getting detected by the{nl}Surveillance Spheres spinning around the Surveillance Eyes.{nl}At the end of the path, there is a magic circle managing those eyes.{nl}
Without the magic circle, the Surveillance Eyes might go away as well.
Without those pesky eyes, Black Smoke can be easily dealt with by using Namott of Surveillance.{nl}Be careful, it is a near-suicide mission.
The Owl Chief sure did know a lot.{nl}It is wise and knowledgeable even though it never left this place in its entire existence.
Are you hurt?{nl}It must have been a very dangerous journey, I can imagine... I was just standing here feeling powerless.
Now, the Soul Starvation is vulnerable.{nl}The magic circles around it are protecting it but they can be easily disabled.{nl}

There is a certain order in disabling the protection magic circles.{nl}One false step and you have to start all over again from the beginning.{nl}If you remain focused even in the face of failure, you will find the order.
The evil energy is weakened and Black Smoke is gone. The demons, if they are not completely stupid, will notice thses changes and come after us.{nl}Please, be haste.
If we manage to set those souls free, will the guilt and sadness I feel can be set free as well?{nl}But what about my rage?{nl}
I do not know at the moment...
Is that so... The souls are free now.{nl}The Owl Chief promised to guide the souls to their rightful place, the arms of the goddess.{nl}
The Namott of Suppression is best left to the Guide Owl.{nl}It will help the owls regain their power.{nl}
Then, I must go back to the Owl Chief.{nl}I will deliver this good news and want to hear more about it.
Perhaps, this place is free of demons after all this time?{nl}My words cannot thank you enough!{nl}
I do not believe it is no coincidence that you came to us.{nl}I sense the divine will of the goddess guiding you here.{nl}I pray she will continue to guide you.{nl}
On behalf of the forest and all the owls, {nl}I pray for the divine guidance and protection to be onto you.{nl}Farewell, my friend...
Gratitude fills up my heart.{nl}
I apologize for my initial rudeness. I was very confused.
Greetings. So, you want to learn the high level magic of a wizard?{nl}
I am yet to be convinced whether you are worthy enough.{nl}These high-leveled skills cannot be learnt that easily without a firm foundation.{nl}Do you have what it takes?

Oh, your eagerness to learn is quite impressive.{nl}I have a mission for you. Go into the Woods of the Linked Bridges and defeat monsters.{nl}That's quite simple, no? If you are unable to do this simple task, then I see no future between us.
Here is your mission: Go into the Woods of the Linked Bridges and defeat monsters.{nl}That's quite simple, no? If you are unable to do this simple task, then I see no future between us.
Hmm, not bad. Not bad at all.{nl}You seem to have what it takes.{nl}Now, pay attention to what I am about to demonstrate.
You want to become a Pyromancer, eh?{nl}

Kiddo, not everyone can become a Pyromancer.{nl}Let's just say, you gotta be able make friends with fire and its heat.{nl}I ain't all that convinced yet. But I will give you a chance to prove yourself.
Good. Now, I want you to kill some monsters while under the magic I will put on you.{nl}The magic will determine whether the spell you use is compatible with fire.
Your combat data will determine whether the spell you use is compatible with fire.
Oh my, you do have a knack. I am a bit surprised?{nl}Well, a promise is a promise. I will teach ya.{nl}Whether you can follow it through or not is entirely up to ya. Got that?
Do you wish to become a Cryomancer?{nl}
That's very nice to hear.{nl}More people becoming Cryomancers is always desirable in my book.{nl}
However, accepting all participants will only prove itself detremental to all of us.{nl}It is for the best if we conduct a simple test to determine your aptitude {nl}in becoming a Cryomancer.
Here is a Unmelting Magical Piece of Ice.{nl}This piece of ice is injected with a spell that will sustain its frozen state.{nl}Defeat the monsters and use their energies to keep the piece cold.
Defeat the monsters and use their energies to keep the piece cold.
The spell is strong in this piece of ice.{nl}Impressive. You do have what it takes to handle the magic of coldness.{nl}Now, watch me carefully.
Do you want to learn new skills of the Archer?{nl}That's fine, but let's have some fun first. I'll give you a simple test.
An archer must be able to strike one's enemy precisely from a distance.{nl}Your test consists of keeping distance between you and the monster while attacking your target.
Hmm, your spirit is high.{nl}Attacks that are too close to the target or a monster's dodge do not count.
The attacks that are either shot from a too close distance or when a monster dodges your attacks,{nl}it doesn't count.
Impressive.{nl}
Keep your eyes wide open! As I am about to show you new skills of the Archer!
So you want to be a Ranger?{nl}A horde of enemies is no threat to a Ranger.{nl}A Ranger can use its specifically designed skills to take out multiple enemies.{nl}
If someone runs away from just a couple of enemies, that person doesn't have what it takes.{nl}And that means that person is not cut out to become a Ranger.
Good. Let's see what you got.{nl}Well, facing off multiple enemies at the moment would be asking too much. {nl}I have another similar test.{nl}

Take one out and take the next one out right away.{nl}It's technically not taking them out simultaneously, but being able to pull off quick {nl}and consecutive kills is a good first step to become a Ranger.
So, you can walk the talk, heh?{nl}Quite impressive, I must say.{nl}
Good. You have what it takes.{nl}I will teach you the path of the Ranger.{nl}
Did you come to me to become a Quarrel Shooter?{nl}I do not refuse the ones who are ambitious.{nl}Nevertheless, there is prerequisite you must have.{nl}
Quarrel Shooters uses crossbows as their main weapon.{nl}First, you must get yourself an appropriate crossbow.{nl}We'll resume our little talk when you are equipped with a +5 crossbow.
If it is a +5 crossbow, it doesn't matter if it is a weapon you use or {nl}the one you have it on you just in case. {nl}After checking the weapon, I will give it back to you.
That's some high quality crossbow you got there.{nl}This will do it.{nl}
Now, I will train you to become a Quarrel Shooter.
You want learn high-leveled magic of a Wizard?{nl}Magic is not something you can learn by yourself.{nl}Seeking advice from other people sometimes can help you faster.
There are other Wizard Masters in Orsha.{nl}Seek advice from the Pyromancer, Cryomancer, Psychokino and Linker submasters.
Seek advice from the Pyromancer, Cryomancer, Psychokino and Linker submasters.
Did it help?{nl}Your eyes show signs of enlightenment.{nl}Now, use them to learn the way of what I am about to show you.
To strengthen your Pyromancy, you must strengthen your fire energy.{nl}It's a piece of cake for me but for you, you might need some help.{nl}Do you think you can handle it?
Alright. Here, take this Condensed Firestone.{nl}Set this firestone up somewhere and defeat nearby monsters,{nl}and your spell's fire energy will be increased.
Set up a Condensed Firestone and defeat the nearby monsters to enhance the fire energy of your spell.
Good work.{nl}Now, you can learn new magic.{nl}I will show them to you. Watch me.
Is it new magic that you seek?{nl}There is stronger magic in the realm of Cryomancy.{nl}But, you will need to be more experienced in handling the cold energy.
I can sense your eagerness to learn more. Terrific!{nl}You still lack experience, so I will lend you this Frost Tome.{nl}Use this Frost Tome to weaken monsters and take them out afterwards.{nl}
The tome will aid you in handling the cold energy better.{nl}Hey, make sure that you engage in combat after activating the tome.
Use the Frost Tome by engaging in combat.
How was it?{nl}Have you gotten better in handling the cold energy?{nl}
Great to hear! Finally, you are ready to learn new skills of the Cryomancer.{nl}Do not forget your past experiences. Always keep this in mind.
Hm, your desire lies in becoming a Psychokino?{nl}You know, a Psychokino does some quite amazing feats.{nl}
It is, however, something that cannot be learnt that quickly.{nl}To control the with invisible force is not an easy act.{nl}Now that I have warned you... Do you still wish to proceed?

Good, but you have not seen anything of this magic yet...{nl}Perhaps, a scroll with the spell of a Psychokino will allow you to wield such power.{nl}With this, it will teach you what it feels like when using skills of a Psychokino.
Use the Telekinesis Scroll to experience first hand what it feels like.{nl}With this, learning the magic of the Psychokino will become easier for you.
So, did you manage to get a little bit of taste of the power?
If you did, follow my lead.
Are you thinking of becoming a Linker?{nl}Linkers are not made but born.{nl}One must know the linkage point between the mind and thoughts of other beings.{nl}
If you really want to become a Linker, allow me to test your 'Linker aptitude'.
To utilize the Linker's magic, one must be able to find the linkage point among other beings.{nl}If you are unable to do so, then I'm afraid you are not fit to learn the path of the Linker.{nl}
I will confirm if you can sense the linkage point while battling monsters.{nl}You may instictively become aware of it or you may never. {nl}I will look at your progress very closely.
While in combat, make sure to concentrate to be able to see the linkage point.{nl}I do hope that you have the talent in you.
Wow, that was great!{nl}I see that you do have what it takes to be a Linker.{nl}
The rest is quite easy.{nl}I will share the magic of the Linker with you.
You are seeking the advanced skills of the Archer? You've come to the right person.{nl}Well then, let's see how familiar you are with our path, the path of the Archer.{nl}

Archers are always confident in battle against any enemy. {nl}However, we always seek for greater challenges to bring out the greater strength in us.{nl}One challenge is the flying-type enemy who wears cloth.{nl}I want you to defeat me some flying-type monsters with the Cloth armor-type.
Only the ones that are a flying-type with the Cloth armor-type.
How do you feel? I noticed it took you shorter than before, right?{nl}
The basics have been covered. Let's move onto the skills.{nl}Open your eyes wide and witness all the details of the Archer's advanced and complicated skills.
Hey, there. Do you wish to learn new Ranger skills?{nl}If so, why don't you help with our efforts in restoring Orsha?{nl}
I am participating in those efforts myself as well.{nl}A Ranger is there to help those who are in danger.
You keep impressing me.{nl}
First up, you might want to acquire some stone for restoring the collapsed wall.{nl}I believe you can find it somewhere in Braken Forest 63_1.
The stone is required for restoring the collapsed wall.{nl}I believe Braken Forest 63_1 is the place where you can find one.
Perfect. This will do.{nl}You've been a lot of help.
Even though I'm quite busy, a promise is a promise.{nl}Let me demonstrate you the new Ranger skills.{nl}Watch me.
You want to learn new skills?{nl}You might want to take good care of your crossbow since{nl}it needs to be in good shape in order to handle the new skills.
To maintain your crossbow effectively, there is nothing more wonderful than Overgrown Fluid.{nl}You can acquire it from the plant monsters that have been overgrowing after Medzio Diena.
The stronger a plant monster is, the more likely the chance is you can get a Overgrown Fluid.
Weapon maintenance is not just an one-off deal. You need to keep doing it from now on.
You look ready for your lesson in learning the new Quarrel Shooter skills.
Did you come here to become a Sapper?{nl}If you do, there is a task awaiting for you.{nl}Help me and I will help you in becoming a Sapper. Deal?
Listen, I am currently conducting an experiment to {nl}strengthen the durability of a barricade that we Sappers use.{nl}Helping me on this experiment will actually help you in the long run.{nl}
Can you please go to Braken Forest 63_1 and find if there is any material{nl}that can be used in strengtening barricades?
Hmm. This does look sturdy. It's certainly worth a try.{nl}I will carry out my end of the deal.
Hunter? Is that what you want to become?{nl}I am pleased to hear that.{nl}
My heart welcomes all but I know for a fact that this might not be a good idea.{nl}So, let me test you on whether you have it to become a Hunter.

A true Hunter laughs at the 'face' of danger and enjoys the thrill it entails.{nl}Prove to me that you have such guts. Enter a dungeon and hunt some monsters.{nl}Prove me that you can remain calm in a dangerous situation.
Enter a dungeon and hunt some monsters. Only then, I will acknowledge you.
Not bad. Not bad at all.{nl}You have guts and power to back it up.{nl}
Observe carefully and follow them.
You wanna learn more advanced Pyromancer skills?{nl}Having more powerful Pyromancers on our side is certainly a good thing. {nl}But a test is in order.{nl}
If you pass this trial of fire, I will let you advance in pyromancy.{nl}Don't think this will be easy.

You might be wondering, what is the trial of fire? Quite simple, actually.{nl}You defeat a Fire property monster. Simple, right? Hahaha.{nl}A Fire property monster is in a way the most familar to us, but the most troublesome as well.{nl}I will root for you. Good luck.
To battle against a Fire property monster, defeat it by becoming stronger or using your wits.
I knew ya would pass it.{nl}You are ready to learn the advanced pyromancy.{nl}Watch and learn.
Learning advanced cryomancy requires you to take a test.{nl}It is designed to determine your aptitude in learning high-leveled cryomancy.{nl}Are you ready to go through the trial of frost?

The trial of frost consists of battling an Ice property monster.{nl}It is crucial to understand the enemy and yourself.{nl}This test should not be too overwhelming if you desire in seeking advanced cryomancy.
Impressive.{nl}You've done more than I expected.{nl}
The power you've demonstrated is enough.{nl}I will teach you the advanced cryomancy.{nl}Pay attention, do not miss the smallest detail!

In order to be more proficient in handling a Psychokino's magic, delicate spell control is crucial.{nl}If you want to learn further in the Psychokino's magic, you should cultivate your abilities first.{nl}I can help you with this. Are you interested?

Here, this is the Magic Control Detection Orb.{nl}It can detect spell being used around you but the range is quite narrow.{nl}Defeat a monster within the range of the Magic Control Detection Orb and return to me.
Defeat a monster within the range of the Magic Control Detection Orb.
Not bad, not bad at all.{nl}
Stay focused and watch my demonstration just like you've practiced.
I am continuously working on the magic of the Linker.{nl}All Linkers need to keep developing and progressing.{nl}
If you want to take a bold step forward on your Linker's path, help me on this.{nl}If this work is proven successful, all Linkers will benefit from it.
Take this Soul Flask.{nl}Fill it up with monster's souls by defeating monsters.
Fill the Soul Flask up with monster souls by defeating them.
This is plenty.{nl}Thank you. Now, about your reward.{nl}I will teach you some new Linker magic.
You want to become a Thaumaturge?{nl}Our magic is all about transforming shapes and properties.{nl}Let me see what talent you have in you.

A way to utilize a Thaumaturge's magic is to be able handle enemies of different sizes.{nl}Try defeating monsters of all sizes. Small, medium and large to be specific.{nl}This will be a good experience for you.
Face off with small, medium and large-sized monsters.
How was it? Did you learn something from it?{nl}
Ah, you seem worthy enough to become a Thaumaturge.{nl}I acknowledge your power and I allow you to tread the path of the Thaumaturge.
I can sense that you want to become an Elementalist.{nl}We study different ways on controlling elemental magic.{nl}

The prerequisite for becoming an Elementalist is an understanding of different properties.{nl}In order to do that, try defeating monsters of all properties. {nl}To be more specific: Fire, Ice, Lightning and Earth properties.
Battling monsters of various properties will help you understand the Elementalist magic.
Well done. You seem ready. {nl}As promised, let me teach you the magic of the Elementalist.
High-leveled skills of a Ranger are not easy to learn.{nl}Your confidence in your own power does not factor in much.{nl}Now, prove to me that your confidence is not unjustified.
Your confidence in yourself did not even flinch, eh?{nl}I like that.{nl}
You've probably heard of Carlyle's Mausoleum and how it is filled with powerful demons, right?{nl}We as Rangers cannot idly stand by.{nl}Defeat those demons and prove your worth.
Defeat the demons in Carlyle's Mausoleum and prove your worth.
Nicely done.{nl}When did you become this powerful?{nl}
A Ranger's advanced skills might be complicated, but you will have no problem learning them.{nl}Watch closely and carefully at my demonstration.
You want to learn the Quarrel Shooter's advanced skills?{nl}Since we use a crossbow as our main weapon, we are able to equip a shield.{nl}The shield ensures our safety in combat.{nl}

The place is dangerous but a good place to train yourself. {nl}Get yourself a fine shield and show me that you are prepared.{nl}Then, I will be able to share you info on the Quarrel Shooter's advanced skills.
A shield enhanced to +5 or beyond will do just nicely.{nl}Don't worry, I will give it back to you as soon as I check it.
That's enough preparation.{nl}Always be mindful and always be prepared.{nl}
As I promised, the advanced skills of the Quarrel Shooter.
You want to learn more Sapper skills?{nl}Well, just like the last time, help me on an experiment to improve Sapper skills. {nl}As a compensation, I will teach you.{nl}

The task I am working on currently is on how to make the bombs stronger.{nl}The monsters in the Castlefield 65_1, 2 and 3 have the necessary materials.{nl}Get me the necessary materials to make a stronger bomb.
Retrieve necessary materials from monsters in Castlefield 65_1, 2 and 3 for the bomb experiment.
These would suffice. I hope it will work this time.{nl}Before I carry on with my experiment, I will teach you the advanced Sapper skills.
You want to learn more Hunter skills?{nl}My, my. You are one eager fellow.{nl}
I have already set up a test for people like you.{nl}It's a simple quest that involves a fetch. Want to have go at it?
Get me a Hunter's Pass one each from Castlefield 65_1, 2 and 3.{nl}I have placed a Hunter's Pass in a chest in each place. You just get me all three.
Get three Hunter's Passes one each from the chests in Castlefield 65_1, 2 and 3.
Let's see... you've got them all.{nl}
Good. Now, I will give you the lessons on high-leveled Hunter skills.{nl}Focus and observe.
Welcome! So you want to become a Wugushi?{nl}Having more allies is always a good thing.{nl}
Basically, Wugushis utilize poison. Where do we get the poison?{nl}You cannot make a poison by yourself yet so I will teach {nl}you the way of getting and using a pre-existing poison.
A good question.{nl}At the moment, the poison you can get would be a poison from a thorn poison.{nl}You can get the poison from the monsters in Carlyle's Mausoleum.
Defeat the monsters in Carlyle's Mausoleum to obtain the poison.
Handle poisons with utmost caution.{nl}There's no telling if the next victim will be you.{nl}
You've got the poison, let's begin the lesson, shall we?{nl}Watch my movements carefully and follow them.
You are looking to become a Scout, aren't you?{nl}Scouts specializes in fields of spying on enemy bases and infiltrating them.{nl}Speed is crucial in the life of a Scout.
If you really want to become a Scout, show me how quick you are, {nl}quick enough to use Scout's skills.{nl}Only then I will teach you the path.
Now then. The point of the test is to see how many times can you attack before getting hit.{nl}Hit them but don't get hit. If you get hit, the counter resets.
Attack a monster continuously without taking a hit.{nl}When you get hit once, the counter resets.
Nimble!{nl}
You seem to be capable of handling the Scout's skills.{nl}Now, let me teach you some scouting skills.
The baron said the strange aura is dangerous and told us not to go near it. {nl}But I don't think that's the case.
There is an unstable magic circle on the way to Ramus Crossroads. {nl}They say to not go near it because a strange aura flows out from it. But it really doesn't seem so. {nl}

The Apsimesti Crossroads always has been a final testing ground for Hoplites.{nl}Many of forerunners before you would fight monsters till their spears broke.{nl}Of course, there were those who got severely injured.

Find and get those broken spears and armor. That will be your final test.{nl}Broken spear fragments can be obtained from defeating monsters.{nl}As for broken armor, check the road or reeds forest for corroded metal plates.
Talk is cheap. What matters the most is can you do it.{nl}This medicinal liquid is not actually medicinal. Rather it's a poison. {nl}Back home, we drink it as part of training.
Drink it and kill the monsters down at the Apsimesti Crossroads while your body is under the influence.{nl}You must do it alone.
Mage Melchioras
Eh
Gu
Revelator Mihail
Andrea
Nuodas
Elder's Granddaughter
Come now, grandpa... How many times have I told you, it's too dangerous to go outside alone...
Oh, you must be the traveler helping our grandfather.{nl}I welcome your arrival.{nl}I was getting worried because my grandfather has disappeared.

We live by the lower lakeside.{nl}The lake has recently turned red and plants that feed off from it have overgrown. {nl}Anyone who either drinks it or eat the fruits become sick.{nl}Some villagers left town for Orsha, the rest has come up to investigate the lake.
My grandfather and the villagers found a suspicious place. {nl}The investigation got cut short when the monsters came.{nl}Could you continue the investigation for us?
You found something in the ashes
Thank you in advance!
I want to guide you myself but, my grandfather is inspecting the stuff he found around here.

You came! And you've found the half-burnt notes?{nl}I need to show these to my grandfather...{nl}He is off somewhere aftering sensing a tremor along with young villagers.{nl}I will inspect them myself. Could you go and get my grandfather for me?
I hope my grandfather is okay...

Thank you for saving me.{nl}Without you, something very dangerous might have happened to me.{nl}I was inspecting a disc I've found in the suspicious place and {nl}suddenly monsters were chasing after me.
Have you found my grandfather?

After an earthquake, the disc emitted a red bead of light pointing towards the water. {nl}I naturally followed it. I came this far, the light went out and {nl}I found myself surrounded with monsters.{nl}It seems this disc is a device to find something. Could you help me on what it is looking?{nl}I would like to go with you but this young man is injured while saving me.
Thanks a million.{nl}I will head back home and wait for good news.

I have never seen this fragment before.{nl}It is from the monster that the disc was point at?{nl}I will take it and inspect thoroughly.{nl}There might be a connection between this and the cause of the water turning red.

Hmm, the village hunter said that s/he has seen some people{nl}going to the place where the lakeside notes were found.{nl}I will go talk to him/her, as soon as my granddaughter finishes inspecting the notes, {nl}bring them to me.
They are mostly burnt, so quite a huge portion of notes were illegible,{nl}but I copied down the parts that were readable...{nl}I marked the parts that are unreadable.
This has really gotten out of hand.{nl}Who knew that Kepas could grow so big...{nl}I wonder if it's because of Medzio Diena?
------ ---- corrupting the water-
------- --- --- the Seir Rainforest's results seem------.
--- ------ ---- its security measures required---- ----.
---- --- --- a researchy on the security measures ------
---- ----- confirm it in the lab --------
They have been conducting experiments to corrupt the lake.
Go to my grandfather. He is at the Absenta Reservoir.
You came.
I will pray to this obelisk to accept our offerings.{nl}Could you go to the other obelisk and submit the offerings?
I will pray to the goddess. {nl}I appreciate it if you could give the offerings to the goddess in the other place as well.

Hmm? A monster appeared again?{nl}That's strange, the obelisk I was praying to did indeed turn blight red but nothing happened...{nl}We need to find another way.{nl}Thank you for your help. I will tell the others.
Another earthquake!{nl}Could this also be linked to the experiment?{nl}Please, take care of my grandfather. I am very worried about him.
Have you checked what was on the notes?

Hm...{nl}The experimented is the cause of the corruption. We must investigate further.{nl}The hunter saw some suspicious people in some place other than the spot s/he found the note.{nl}If they might be the ones responsible, could you investigate the place?
Godspeed.{nl}The place is infested with monsters, please, take care of yourself.
Please, be careful.
Have you found the picture?{nl}Could you show it to me?

The gemstone on the picture is the same as the fragment you've brought here.{nl}Not long after I brought the red fragment here, the water in the bottle turned red.{nl}The note, the picture and the water turning red. {nl}They all fit! The red gemstone corrupts the nearby water.
The red gemstone is under the lake. How can we retrieve it?
A Hydra? Hurry and let's go!
The Hydra we've just seen is
Tyronas Hydra

That monster is from the time of my grandfather. It is known for its cruelty and cunning nature.{nl}But there is something strange... {nl}Because the last time I saw it, its scales were not red and that big.
I wonder if that is because of the red gemstone that is stuck into its body.{nl}The experiment depicted or described in both the picture and the notes was Tyronas Hydra.

When the people approached it, it went back in, I think its cunning nature hasn't changed a bit.{nl}Just a small number of people must lure that creature in and defeat it. {nl}We have no one to capable of doing that.{nl}Could you defeat the monster and destroy the gemstone inside of it?
Thank you so much!{nl}The hunter will fill you on the details.{nl}Go talk to the hunter.
You are the one whom the elder has talked about.{nl}Thank you for lending your hand.
A bait and a trap should be used to lure and trap the Hydra.{nl}I will prepare the trap.{nl}I am really sorry about this but could you get a bait?
Thank you for doing this.{nl}Could you get the meat from Chafperor?{nl}After that, we need a herb to put inside the bait and remove the trace of our scent.
I will be preparing a trap.{nl}You get the bait, that would be lovely.
All done?{nl}Nice work.{nl}I will now process the bait.

Dear traveler, if possible, could you get me some medicinal herbs?{nl}One of the town youths has accidentally drank the corrupted water and got sick.{nl}Medicinal herbs would certainly ease his pain.{nl}How about that?
We have no proper cure yet. All we can do is ease the suffering...
Thank you.{nl}That will certainly lessen the pain.
Lanaldas

You are the one who have been helping us?{nl}I heard the lake corruption is due to an experiment!{nl}I plan on burning down the laboratory.{nl}That's why I am making the oil. It's still not enough.{nl}If I just have more Chafperor's Lard...
Thanks for helping me on this. I will burn this place to ashes once and for all.
Thanks.{nl}This would make plenty of oil!
Now, I have enough to burn it down.{nl}Go to the laboratory and the other one, pour the oil on them both and light them all.{nl}Good luck.
This must never happen again.
Thank you. That's a relief.{nl}Thank you for your help.
Go to the hunter.{nl}He will help you.
All set and ready to go.{nl}Just place the bait on the trap and the Hydra will appear.{nl}May the goddesses be with you.
I certainly hope the lake would return to normal.{nl}We thank you for your courage.
You came back!{nl}How did it go?

After defeating the Hydra, the crystal was destroyed?{nl}Thank you! All the villagers are very grateful for your valiant deeds.{nl}The lake at the moment is not clean but it will soon.{nl}Thank you so much.
My grandfather is too active. It worries me.{nl}No harm should fall on him...
May the goddesses save us all...
Town Youth
Thank you for saving me.{nl}I was surrounded by monsters while investigating the mysterious object with the elder.
Traveler, please, help me!
What happened to this beautiful lake...{nl}Such a loss.
We must locate the pollutant and remove it quickly.{nl}It shall not continue. That spells doom for the town.
I have written down all the parts that are readable.{nl}What a shame, if I finished it a bit quicker, you could have started with the grandfather. {nl}I'm sorry about this.
I safely arrived thanks to you.{nl}I thank you again.
You sense an earthquake of an unknown origin
Please, destroy the red crystal.{nl}I beseech you!
Oh, what am I glad to see you.{nl}Our investigation went bumpy with only just us.
Thank you for helping us out.{nl}May the blessing of the goddesses be upon you.
And to save you...{nl}You had to be hidden amongst all the Revelators. There was no other way.{nl}
Defeat the Infro Holder Shamans and Chafperor chasing Bronius!
Using the Namott of Suppression
I will think about it

Afar but Precise [Archer Advancement]

Don't worry about it.

Frost Tome [Cryomancer Advancement]

Unknown Force [Psychokino Advancement]

Natural Enemy [Archer Advancement]

Crossbow Maintenance [Quarrel Shooter Advancement]

I will take the trial by fire.

I will take the trial by frost

I am ready to learn the delicate spell control.

Size Does Not Matter [Thaumaturge Advancement]

I will take them all out.

Trusty Shield [Quarrel Shooter Advancement]

Where can I get it from?
Featherlight [Scout Advancement]
I will show you.
The Corrupted Lake (1)
The Corrupted Lake (3)
What is happening here?
I have no idea what you are talking about.
The Corrupted Lake (4)
Wait a minute.
The Corrupted Lake (5)
I will investigate it.
I will think about it.
The Corrupted Lake (6)
Are you finished with inspecting the note?
I will come back later.
Offerings to the Goddess (1)
Offerings to the Goddess (2)
My hands are tied at the moment.
Clear the Corruption (1)
I will investigate further into it
I will think about it.
Clear the Corruption (2)
Let me join your thinktank.
Let me know if you get any idea.
Clear the Corruption (3)
Clear the Corruption (4)
I will think about it for a minute.
Clear the Corruption (5)

I would need a minute to prepare.
Placing a bait
Herb of the Lake
Recurrence Prevention (1)
Recurrence Prevention (2)
The Corrupted Lake (2)
Tiberius wants to test the Holy Bombs on Glizardon. Drink the Namott Holy Water to hide yourself, and then put the Holy Bomb onto a Glizardon's back.
As you approaches the ghost, it disappears leaving only a pouch behind. Inspect the pouch.
Namott of Suppression is completed but the Guide Owl a lot in its mind. Talk with the Guide Owl.
The evil enery surrounding and corrupting the forest must be removed first, according to Mardas. Install Namott of Suppression near the evil energy to suppress it.
The magic circles protecting Soul Starvation are all disabled. Use the power of Namott of Suppression to destroy Soul Starvation.
You've defeated the alerted demons. Destroy Soul Starvation with the power of Namott of Suppression.
Mardas says he will deliver the message to the Guide Owl after inspecting the situation. Go to the Guide Owl and return the Namott of Suppression and report that everything is solved.
Find the right recipient
Talk to the Wizard Submaster
Talk to the Wizard Submaster in Orsha.
Defeat the monsters in the Woods of the Linked Bridges
The Wizard Submaster wants to test your aptitude in learning advanced magic. Defeat the monsters in the Woods of the Linked Bridges to prove your worth.
Report to the Wizard Submaster
Return to the Wizard Submaster.
Talk to the Pyromancer Submaster
Talk to the Pyromancer Submaster in Orsha.
Defeat monsters while carrying the Energy of Fire
The Pyromancer Submaster wants to determine your compatibility with the energy of fire. Use the orb with the energy of fire inside that Pyromancer Submaster gave you and battle with monsters.
All Regions
Report to the Pyromancer Submaster
Return to the Pyromancer Submaster.
Talk to the Cryomancer Submaster
Talk to the Cryomancer Submaster in Orsha.
Defeat monsters and recharge the spell
The Cryomancer Submaster says that the training to handle the cold energy is required. As a training execise, fill up Unmelting Magical Piece of Ice with spell.
Report to the Cryomancer Submaster
Return to the Cryomancer Submaster.
Talk to the Archer Submaster
Talk to the Archer Submaster in Orsha.
Attack monsters from a distance
The Archer Submaster says that the one who uses a bow and arrow must be able to hit an enemy from afar precisely. Strike a hit on a monster from a distance.
Report to the Archer Submaster
Return to the Archer Submaster.
Talk to the Ranger Submaster
Talk to the Ranger Submaster in Orsha.
Defeat monsters all by yourself in 10 seconds
The Ranger Submaster says the crucial point of being a Ranger is battling against multiple enemies. Defeat a monster right after defeatin a monster within 10 second.
Report to the Ranger Submaster
Return to the Ranger Submaster.
Talk to the Quarrel Shooter Submaster
Talk to the Quarrel Shooter Submaster in Orsha.
Enhance a crossbow up to level five
The Quarrel Shooter Submaster emphasizes the importance of maintaining a crossbow that a Quarrel Shooter primarily uses. Get a crossbow enhanced up to level five.
Report to the Quarrel Shooter Submaster
Return to the Quarrel Shooter Submaster.
Listen to advice from the masters of other magic areas

The Wizard Submaster says an individual's effort is a big part of improving one's magic but listening to others is also very important. Talk to Pyromancer Submaster, Cryomancer Submaster, Psychokino Master and Linker Master and seek their advice.
Use Condensed Firestone and defeat monsters
The Pyromancer Submaster says to be more apt in handling fire magic, enhancing the energy of fire is necessary. Use the Condensed Firestone and defeat monsters nearby.
Defeat monster after using Frost Tome
The Cryomancer Submaster says that you need to be more experienced in handling frost. Use Frost Tome and defeat monsters with decreased resistance against ice property.
Talk to the Psychokino Master in Orsha.
Use the Telekinesis Scroll to blow enemies away
The Psychokino Master says to become a Psychokino is to become perceptible of the force invisible and control it. Use Telekinesis Scroll to blow enemies away and get used to Psychokino's power.
Return to the Psychokino Master.
Talk to the Linker Master in Orsha
Attack monsters until you find a linkage point

According to the Linker Master, the first step in linker's magic is to find the linkage point among the existences. Linkage points can be learned while attacking monsters. Try attacking monsters and linkage points.
Return to the Linker Master.
Defeat Flying-type monsters with the Cloth armor-type
The Archer Submaster asks you to fight an enemy that can challenge an Archer to one's own extreme. Defeat flying-type monsters with the cloth armor-type.
Gather Stone for Wall Restoration

The Ranger Submaster asks you to help other Rangers who are participating in an effort to rebuild Orsha. Go to the reefs forest 63_1 and find the right stone for Wall Restoration from Hard Building Stone.
Obtain overgrown fluid from plant monsters

The Quarrel Shooter Submaster teaches you that maintaining one's own crossbow well is very important. Defeat plant monsters and obtain overgrown fluid that will be used to maintain your crossbow. Stronger the plant monster is more likely you will obtain overgrown fluid.
Defeat plant type monsters and obtain %s
Talk to the Sapper Submaster
Talk to the Sapper Submaster in Orsha.
Gather materials for a sturdier barricade
The Sapper Submaster is working on a way to strengthen barricades that Sappers use. Go to the reefs forest 63_1 and retrieve useful materials.
Report to the Sapper Submaster
Return to the Sapper Submaster.
Talk to the Hunter Submaster
Talk to the Hunter Submaster in Orsha.
Defeat monsters in a dungeon
The Hunter Submaster says emphatically that a Hunter must have guts to enjoy danger. Go to a dungeon area and defeat monsters. Tougher the dungeon is, more you will be recognized.
All dungeon areas
Report to the Hunter Submaster
Return to the Hunter Submaster.
Defeat fire property monsters
The Pyromancer Submaster warns you that in order learn advance Pyromancy, one must go through a trial by fire. Defeat a fire property monster as a trial by fire.
Defeat ice property monsters
