The Cryomancer Submaster warns you that in order learn advance Cryomancy, one must go through a trial by frost. Defeat a ice property monster as a trial by frost.
Defeat monsters with the range of Magic Control Detection Orb
The Psychokino Master is planning on testing you on the delicate spell control. Use Magic Control Detection Orb and defeat monsters in its range.
Defeat monsters and obtain spiritual energy

The Linker Master is currently working on advancing Linker's magic by finding a connection other than a spiritual one. Help with Linker Master's study and fill up Soul Flask with the monsters by defeating them so that Linkers may become stronger.
Talk to the Thaumaturge Submaster
Talk to the Thaumaturge Submaster in Orsha.
Defeat monsters of all sizes; small, medium and large
The Thaumaturge Submaster says an aspiring Thaumaturge must be able to handle monsters of all sizes. Defeat monsters of all sizes; small, medium and large.
Report to the Thaumaturge Submaster
Return to the Thaumaturge Submaster.
Talk to the Elementalist Master in Orsha.
Defeat monsters with properties of fire, ice, electricity and earth

The Elementalist Master says to be able to proficiently use the magic of an Elementalist, one must capable of adapting to the enemy's property. Defeat monsters of all properties; fire, ice, electricity and earth.
Return to the Elementalist Master.
Defeat demons in the Carlyle's Mausoleum
The Ranger Submaster says that an on-site training is the best to determine one's aptitude. Defeat demons in the Carlyle's Mausoleum and prove your worth.
Enhance a shield up to level five
The Quarrel Shooter Submaster says a Quarrel Shooter ought to have a trusty shield at hand. Get a shield enhanced to level five like the Quarrel Shooter Master told you to.
Materials for the bomb experiment
The Sapper Submaster is looking for a way to make bombs stronger. Defeat monsters in Castlefield 65_1, 2 and 3 to obtain materials appropriate for the experiment.
Search for Hunter's Pass
The Hunter Submaster says the Hunter's test is already set up. Go to Castlefield 65_1, 2 and and find a chest in each are which contains Hunter's Pass.
Talk to the Wugushi Master in Orsha.
Gather corpse poison of Wugushi
The Wugushi Master says you start with finding a poison if you want become a Wugushi. Defeat monsters in the Carlyle's Mausoleum and the corpse poison.
Return to the Wugushi Master.
Talk to the Scout Submaster
Talk to the Scout Submaster in Orsha.
Attack enemies without getting hit
The Scout Submaster says that the main requirement for being a Scout is a quick movement. Do normal attacks to monsters without getting hit yourself. If you get hit, the counter resets.
Report to the Scout Submaster
Return to the Scout Submaster.
Gather broken spears and broken armor pieces of Hoplites
Defeat monst at the Apsimesti Crossroads and gather broken pieces of other Hoplites' spears. Also, the broken pieces of armor.
You've found all the stuff you've been asked to. Return and report to Hoplite Master.
Obtain %s in the reeds forest at the Apsimesti Crossroads
Defeat the monsters at Apsimesti Crossroads while under the influence of the Barbarian's potion. You must do it alone.
The Corrupted Lake
Talk to Elder Aloizard
Elder Aloizard is in danger.
Defeat eight of the nearby monsters
Elder Aloizard says the road back to town is blocked by the monsters.
Tell Elder Aloizard that all nearby monsters have been defeated.
Defeat nearby monsters
Talk to the Elder's Granddaughter
The granddaughter needs your help.
Investigate the suspicious place
The granddaughter asked you to investigate the suspicious place.
Talk to the Granddaughter
The granddaughter is asking you for help.
Find the disappeared old man
You should find the old man who ran off to somewhere.
Talk to the old man
Check up on the states of the old man and the young man
Elder Aloizard is asking you to inspect the suspicious disc.
Use the suspicious disc to inspect the nearby monsters
Use the suspicious disc to reveal the secret of the detector.
Bring the red fragment obtained from the suspicious disc to Elder Aloizard.
Ask the granddaughter about the notes.
Meet Elder Aloizard by the Absenta Reservoir
Speak with Elder Aloizard about the notes.
Offerings to the Goddess
Talk to Samsonas
Samsonas is looking for someone to help him.
Gather Chafperor's meat
Samsonas asked you to bring the offerings to the obelisk.
You should give the gathered meat to Samsonas.
%s obtained
Samsonas has one more favor to ask of you.
Give the Offerings to the Obelisk
Samsonas asks you to give the offerings to the obelisk instead of him.
Report back to Samsonas
You should return back to Samsonas and report the result.
Clear the Corruption
You need to speak with Elder Aloizard about the content of the notes.
Investigate the suspicious place and find a clue
Investigate the second suspicious place.
You need to bring the Partially burnt Painting you've found to Elder Aloizard.
Talk to Elder Aloizard.
Follow the villager to the spot where a Hydra appeared
You should follow the villager to the spot where a Hydra appeared.
Ask Elder Aloizard about the Hydra.
Elder Aloizard has a favor to ask.
Elder Aloizard asks you to go to the hunter.
You need to speak with the hunter and figure out a way to lure the Hydra.
Gather Chafperor's meat
The hunter asked you to gather meat appropriate for a bait.
Gather the Blue Lake Herb
You need to gather the Blue Lake Herb to use it in the bait.
You've gathered enough meat. Now, gather the blue lake herb.
Gather the Blue Lake Herb to use it in the bait.
Bring the ingredients back to the hunter.
Gather %s to put in the bait
You should get the bait from the hunter and use it to lure the Hydra.
Lure Tyronas Hydra
You should place the bait on the trap to lure the Tyronas Hydra.
You should tell Elder Aloizard that the Hydra has fallen.
Defeat Tyronas Hydra
The hunter seems to have a favor to ask of you.
Gather the Yellow Lake Herb
The hunter asked you to gather some Yellow Lake Herb to ease the pain of the poisoned villagers.
You should bring the gathered herb back to the hunter.
%s obtained
Recurrence Prevention
Talk to Lanaldas
Lanaldas is seeking help.
Collect Chafperor's Lard
Lanaldas has asked you to collect Chafperor's Lard in order to make oil.
Hand in the Chafperor's Lard you've collected to Lanaldas.
Lanaldas seems to have another request.
Burn the worktable and magic circle in the laboratory.
Lanaldas has asked you to burn the worktable and magic circle in the laboratory to prevent such an incident from re-occuring.
Report the results to Lanaldas.
Receptionist Donnes
I might have a request for you.{nl}You might be the perfect one for the job. Interested?
This job would be perfect for you.{nl}I do have a keen eye for people.
The client should be pleased by your performance.{nl}Well done.
You didn't see him?{nl}His mind is not all that sound. Where could he be?{nl}
Where are my manners, allow me to introduce myself.{nl}I am studying the Royal Mausoleum of the Great King Zachariel along with the historians.
What study is worth doing in the midst of all these monsters after Medzio Diena, you might ask...{nl}Our latest study shows that the Royal Mausoleum contains the secret behind Medzio Diena.{nl}
No one can say for certain that a disaster like Medzio Diena will not recur.{nl}Also, we need to study the Royal Mausoleum to find the missing goddesses.{nl}
Anyway, if you do find Jonas, please let me know.{nl}He is essential to our study.
The next seal is on the road to the Collapsed Sanctum.{nl}It's dangerous out there, it's best to prepare yourself before you set off.
Jonas wants the record he wrote.{nl}Hmm...{nl}
Jonas is the head of the family that has been protecting the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}He is a very important person to our research team.
He was once very healthy, but these days he is old and weak both in mind and body.{nl}It was after Jonas went out to a visit with his servant.{nl}
He was later to be found with a case of dementia...{nl}His servant was no where to be found.{nl}
Well, anyway, I see what must be done. {nl}Take this medicine with you and give it to him.{nl}

The Great King Zachariel has asked my forefather to keep the {nl}Eyes of the Great King and the Royal Mausoleum's treasure safe.{nl}Use the Eyes of the Great King to find the worthy one and pass down the treasure.{nl}
I am not sure of what he meant by 'the worthy one'...{nl}However, the goddess said unto Zachariel and gave him{nl}the divine task of helping the one who will save this world.{nl}
It could very well be that all this is according to the goddess' guidance.{nl}So, test yourself and see if you are the worthy one {nl}to take the treasure through the Eyes of the Great King.
What you've said is hard to believe.{nl}This revelation is from Goddess Laima and only when we collect all of them, she will return. {nl}Is that what you mean?{nl}

Goddess Laima is also referred as the 'goddess in a book'. {nl}There is no other story mentioning her name other than the record that states{nl}that she picked the spot for the kingdom to be built to the Great King Zachariel.{nl}
We need to assemble already?{nl}The world may be on the brink of destruction, but I can't accept this kind of insane order. {nl}I have enough missions on my hands as it is.
There is a divine nature behind a mere material object.{nl}Many call it a soul.

According to the ancient texts, the king eased the memories of the stonecutters through magic.{nl}It was done to ensure the security of the Royal Mausoleum. {nl}A precise memory erasure, isn't that incredible?
Being a Psychokino is something wonderful. I guarantee it!{nl}But first, I need your help on my research.
Could you gather Desmodus' Tail Pins in the Tenet Chapel B1?{nl}They break easily so, it's very hard to secure one.
Perfect. The tail pins are all fully intact.{nl}Study under me and you will see why this is amazing.

The power to trust yourself. Everlasting self-confidence.{nl}That is the most important thing in projecting your will unto the reality.{nl}It is the essence of being a Psychokino and the force that runs the world.
Sapper's skills, ay? Of course, the lesson fee is entailed.{nl}No, no, not to me. To the Cleric Master in Klaipeda. In the form of a donation.{nl}1,000 silver might be enough.
Have you forgotten about a proper amount of donation?{nl}Well... usually it's 1,000 silver.
Are you talking about the book written by Lydia Schaffen?{nl}I am wiling to give it to you for 1,000 silver.
I am deeply sorry to ask you to do this but...{nl}1,000 silver would it the bill.{nl}
1,000 silver... That's right.{nl}Here's the book as I promised.
The second book of Lydia Schaffen, you seek?{nl}1,000 silver would be the price.
I guess 1,000 silver would be enough.{nl}I heard it is the fair market price.
The book in my possession? You want it?{nl}Well, okay. For 1,000 silver I am willing to part ways with it.
Around 1,000 silver would be enough.{nl}You can pay it for me, right?
The most important thing for a true Priest is to trust the goddesses and prove it to them.{nl}Please exorcise the evil spirit from a soldier in the name of the goddesses.
Well done. I think I have gathered enough material.{nl}Now that the urgent research has been concluded. {nl}Let's resume our training, shall we?
The reality bending at my will. Actualizing it through thoughts alone...{nl}The intensity depends on how much you believe in yourself.{nl}
Such is the power.{nl}If you help me on this, I will help you bring out your true potential.
Please bring me the essences of Minotaur and Chapparition from Gate Route.{nl}Okay... I am counting on you.
That's what exactly I needed! {nl}Look at it, it's dripping with maliciousness.{nl}
Now, fasten your seatbelt, you are about to witness the real Psychokino!{nl}{nl}
I said that it can be obtained from Sirdgela Forest.{nl}The place where even the ever-famous Rodelero Submaster's army ran away from.
Often times, the cruel fate leads to the dark future.{nl}May the goddesses protect you on your journey as a Bokor...
Cataphract. {nl}I'm not sure if that role fits you.
I like your guts.{nl}Do me a favor, and prove yourself by defeating Sparnasman in Vieta Gorge.
Impressive. {nl}What you have shown me proves that you will not have difficulties in learning my skills.{nl}Ah, I apologize about underestimating you earlier.
Concentrate your firepower into one spot and penetrate your foe. Then... Kaboom!{nl}You are not ready yet at this moment though, so I will take mere defeating the enemy as a hit.
We Wugushi's do not hesitate to use poison.{nl}
We will first show you how to fight. We will use bows, blowguns, whatever is available.
Rodelero Submaster
You are so determined unlike other people nowadays.{nl}You can come to learn from me anytime you want.
It's a monster called Moa. {nl}It ran away to Leipsna Chapel Site.{nl}
If our mission goes as planned, then we will have no need to meet again. {nl}Well, it sounds like it would be unpleasant to meet you again, haha.
The stream mentioned in the revelation starts at above the Veja Ravine. {nl}Well then, may the blessings of the goddesses be with you.
Will this world be peaceful when we meet again? I hope it will.
It's all my fault.{nl}Schmid is dead... what can I do alone...
There are two ways to connect with the goddesses. {nl}An ardent belief for her, and the sound of silver dropping into her offering box. {nl}Just those two.
I am relieved to hear that my friend was able to go back safely.{nl}I was worried because of the stories that Molich is wandering around.
Did you hear about the Revelator who stopped the Demon Queen at the Tenet Church?{nl}
It would have been better if she was killed for good, but she is the Demon Queen after all... {nl}Someone that even the Paladin Master wasn't able to defeat. {nl}That is awesome enough.
The Vubbes suddenly rushed out of the mines. {nl}I have no idea what's going on. Do you have anything that comes to mind?
We won't know if the Revelators really dreamed of the goddess. {nl}It could even be a trick of the demons. {nl}
But didn't someone among them save the Tenet Church? Even from the Demon Lord.
It's a relief a Revelator drove away the Demon Lord from the mines. {nl}I was scared that another Medzio Diena would happen again.{nl}
But I felt something warm... Was it just my delusion? {nl}It was a pure and good energy.
I made it through the wild monsters and you made through the Thorn Forest. {nl}I'm sure you're not looking for the goddess... So what's the matter?
I heard the historians were attacked by the Demon Lord at King's Plateau. {nl}So it means the disaster was forewarned a thousand years ago? {nl}
Anyway, it's a relief the Revelator was able to stop it.
In between this Gorge Area and Klaipeda is the Thorn Forest that is full of evil energy. {nl}It was just a normal and peaceful forest before but...{nl}
You making it through the forest... Does it mean the forest is now purified?
There is still so much left undiscovered about the Great King Zachariel.{nl}But since the demons live longer than us... This must have been what they were preying at. {nl}
I don't know who it is but it's a good thing the Revelator stopped it. {nl}We might even have had another Medzio Diena.
Now the demons even bear the face of a human. {nl}I heard some Revelator stopped the Demon Lord in the Royal Mausoleum,{nl}but I wonder how many demons are now hiding amongst humans.
The weight of history feels astoundingly heavy when you stand in this place. {nl}Maybe you can find a clue about Medzio Diena here.
I keep thinking that Medzio Diena might have just been a process.{nl}If not, then why would the demons go after a mausoleum that is over a thousand years old? {nl}
It's a good thing some Revelator stopped it.
Hergasercle was an incarnation of obsession. {nl}The chain of obsession was broken thanks to the Revelator,{nl}but its soul is not something that can be saved.
So the Tzedej Altar has been attacked too?{nl}Regardless, we will still have a chance if we protect the other altars.
This map is useless to me now, without my colleague.{nl}Please pray that my colleague goes to the goddess safely.
Tools for stonemasons? {nl}That'll be 3,000 silver.
Our family has been waiting for your appearance for a long time.{nl}A very long time, indeed... {nl}Now, this is the moment of fulfilling our family's duty, destiny and desire.{nl}
This old withered man has no regrets left on this earthly plane {nl}and is eager to return into the arms of the goddess.{nl}Please, hurry and light the signal at the top with this igniter.
Yep. That's Canyon Apynys, alright.{nl}I am worried about the side effects, but I hope they go away soon.
The bleeding has stopped, but my body feels numb.{nl}Can you defeat the monsters nearby so I can return safely?
In order for these people to safely return to the village,{nl}we have to defeat these monsters.
The last call stopped at the Crystal Mine.{nl}The brother should be safe... I am so worried.
How can I say that this object is more important than a person.{nl}This is all due to the blessing of the goddess that our brother is safe.{nl}
Eliminate the bats in Crystal Mine 1F and bring their wings as a proof.
I welcome you with our family's courtesy.{nl}I trust Jonas has told you the details.{nl}
You also need to possess courage and wisdom to release the seal. {nl}Perhaps, the Great King sought the proof of one's worthiness.{nl}
Zachariel's Royal Mausoleum contains the secrets of Medzio Diena. {nl}We already have most of the answers.{nl}

But the remaining questions were the hardest ones. {nl}Ordinary historians like us have no way to solve them.{nl}While we were in aporia, we discovered that the help of a Revelator is needed to progress.{nl}
I am aware of your reputation as a Revelator.{nl}Especially, the secret of the Royal Mausoleum should not be revealed to the public..{nl}
If the secret of the Royal Mausoleum will bring destruction on land, concealing it is a must.{nl}That is why we seek your help.
As I expected, this ordeal can only be passed to the Revelator.{nl} So that's it... it was prepared by the owner of the Royal Mausoleum after all.{nl}
Great King Zachariel built this mausoleum to hide the secret.{nl}Peculiar, isn't it? A huge construct like this is far from inconspicuous...
Well, it's no big issue.{nl}Everything has a reason for it.{nl}
The Royal Mausoleum must contain a secret bigger than we could possibly imagine.{nl}The next epitaph is at Serno Highland. Let's go.
As Laulas' injuries are severe, I'm here in his stead.{nl}The seal is released, what exactly happened here?{nl}

Anyhow, the altars here are one of the{nl}Royal Mausoleum's various defenses built to ward off intruders.{nl} Despite being built a long time ago, they have never been reactivated as no one knew the way to do so.
The seal at Rukas Plateau could be the answer.{nl}The altar won't function if it gets destroyed, but if we can activate it before then.{nl}
Although I don't know what Rexipher is trying to do.{nl}It sure can prevent him from doing it.
He is the traitor of the Kadumel Era and the owner of the Fortress of the Land.{nl}He was branded as the best swordsman even when he was young, {nl}and he had many people following him.
Are you hurt?{nl}I heard the sound of Honeypin's webs, but I am relieved to see you are okay.
Trusting Laima's words, I have been fighting the Demon Lord Bramble, {nl}who tried to take over the revelation. {nl}I have fought with it night and day to be able to hand the revelation to you. {nl}
All of this was because of our pride...{nl}For we did not listen to what Laima said, unfortunately...{nl}
But, ultimately, Medzio Diena, that the demons caused broke the balance of power.{nl}The goddesses lost most of their strength since that day.
You better escape as well.{nl}The place is full of demons.{nl}
Just moments ago, the demons were controlling the monsters in the Bastymosi Field.
I don't know how strong you are, for you to do such a dangerous thing...{nl}I am not moving an inch from this very spot. If you wanna go, go alone.{nl}
I have been chased from Delmore Castle by the demons.{nl}I refuse to be in the same situation ever again.
Thank you. Thank you so much.{nl}If I went under the demons' control, what could have happened to those poor souls...
The light bead you saw is actually... a human soul.{nl}No memory and will of its own. A soul in its purest form. An essence of a soul.{nl}
These must be those who have lived around here...{nl}Even if they all perished by the demons, it is very strange that they have become such pure souls.{nl}
There must be a tomb of an unknown soldier here somewhere...{nl}The will of the Guide Owl will help you find the fragments of the ruined Karolis Altar.
I should not have held my hopes up too high...{nl}Restoring the Karolis Altar was not enough to fully revive the forest.{nl}
The Altar of the Forest needs to be revived as well.{nl}
Ah, the Altar of the Forest is located near the pond across there.{nl}It spreads Karolis' lights throughout the forest.{nl}
The lights are almost all out...{nl}If you can reignite them, the power of the altar will spread out!
The tower that has been controlling the owls is filled with very malicous energy.{nl}Even you should not touch it without any precaution.{nl}
Now, use this power to blow the tower in Duokliu Hall to smithereens!
You certainly are being led by the goddess...{nl}I have that feeling.
You've destroyed the Mind Control Tower as well?{nl}Now, peace will finally return.{nl}
That's... that's a great relief.
Mardas is the one who escaped from Delmore Castle.{nl}The souls we have seen before must be from there as well.{nl}
I have no idea why such an atrocity has occurred in Delmore Castle...{nl}These souls, as I have told you previously, do not possess any memories and will of their own.{nl}
All that is left is the energy of a pure soul.{nl}This is definitely not an ordinary occurrence.{nl}
It seems some magical power is draining the life force out of living humans to extract souls...{nl}I have lived in this forest for many years but this is unheard of.{nl}
I have explained it to this man...{nl}The souls are being collected at Letas Stream and offered to the Divine Tree.{nl}The owls have sent the souls to that direction.{nl}
We have to at least stop them.{nl}But Letas Stream has fallen into the hands of the demons.{nl}
Could we ask you to help us a bit longer?{nl}You are our only hope....
Karolis Cradle is a spot enriched with the energy of the forest.{nl}Stand there and the energy will come to you.{nl}
As the energy concentration increases, it gets condensed and crystalized.{nl}Take the crystalized energy to the Guide Owl.
Ugh... What happened... Who are you?{nl}Did you save me?{nl}
You have my utmost gratitude.{nl}Right before I lost consciousness, I saw the image of a goddess, it must have been you...
Wha...? You already had it on you?{nl}That is great news. Bring it to the upper side of Atmesti Uphill and sprinkle the energy around.{nl}
I believe that utilizing the malicious force of the monsters would be a good idea. {nl}Use it on monsters to purify their energies and absorb them.
By talking with the Chief Owl Sculpture, I got the feeling we could work this out.{nl}The demons are using the evil energy to corrupt Letas Stream and to trap souls.{nl}
You will find the evil energy concentrated on Svaigulys Hill.{nl}Set up the Namott of Suppression around it to remove the evil energy.
Our priority is stopping the spot where the energy of the forest is getting drained.{nl}The spot is at Senyvas Yard.
The Surveillance Spheres are guarding Senyvas Yard, {nl}but without the Black Spirit, the demons' installation will weaken. {nl}Approaching it won't be easy.{nl}

It's rather risky but... I want you to infiltrate the place without getting {nl}detected by the Surveillance Spheres spinning around the Surveillance Eyes.{nl}At the end of the path, there is a magic circle managing those eyes.{nl}
If the magic circle is disabled, the Surveilance Spheres might be disabled with it as well.
The Black Spirit can be removed with the Namott of Suppression, {nl}if we can deal with the Surveilance Spheres. Be careful. {nl}This mission is very dangerous.
The Soul Starvation is on the lower side of Apsvaiges Path.{nl}
The evil energy has weakened and the Black Smoke is gone.{nl}The demons, if they are not completely stupid, will notice these changes and come after us.{nl}Please, hurry up.
Is that so... The souls are free now.{nl}The Owl Chief promised to guide the souls to their rightful place, into the arms of the goddess.{nl}
How can we ever repay you...{nl}
Accessory Merchant Jurus
This letter is... left by Eras.{nl}
This is the first time since ages ago that I have heard from him... {nl}But now he has gone into the arms of the goddess...{nl}Fate is so cruel and gruesome to bear.{nl}
Thank you for delivering this letter to me.{nl}At least, now I know what had happened to him.
So, you want to learn new magic, eh?{nl}But I need to be certain that you are prepared for it.{nl}
Without a firm foundation, learning is, naturally, very difficult.{nl}So, there's going to be a test.
I like your attitude. I have a mission for you. {nl}Go into the Woods of the Linked Bridges and defeat some monsters.{nl}
That's quite simple, no? If you are unable to do this simple task, then I see no future between us.
Here is your mission: Go into the Woods of the Linked Bridges and defeat some monsters.{nl}That's quite simple, no? If you are unable to do this simple task, then I see no future between us.
Hmm, not bad. Not bad at all.{nl}You seem to have what it takes.{nl}
Now, pay attention to what I am about to demonstrate.{nl}How you use it alongside your current magic is up to you.
You want to become a Pyromancer?{nl}Kid, let me tell you something. Not everyone can become a Pyromancer.{nl}
Let's just say, you need to make friends with fire and its heat.{nl}I ain't all that convinced yet. But I will give you a chance to prove yourself.
Good. Now, I want you to kill some monsters while under the magic I will put on you.{nl}
This magic will determine whether the spell you use is compatible with fire.{nl}Understood?
If you are not compatible with fire, considering other paths is a viable option.{nl}There is no such thing as lukewarm flame.
Oh my, you do have a knack. I am a bit surprised...?{nl}Well, a promise is a promise. I will teach ya.{nl}
Whether you can follow it through or not is entirely up to ya. Got that?
We, Cryomancers, always welcome newcomers. {nl}Like you.{nl}
However, accepting all participants will only prove itself detrimental to all of us.{nl}It is for the best if we conduct a simple test to determine your aptitude {nl}in becoming a Cryomancer.
Here, inject your spell into this Piece of Ice.{nl}If you do not possess the necessary talent you require, the ice will melt.{nl}
As you defeat monsters, your spell will be injected into this Piece of Ice.{nl}The instruction has been completed. Return to me when the result is successful.
There was one testee who melted the Piece of Ice from the instant it touched.{nl}To be honest... that is a feat in itself.
That is sufficient.{nl}I will grant you the teachings of Cryomancy.
You really must be enjoying your life as an Archer if you're here to see me.{nl}Now, let's begin the test, shall we? Without seeing your power, we cannot be sure of anything.
You are trustworthy.{nl}Obviously, an Archer should be able to hit a target from a distance.{nl}
It doesn't matter what kind of a monster it is.{nl}As long as you hit your targets from as far away as possible.{nl}
If you are either too close to the target or the target dodges your attack, it doesn't count.{nl}Got that?
Do you see that bug over there? Can you hit one of its legs?{nl}The master in Klaipeda hit the bullseye blindfolded.
You are better than I thought.{nl}I won't disappoint you in my training.
I will be the first one to admit that I have no patience whatsoever. {nl}Defeating an enemy one by one is just not my style.{nl}I prefer attacking all of them at once.{nl}
That's one of the reasons why I like being a Ranger. What about you?{nl}If you are a scaredy-cat, if the number is not in your favor, {nl}you better give up now and save both of our time.
Let me see if you can walk the talk.{nl}But perhaps, facing off multiple enemies might be difficult yet.{nl}
The next best thing to simultaneous combat is consecutive combat...{nl}Defeat one enemy and quickly attack the other. {nl}I want to see how much you can shorten that interval.
Hesitating just once... and the enemies get close enough to kiss you.{nl}You don't want to get surrounded by enemies, do you?
Impressive.{nl}I have seen so many malfunctioning nitwits who could not walk the talk...{nl}
Having a student like you is always a pleasure.{nl}Now, let's see. What should I teach you first?
I do not refuse the ones who are ambitious.{nl}Nevertheless, there is a prerequisite you must have.{nl}
A well-loved piece of gear...{nl}That is the most important thing for all classes to be honest.
I'm glad you agree.{nl}Now, show me a Lv +1 enhanced crossbow.
A crossbow and a Quarrel Shooter go hand in hand.{nl}I will just take a look at it.
A charming crossbow, I must say. {nl}Alright, I must acknowledge your way of maintaining your weapon.{nl}
Learning itself is not too difficult so come to me any time.
The time has come for you to learn the advanced magic of Wizards.{nl}You cannot learn new magic all by yourself.{nl}
Sometimes, the answer comes much quicker, if you ask around for advice.
Some might say: "Too many cooks spoil the broth." {nl}You can't have too many advice.{nl}
Did it help?{nl}Hmm, your enlightened eyes tells me yes.{nl}
All good. {nl}I will help you as far as I can. Hope you could do the same.
At this stage, what you need to do is to improve your fire energy.{nl}For me, it's nothing at all but for you, some help would be necessary.{nl}
Can't say it will be easy. {nl}Are you able to do it?
That go-getter attitude is the sign of a good Pyromancer.{nl}Alright, take this Condensed Firestone.{nl}
Set it up near monsters and defeat them. Your fire energy infused with spell will be improved.
Improving your magic is the most important thing, here, {nl}so it doesn't matter what monsters you slay.{nl}But this test would be more worthwhile if you fight the monsters your level, wouldn't it?
Well done. {nl}I can sense your fire energy is much stronger than before.{nl}
If you practice what I am about to teach ya...{nl}You can soon reach the top!
If new magic is what you are looking for.{nl}Your current state indicates that you need to {nl}acquire more experiences handling the cold energy.{nl}
Stronger magic awaits you but...{nl}Whether you can handle it is an entirely differnet matter.{nl}
I do find your attitude quite optimal.{nl}I conjecture that Frost Tome will serve you well.{nl}

The ice resistance of the monsters increases with the power of that tome, defeat them.{nl}Colder than coldness itself... {nl}Only those who overcome such trial would have no trouble learning new magic.
This trial will only have a meaning when that tome is used to defeat monsters.
Your handling of the cold energy has improved.{nl}Optimal. Keep the previous combat in mind and observe my instruction carefully.
Hmm... so you want to become a Psychokino.{nl}A great idea, I must say. Truly a magnificent choice.{nl}
But not everyone can wield Psychokinesis.{nl}One must realize the innate power bestowed in you from the goddesses.{nl}
You probably have no idea what I am talking about, right?{nl}Well, that's because it needs to be felt rather than explained. {nl}Do you wish to take up on a challenge?
Now, you seem prepared.{nl}Here's the scroll containing the spell of the Psychokino.{nl}
At least, you will instantly obtain the taste of the magic we use.
Use the scroll to feel the power inside you.{nl}Even just feeling it will make the learning much easier.
Good, now did you get the taste of what is it like?{nl}We call it the psychic power.{nl}
Enough with the theoretical learnings.{nl}Unto the practices of how to use psychic power.

Having strong spells is certainly important but for a Linker, {nl}one must be able to empathize with the others.{nl}Finding the line connecting my mind and that of the other and making it reality. {nl}That is the job of a Linker.{nl}
Was that far too complicated of an explanation?{nl}If so, let me give you a tip on a way to understand that... Are you up for it?
A Linker must be able to find the connection point for each mana that each every one of us has.{nl}If you find this task to daunting, the way of a Linker is not for you.{nl}
I believe that such epiphany will come to you naturally if you keep on fighting with monsters.{nl}Although you are not yet a Linker, you too might be able to sense the connection point.
Concentrate while battling monsters, you will see.{nl}All that is left is to hope that you have the talent.
Did you feel it?{nl}Then, the rest is easy. {nl}
Come back to me whenever you want to learn the Linker's magic.
When you first came to Orsha, I had my doubts about you...{nl}But look at you now. Your tales of valour have spread out!{nl}
This is a final test.{nl}Let me test on how much you understand the path of the Archer.{nl}
Although an Archer will not be defeated by anyone but, {nl}some enemies that can be tougher to beat. The flying cloth-type ones.{nl}
Now, you know what to do, right?
This is the Archer's Test Orb.{nl}It will record whether you have defeated ones properly.
I hope you are not lost, even with all those hints I have given you.{nl}This is all part of the test.
How was it?{nl}Wasn't it easier than usual?{nl}
No theory is left to teach you.{nl}The rest is practice! Even at the top, do not forget the basics.
I am participating in those efforts myself as well.{nl}A Ranger is there to help those who are in danger.{nl}
A part test, a part volunteer work. I want you to help the effort to restore Orsha, you up for it?{nl}A Ranger is there to help those who are in danger.
The most urgent matter at hand is that we need the stone materials for rebuilding the wall.{nl}In Koru Jungle, you might find the appropriate stone.
The roots really did a number on the wall.{nl}Not to mention the time I had to stop the Pyromancer Submaster from burning them all down...{nl}
Woah, now you did diligently. {nl}It would do a lot of good.{nl}
I am a bit busy but a promise is a promise. I will teach you the new skills.{nl}Learn well and practice as often as possible.
You seem to be ready to learn new skills.{nl}But at the moment, there is a lot on my plate... {nl}
Help me on this and then I might be able to help you back.{nl}How about that? Help me rebuild Orsha. It will be worthwhile.
It seems there is a shortage of materials.{nl}Especially, the adhesive to hold the bricks tight.{nl}
Defeat Plant-type monsters and obtain the sticky liquid from them.{nl}A stronger monster is the stronger fluid it yields.
Everyone is on the effort to rebuild Orsha, our home.{nl}On that fateful Medzio Diena, we all thought the world would end... {nl}But there are some things that even such catastrophe cannot break.
You came back earlier than I expected.{nl}All good. Everything seems to be getting into its rightful place.{nl}
Nice to meet you. {nl}You must be the new applicant for becoming a Sapper?{nl}
The ideal Sapper is the one who is always cautious.{nl}The one who flawedly sets up traps can ruin the flow of the battlefield.{nl}
I am a Sapper and a soldier. I detest jokey attitude.{nl}I will see how serious you work on the mission, {nl}and I will determine whether you can be in or out.
I am currently researching and developing a new kind of trap.{nl}It is going to be something completely different from all the previous traps.{nl}
Go to Koru Jungle and find me some Sturdy Research Stones.{nl}If you take this mission seriously, you will not bring stone that crumble upon a mere touch.
It doesn't matter how strong you are, if you have an inappropriate attitude, {nl}You are out. Understood? {nl}One wrongfully set up trap can cause irreparable damage to the rest of the team.
Hm. You've passed the test.{nl}I must warn you my training is harsh and strict. Only concentrating through is the only way.
A Hunter, eh? I take it that you're good with a bow and arrow?{nl}If it were all up to me, I would take everyone in but if I did that, think of all the shenanigans.{nl}
So let me test you on your worthiness to become one of my students.
A Hunter needs to be able to enjoy the danger and the thrill it entails.{nl}For example... Ah, yes, like inside a dungeon.{nl}
It doesn't matter which monster in a dungeon.{nl}What's important is to keep calm in a dangerous situation. {nl}If then, I will acknowledge you.{nl}
Hmm... I think the Ashaq Underground Prison or the Novaha Monastery would be too easy.{nl}The more danger there lurks, there higher your score will be.
Well, you got it.{nl}Good. I think, you've proven your worth.
Welcome back. {nl}I think, it is a high time you go through a trial by fire.{nl}
If you can pass this trial, you can be recognized as a true Pyromancer.{nl}It won't be easy, but you wanna try it?
Right, for your trial, you must combat the ones that are {nl}most familiar to us and yet most pestersome to deal with...{nl}Of course, I am talking about fire property monsters.{nl}
It doesn't matter which type.{nl}Godspeed.
In order to fend off fire property monsters, you must strike them down with greater force.{nl}Or you must utilize other properties of magic.
I knew you could do it.{nl}Now, this would be our last training, so listening up.
I have taught numerous Cryomancers...{nl}But no one achieved your current state as fast as you did.{nl}
Now, this is your final test.{nl}A trial by cold, the ultimate test.
Knowing thyself and the enemy is the most important.{nl}A trial by cold is to defeat a ice property monster.{nl}
That is what it takes to be on the top of all the other Cryomancers.
You didn't think it would be that easy to reach the top, did you?
Now, that is a slice of fried gold. {nl}You've exceeded my expectation.{nl}
I will guide you to...{nl}The top of Cryomancy.
Being a Psychokino requires you to evaluate situations precisely.{nl}Gaining the position of advantage will certainly help you in combat.{nl}
That is up to you to realize it. Only then will you be able to learn more advanced magic.{nl}Show me what you got, if you can take it.
This is the Spell Detector Orb.{nl}The range is bit short, but it can detect spells around it.{nl}
Defeat monsters within the range of the Spell Detector Orb.{nl}It will probably take you some calculations to find the right spot.
Just like real estate, the most important thing is location, location and location, {nl}so the type, level or property of the monster don't matter.
Hmm... better than I expected.{nl}Keep up the good work.
A Linker. A Linker is the one who connects one's mana with other's mana...{nl}That is what makes us so special.{nl}
However, if you go beyond the mana and connect the soul itself. {nl}You could reach a new unknown territory.{nl}If you want to expand the Linker's horizon, please, help me on my research.{nl}
Fill this Soul Flask with spiritual powers.{nl}Defeat the monsters and the spiritual powers will absorb into the flask.
If this research is successful, all the Linkers will benefit from it.{nl}
Now, that's a full flask.{nl}Thank you very much, it's only fitting that I have to repay you for this.
You will learn new magic from this point on.{nl}Please, follow my instructions attentively like always.
Do you seek the way to become a Thaumaturge?{nl}Hm, we, Thaumaturges, wield the magic to transform the types and properties of entities.{nl}
What is the most important is a keen eye to read the flow of combat.{nl}For you to know how to lead the situation in your favor.{nl}
Enough talking. Let's get to the practical lessons.{nl}Theoretical learning is quite boring for my taste.
A Thaumaturge's magic has one that can change size of entities.{nl}Whether it's an ally or an enemy, it doesn't matter.{nl}
So, in order to learn how to curve the combat situation into your favor.{nl}Try facing off with monsters of varying sizes.{nl}
Defeat small, medium and large-sized monsters.{nl}It will be a valuable experience for you.
If you cannot pull it through, you better find another way.{nl}I don't have to tell you the basics of combat from the start, do I?
How was it? {nl}Did you learn something from it?{nl}
Alright, now I have to acknowledge you. {nl}You do have what it takes to learn new magic from the Thaumaturge.
Looking at your stance, it exudes the way of a veteran.{nl}But is it just a stance or do you have the substance?{nl}
Incidentally, there is an appropriate opponent right there.
I heard that there is a Necroventer in Carlyle's Mausoleum.{nl}As a Ranger, we cannot allow such danger to roam freely.{nl}
Defeat the Necroventer and prove your worth.
Good attitude, good confidence.{nl}All you need is good skills.
Impressive.{nl}When did you get this far?{nl}
The skills I am about to teach you are quite complex but for you, {nl}learning them wouldn't be a problem.{nl}No matter what happens down the road, always remember your first step. {nl}Promise?
If I had to point out one, among many, things that we, {nl}Quarrel Shooters are better than other archers is... The way we handle shields.{nl}
No one can deny we engage in combat with more safety.{nl}
Your future journey will lead you to very dangerous places.{nl}Show me a strong sturdy shield and I will help you become a powerful Quarrel Shooter.
A shield upgraded to level 5 would suffice.{nl}Don't worry, I will give it back to you after I am done checking.
When you think of a Quarrel Shooter, you will immediately {nl}think of hiding behind a shield firing with a crossbow.{nl}Utilizing your surroundings is a plus.
You want to learn more Sapper skills? Now that's an attitude I like.{nl}Just like last time, help me on the research to improve the skills of the Sapper.{nl}
As a reward, I will teach you the new skills of a Sapper.
I am currently devising a bomb with a better 'boom'! If you know what I mean...{nl}I heard that the Gun Powder on the Delmore Outskirts is the finest.{nl}

Here's a caveat. The rumor has it that the villagers on the Delmore Outskirts {nl}all have left and the place is now occupied by the monsters.{nl}Defeat the monsters and retrieve the gun powder for me, please.
But isn't that strange?{nl}If the villagers have left the place, where did they left for?
This is enough.{nl}I hope it will work this time.{nl}
Let's see about that. We still got time... {nl}Before I conduct the experiment, shall we get to your training?
I've prepared a test for hunters like you.{nl}It's a simple retrieval mission. What do you say?
I've hidden a Hunter's Test Mark at Delmore Hamlet, Manor, and Outskirts respectively.{nl}I've put them in chests so try to find them before anyone else takes them.
The people of Delmore Castle are generous in their reception.{nl}It's been a while since I've been there, so I might want to go there again soon.
You've found all of them.{nl}But it's only full of monsters... I guess they've finally decided to follow the migration orders?{nl}
Well, let's think about that a bit later.{nl}Now. How much have you learned again?
I'm glad that you wish to become a Wugushi.{nl}It is a nice feeling to know that you have new colleagues.{nl}
Using poison is a given as a Wugushi.{nl}But since you don't yet know how to craft poisons yet, I'll teach you how to use existing poisons.
Good question. I think Wugushi Poison would be appropriate for you to try to obtain.{nl}Here, I'll give you a Wugushi Poison Bottle.{nl}
The monsters at Carlyle's Mausoleum should be soaked in Wugushi Poison.{nl}All you have to do is to gather some poison from the monsters there.
What's Wugushi Poison?{nl}It's poison that gathers in dead bodies.{nl}
It's a bit unpleasant I know, but it's suitable for beginners.
You must always be careful when handling poison.{nl}You can hurt yourself, you know.{nl}
Now how about I teach you a bit about Wugushi techniques {nl}since you've successfully gathered the Wugushi Poison?
We Scouts use specialized skills that allow us to {nl}reconnoiter enemies without them knowing about it.{nl}That's why being extremely agile is important.{nl}
Now let's see... How good is our volunteer?{nl}Tell me when you're prepared.
Good. {nl}Keep attacking without getting hit once by enemy attacks.{nl}
I'll start counting from the very beginning if you get hit even once.
Is it too hard?{nl}One possible solution is to defeat them before they can reach you.
It looked as if there wasn't even enough time for a speck of dust to fall on your shoulders.{nl}You seem to be quite nimble.{nl}
I'm sure you'll be able to learn Scout skills with ease.{nl}I'm happy to be able to teach such a gifted pupil as well.
Ah, I know about that as well.{nl}It's famous you know, the Owl Sculpture...{nl}
When people die, their spirits are left behind you know.{nl}It's said that the Owl Sculpture leads them back to the goddesses.{nl}
My grandmother told me that a sculptor crafted it on the orders of Goddess Ausrine.{nl}She said that he received eternal life in return.{nl}
I heard that he's still making those Owl Sculptures...{nl}I don't know why that sculpture is like that since{nl}it was most likely crafted by the same sculptor.
Oh, good morning. It seems you've finally woken up.{nl}I've heard that they're making preparations to process people to enter Orsha.
I've received a lot of help from you on the way here.{nl}You've even saved me when I was surrounded by monsters...{nl}
In times like these with all the goddesses gone, the villagers are all grateful for your help.{nl}I guess today will be the last of that though.{nl}
Anyway, how are your dreams?{nl}You've been suffering from nightmares for a while...{nl}
You've had them last night as well? Oh that's... not good.{nl}How about getting some consultation in Orsha since we'll be there soon?{nl}
I'm a bit worried since there are so many people from other villages coming to Orsha.{nl}I don't know how many migration orders they have issued...{nl}
If you're bored of just waiting around, try asking Mayor Romanas about whats going on.{nl}He said that he's going to meet the lord of Orsha soon.{nl}
Greetings. I'm the Swordsman Submaster.{nl}Do you know how attribute training works?{nl}
Attributes can assign additional abilities to stats and skills.{nl}You can learn attributes by paying silver to each respective master.
You'll be able to fare better in combat if you learn attributes.
Welcome. I'm the Wizard Submaster.{nl}I've been waiting to teach you about attribute training.{nl}
Attributes can assign additional abilities to stats and skills.{nl}You can learn attributes by paying silver to each respective master.
Do you understand how attributes work?{nl}You'll now be able to deal with enemies more easily.
Hello. I am the Archer Submaster.{nl}Do you happen to know anything about attribute training?{nl}
Attributes can assign additional abilities to stats and skills.{nl}You can learn attributes by paying silver to each respective master.
Did you get the hang of how attributes work?{nl}You can have combat go your way by using the right attributes.
I see that a follower of the goddesses has come to see me.{nl}Greetings, I am the Cleric Submaster.{nl}Do you know anything of attribute training?{nl}
Attributes can assign additional abilities to stats and skills.{nl}You can learn attributes by paying silver to each respective master.
Do you understand how attributes work?{nl}You will be able to handle enemies with ease if you learn attributes.
Oh yes, Accessory Merchant Ronesa said that she had a present that she really wants to give you.{nl}Why don't you stop by?
You can get there by going straight left of here.
Greetings! {nl}You're the Revelator that's been dreaming about the goddesses, right?{nl}
You can meet Ronesa by going straight left from here.{nl}
You'll be able to collect poison by putting pots where the monsters are.{nl}Bring it back when you've gathered enough.
That was the last of the magic circles in this farm.{nl}Now we'll have to pray that Horacius is successful as well.
Goddesses, humans, and Demon Goddesses...{nl}What is your number?{nl}
If you're heading south, you can help Merrisa or Margellius.{nl}Even for a veteran, the monsters in this neighborhood are something else.
Will you put up this bulletin board on Kluibe Road, then?{nl}Merrisa is looking for holy relics, you see.{nl}
Merrisa
Ink made from Infroburk's body fluid is best because it lasts longer.{nl}I'm going to give you a trap; you collect the Infroburk body fluid.
Just place the trap in front of an Infroburk.{nl}When it steps on it and gets caught, you'll be able to collect its body fluid.{nl}
Go to the Drose Empty Lot and set up the trap
Alina... Grazina...{nl}Please let them be safe...
They're my research records, but the Ticens took off with them.{nl}I'm going out of my mind trying to figure out what's missing.{nl}
Oh, by the way, I'll send out a flare in case there's danger.{nl}It's all I can do.
It was a bit weird.{nl}They were just standing around, then they saw a type of leather and tore it to pieces.{nl}It was really thick and they tore it with their bare hands.{nl}
So this is a person I don't know and they can't come here?{nl}You expect me to believe that?
Do the people of the Nestospa know about Albinas?{nl}I would have thought they would come here right away...{nl}
Will you thank the people of the Nestospa for me?{nl}I hope we can put our differences aside and look for a solution together.
Will you tell Damijonas about it, too?{nl}They're likely still at Usas Hill looking after the new gravestone.
Hey!{nl}Stop wandering around and run!{nl}
Oh no... There's no time to tell everyone in Orsha...{nl}If I don't do anything the demons are going to get my colleagues... What do I do...?
Even if I want to ask for help in Orsha, but it's too far!{nl}Please, save my colleagues.
Thank you so much for saving me!{nl}I came back to the village and all I saw were demons, I was wondering what happened...{nl}
What?{nl}You mean the demons came?{nl}
I don't want to put someone I just met in such danger...{nl}But you're my only hope. Please, do this for me.{nl}
They're hiding in the Herb Gatherers' Cabin.{nl}I don't know when the demons will find them.
Our hometown is in an inner area of Knidos Jungle.{nl}We're traveling merchants. We sell items all across the kingdom.{nl}
I was in a village to the north of Orsha when I heard about the migration order.{nl}I was worried about my hometown so I came back.{nl}
But the village is completely empty.{nl}And there's no word about the migration order in brother's letters either.{nl}
I wondered if he had at least left a note out here...{nl}But when we were looking through the village the demons attacked and I ran all the way here.{nl}
I'm worried for the village, but also for my colleagues who had to split up earlier.{nl}We've never been in danger like this before...
Will you really help me out?{nl}
To be able to receive the help of someone as talented as you...{nl}It's clear the goddesses still haven't left us.{nl}
Laswi can easily find out where my people are.{nl}But right now Laswi looks too tired.{nl}
If only we had a Stamina pill or...{nl}You wouldn't happen to have one, would you?
I started working as a merchant because I was curious about the world outside the village. {nl}My brother, of course, thought it was too dangerous and didn't want to let me.
In the end I was more stubborn than him and he accepted.{nl}As long as I kept writing letters to him, that is.{nl}
I always write down my next destination in my letters so my brother knows where to send his.{nl}He usually writes to me about the village and the workings of the world.{nl}
But he didn't write anything about going to Orsha in his last letter...{nl}I wonder what happened.
Oh, thank you.{nl}I'll give it to Laswi.
I was worried about giving Laswi the pill, but I think it'll be fine.{nl}Fortunately, Laswi seems to feel better now.
There are four colleagues out there.{nl}Have Laswi smell their clothes and lead you to where they are hiding.{nl}
If Laswi loses the scent, have her smell the clothes again.{nl}Laswi is a smart dog, I'm sure you'll be able to find my colleagues.
I hope they're fine.{nl}Even small monsters are a worry, let alone demons...
Traveling Merchant Cassius
Laswi! You're alive!{nl}Phew... I thought it was a demon.{nl}
How come Laswi is with you, though?{nl}Did you happen to meet Laswi's owner?
Oh... Rose asked you to come find me...{nl}It seems she managed to stay safe, too.{nl}
Laswi always protected me from the demons...{nl}And now she found me all the way here, she's really one of a kind.{nl}
You said our people are at the Herb Gatherers' Cabin, right?{nl}I'm tired now. I'm going back to Orsha with them.{nl}
I'm worried about the people of Rose's village too, but what can we do?{nl}Migration order or not, they're probably heading to Orsha.
My colleagues are safe!{nl}I'm so glad to see them again; it's all thanks to you.{nl}
I wonder if I should go to Knidos Jungle by myself and look for my village's people now.{nl}I can't keep dragging my colleagues into something that concerns my hometown.{nl}
Thank you for rescuing my colleagues. I should go now... {nl}Please pray for me so I can find the people of my hometown.
Traveling Merchant Andres
How many times have I talked to her...{nl}
I understand that Rose is worried about her people.{nl}But they probably just left for Orsha because of the migration order, isn't it?{nl}
Because of all of this we ran into the demons and I lost my luggage.{nl}And all my expensive items were there... They were my only assets.{nl}
But I can't ask our group to go out and get it...{nl}The demons will be all over us if we so much as try to move. It's a tough call...
Are you serious? Wow, that's...{nl}As if saving my life wasn't enough, now you're saving my entire assets, too.{nl}
They're at the Doholle Rest Place.{nl}I was planning on going there to get them later.
I never felt so disheartened, not even during Medzio Diena.{nl}But it's my assets that are at stake here.
Yes, this is it! Thank you!{nl}It seems like the missing goddesses are back after all!
Traveling Merchant Gomez
Thank you for saving me earlier.{nl}It was the most terrorizing experience I'd had since Medzio Diena.{nl}
Now Rose wants to go and look for the people of her hometown.{nl}I wish I could help her too, but I freeze every time I see demons, {nl}so I don't think I can unfortunately.{nl}
For now I think I'll stay here with my colleagues and wait for Rose.{nl}I'm still worried about the demons and the monsters, though.
I really thought a demon had found me earlier, then I saw your face and, phew...{nl}I felt as if my prayers to the goddesses had been answered.
Oh? You really took care of it?{nl}What a relief to hear that. Thanks a lot.
It was really unexpected...{nl}We barely saw any monsters before, and now all of a sudden we have to deal with demons.{nl}
At least I survived, but the wounds feel strangely swollen and hot.{nl}Will you bring me some herbs? I'm hoping they'll ease the pain a little bit.
It's called Ronjia Grass, it looks a little different from the grass around it.{nl}I think there's some on the Nevaginga Hillside.
It's so painful, even though I barely touched it.{nl}What kind of demon...
You got it! Hand them over.{nl}They're probably a little bitter but I really need it.
This is... It looks serious.{nl}I mean, it's a wound caused by a demon, so I don't think it'll ever really heal.
Tales...? Oh, the one who always found me rare herbs.{nl}
You said the wounds are swollen, hot and discolored?{nl}If the Ronjia Grass doesn't work, then he must be affected by evil energy.
I think the Cleric Submaster in Orsha might be able to help.{nl}I once helped her get some herbs.{nl}
Tell her about my symptoms.{nl}My wounds are swollen, hot and now they're turning purple...
His condition is only expected to get worse with time.{nl}I'm going to give you some medicine to purify the evil energy in his body; please give it to Tales.
Give it him as soon as possible.{nl}The longer you wait, the more the evil energy will spread.
The medicine you brought seems to be working. {nl}My temperature should start to lower, too.{nl}
I thought I was about to return to the goddesses like this...{nl}You really saved my life.
Hm? I thought you'd left earlier...{nl}What are you doing here?{nl}
Ah... You were worried about me?{nl}Thank you. I don't think the demons have noticed me yet.{nl}I'll look somewhere else.
행상인 로제
I'm going back to the village and look through our house.{nl}If they're gone because of the migration order, my brother should've left a note.
Really?{nl}I can be trouble sometimes, but thank you for worrying about me.
Will you have a look around the village, then?{nl}I'm thinking there will be some clues left.
I was actually worried about coming alone, so thank you.{nl}Now if only we can find the people of my village.
It looks like... something bad has happened.{nl}
The inside of our house is a complete chaos and there's demon footprints everywhere.{nl}I couldn't find any notes either.{nl}
I wonder what could've happened.{nl}I've seen too many villages destroyed by demon attacks during my trips as a merchant, you know
What if... No. I'm worrying too much, aren't I?{nl}There would be at least some tombs left behind if that were the case, {nl}but there aren't any. Right?
Those beads, though... I saw them before, too...{nl}I wonder if they're from Anne's necklace.
That's odd. She would never drop her necklace...{nl}It's very precious to Anne, you see.
Still... The beads could be a clue to help us find where the villagers are.{nl}Anne is smart enough to have done something like that. She was always clever.
I wouldn't think much of it otherwise, but all the mess and the demon footprints...{nl}It's just bothering me.{nl}The only strange thing we've found so far are the beads from Anne's necklace...
Let's try and follow the trail of the beads.{nl}We need to try something, anything.
Let's try and follow the trail of the beads.{nl}Hopefully we can find something...
It looks like the beads end here.{nl}I don't see any more of them.
We can't give up.{nl}Maybe we're just not seeing the rest of the beads.{nl}They could've been kicked out of the way by monsters or...{nl}
Let's take a look around.{nl}I'm sure we're missing something here.
I feel so desperate I want to cry.{nl}Please let us find something, please...
Tess
Don't hurt me!
I'm saved! I'm finally saved...{nl}Oh... It was horrible...
Everyone in the village was taken.{nl}The demons said they were going to use a type of bracken to feed us to the Divine Tree.{nl}
Yes, the Divine Tree from four years ago!{nl}The one that spurted from under the ground and destroyed our cities on Medzio Diena...
I managed to escape, but everyone else was taken to the Novaha Monastery.
When the demons were taking us they suddenly stopped and a wizard appeared.{nl}I could tell for sure he was human... Oh, but that's not important.
The wizard approached us one by one and then he did some sort of strange ritual.{nl}
At first no one showed much of a reaction... {nl}But when it was Edmundas' turn, there was a light.{nl}Yes, Rose, your brother Edmundas.
The wizard had Edmundas taken somewhere separately.{nl}Then he started to threaten us, asking if he had any family...
I feel so sorry to Rose, but we were so afraid we had no choice.{nl}As soon as the wizard heard about Rose, he started saying some really scary things.
Was it Kru... Kruvina? He said it was completed...{nl}He said the giant bracken was almost ready and soon he would spread the spores of death.{nl}
He said all he needed was to find someone qualified to feed us to the Divine Tree.{nl}
I thought I needed to tell Orsha about this so I took the chance and ran away.{nl}I've been hiding from the demons here ever since.
What do I do? Edmundas, my brother... {nl}My brother was taken by the demons.
Orsha is too far from here!{nl}Please, help us save our people...
I saw something strange when I was picking herbs.{nl}There was a wizard... A human, no doubt. But he was giving orders to the demons.{nl}
Suddenly he saw me and I had to run as fast as I could.{nl}I'm scared and I want to go back to Orsha, {nl}but I can't bring myself to do it with all these demons around.
Fortunately it seems like Goss is fine.{nl}I hope he knows a way to open the door...
A few months ago, demons started to appear in Knidos Jungle.{nl}Many good herbs used to grow around here... Not so much anymore.
Thank you.{nl}I wonder, where could all the people of the Croa Village have gone?
Have you ever heard about demons picking herbs?{nl}I've been picking herbs for a long time but that was a first, even for me.
I'm tired of running from demons, too, but...{nl}As a herb gatherer myself I can't help but be curious.
If that's fine with you, will you pick some those herbs so I can see what they are?
I was hiding so I couldn't take a good look at them, but the leaves were small and thin.{nl}It's to right, at the Neneva Yard.
I saw a human-looking wizard give orders to the demons.{nl}Humans associating with demons...
I didn't recognize it before but...{nl}These are Aconites.{nl}
They're medicinal, but deadly when consumed in large doses.{nl}I wonder why they want this...
The demons may scare me, but as a herb gatherer I can't let this go.{nl}I think it's best to destroy all the Aconites.
Go and collect some Loktanun fluid.{nl}It's very acidic; it wil dry out the Aconites if you spray them with it.
The demons may be scary...{nl}But I won't let them get away with this.{nl}
Thank you.{nl}This should be enough.
It's a shame to waste all the Aconites, but there's no way the demons will put it to good use.{nl}You can go back to the Neneva Yard and spray the demon fluid all around.
This is the most I can do.{nl}You only need to spray a little to dry out the flowers.{nl}
This is all that wizard's fault.{nl}I saw him talking to those demons with my very own eyes.{nl}
Thank you for helping me.{nl}Now that the Aconites are gone, I hope they can't carry out whatever plan they had.
Have you ever seen such a big bracken?{nl}I know this area is known for it, but even for a local like me, it's a first.
Remember what Tess said earlier?{nl}About the giant bracken spreading out the spores of death...{nl}
This looks like what Tess was talking about.{nl}We need to think of a way to stop that wizard's plans.{nl}
The device set up next to the bracken... It could be an important key.{nl}I wonder if there's something like a lab around here.
I feel like I was too reckless coming out to rescue my brother and the villagers without a plan.{nl}I want to do something fast, but I'm afraid I'll end up making a mistake.
Did you find anything?{nl}
So there really is a laboratory.{nl}There could be more information about the device there.
Thank you for saving me.{nl}It seems all I do is receive your help...{nl}
I think that person is the wizard Tess was talking about.{nl}Someone qualified... Even if it's me they want, I can't just leave my people behind.
We still don't know what the red liquid inside the device is, so destroying it could be dangerous.{nl}Let me have a look at the journal you found in the laboratory.
Let's see...{nl}
It's not hard to turn off the device after all. {nl}Seems like all you need to do is remove the power sources, which are set up separately.
But we have to be careful.{nl}The journal says the power supply devices are protected by powerful freezing magic circles.
It doesn't say how to disable the magic circles.{nl}But we should be able to use monsters as bait, right?
We can probably lure them into the circles and quickly remove the power sources.
That red liquid inside the device, though... It makes me feel sick just looking at it.{nl}What could it be...?
Did you do it?{nl}
If the journal is correct, soon we won't have to worry about the giant bracken anymore.{nl}Let's go to the Novaha Monastery, then.
Security is too strict.{nl}The demons are guarding the entrance to the Novaha Monastery.{nl}
My brother and the villagers... They'll be safe, right?{nl}Please try not to make too much of a commotion.
You need to be as quiet as possible.{nl}
I'm sure my brother and the villagers are still safe since they have no use for them yet...{nl}But this could go very wrong if we're not careful.
Are you alright?{nl}Your skills are really incredible.{nl}
Let's go inside the Novaha Monastery, then.{nl}Please, let everyone be safe...
Herbalist Talas
Help!{nl}I was caught in a trap running away from the demons!{nl}
Please help me!{nl}I can't open the trap by myself...
Thank you. Fortunately my ankle isn't completely gone yet.{nl}If it weren't for you I would be in the hands of the demons.
I did see something odd before I escaped.{nl}The demons were adding herbs to a cauldron.{nl}
I had never seen demons use any herbs, but I'm sure whatever it is they're doing, it's evil.{nl}I was on my way to stop them when this happened...
Destroying the cauldrons won't be easy.{nl}They're protected by some sort of barrier.{nl}
Every time a barrier appeared I noticed a sort of glowing stone.{nl}I wonder if that's what we should target first.
Fearful people like me can tell that much. {nl}Those cauldrons are nothing but evil.{nl}
Thank you. This should be enough to repay you for the trap.{nl}Helping stop the demons makes me feel like I achieved something great.
Oh, I have one last favor to ask.{nl}We may have destroyed the cauldrons, but the materials remain. This could be a problem.
I believe it would be better to burn down the materials as well.{nl}They're at the Saloto Lowland. Make sure they're all gone.
I hear the demons aren't going to stop at simply existing.{nl}Are the goddesses missing the work of demons too, I wonder?
I'm relieved to hear that. Thank you.{nl}I ought to stop playing a hero and take care of myself now.
There are voices coming from the other side of this door.{nl}I think the villagers are locked inside here.{nl}
But the door isn't moving, even though there's no lock in sight.{nl}What do we do...?
If only we can get this door to open...
If it weren't for you and Rose...{nl}I would have been just another victim to the bracken.
Just when I thought we were over... you came and saved us.{nl}It seems the goddesses haven't abandoned me yet...
Croa Village Resident
Who are you?!{nl}Are you here to save us?{nl}
The way to open the door?{nl}You need to get to Goss, quick!
The demons took Goss to the Ankel Small Corridor!{nl}He knows how to open the door!
I think Goss knows how to open the door.{nl}We should be able to rescue the villagers now.
When the guards aren't looking, we need to go and free the villagers as fast as we can.
The Ankel Small Corridor... It's to the left.{nl}The first thing to do is rescue Goss, like the villagers said.
I'll head there first.{nl}Meet me at the Ankel Small Corridor.
The demons saw us.{nl}We should get out of here with the villagers now.
The demons are going to come for us.{nl}We need to get the villagers and run immediately.
I don't know but it looks complicated.{nl}Still, I think Goss will probably know a way.
If we can only open the door we can rescue the villagers...{nl}But the demons will notice us.
I noticed Rose was looking for her brother... Unfortunately I haven't seen him.{nl}I wonder if they didn't take him to the annex, where I was...
Thank you for saving me.{nl}Seeing you and Rose makes me feel like the missing goddesses are back among us.{nl}
A way to open the door... I will have to take a look at it myself.{nl}Meet me in front of the door.
Help me...{nl}I have no strength left in my body...
I... I don't want them to come for me anymore...{nl}I'm so afraid... Those things...
Hm... I couldn't see it from inside the room, but it's clear looking at it from the outside.{nl}The door has been tampered with.
This faint magic circle... It's made to react only to demons.{nl}It looks like you would have to prove that you're a demon in order to open the door.{nl}
Some Green Apparition Essences should suffice. {nl}Meanwhile I'll have a look at the circle.
A few days ago...{nl}The monastery was ambushed by demons and, unable to resist, I ended up in their hands.{nl}
After Medzio Diena, maintaining the monastery has been no easy task.{nl}Apart from me and few other brothers, there was no one left in the monastery, you see.{nl}
The demons kept every single one of us locked inside the annex.{nl}We didn't know the demons' demands or their reasoning; all we could do was pray.{nl}
A few brothers were dragged outside one by one... they never came back.{nl}When only three of us were left, the demons came for me and locked me in this Reading Room.{nl}
Then... they brought in people of the Croa Village.{nl}Just like before, they started to come for and take them one by one.
Just as my turn was coming... that's when you saved me.{nl}
Hey, you!{nl}Stop wandering around and run, quick!{nl}
There are demons here!
I couldn't possibly rescue my people all by myself, I even thought of escaping to Orsha...{nl}You really are something, huh?
I feel worthless for failing to protect the people of my village.{nl}I can only beg for the goddesses to forgive me...
We should have hired some soldiers. This is getting more and more difficult.
I think it'll be hard to move anywhere until our people recover.
I see you gathered plenty of essences, I can feel it all the way here.{nl}Good... I'm ready now, too.
I understand that Rose is worried, but...{nl}If things go wrong we can lose our lives before we even see the villagers, {nl}let alone our possessions.
I think the door should be easy to open.{nl}It could take quite some time, however...
Not to mention all the demons walking around since you went and collected the essence. {nl}They'll surely notice what I'm doing. Just protect me while I try and open the door.
I got it!{nl}This is... phew... a huge relief.{nl}
I noticed Rose was looking for her brother... Unfortunately I haven't seen him.{nl}I wonder if he wasn't taken to the Annex, where I was...
I wish I could go and help you... I'm sorry. {nl}Injured as I am I would be a burden to you, and there's people in need of care here.
I'll pray to the goddesses that Rose may find her brother.{nl}And may you receive their blessing...
You're saying my brother could be at the Novaha Annex?{nl}Why would they take him alone...?{nl}
We need to make sure the villagers escape first.{nl}My brother will be fine... I'm sure...{nl}
It looks like the demon barrier is a little loose now.{nl}It feels odd but we can't waste our chance. We should move quickly.
It looks like the demon barrier is a little loose now.{nl}It feels odd but we can't waste our chance. We should move quickly.
Are you okay?{nl}I thought the barrier had loosened up... We need to be careful.{nl}
Everyone has escaped from the Reading Room now.{nl}We should move to the Annex... and save my brother.
Help...{nl}The demons... they experimented on me and left me here abandoned...{nl}
I can't escape, I'm too exhausted to even move. {nl}There's nothing I can do but hide and wait for the day I return to the goddess...
I feel a lot better now.{nl}I swear, my vision was starting to get blurry, I really thought I was over.
Just thinking about that experiment...{nl}It makes me want to leave this place immediately.{nl}
I won't ask you to come all the way with me!{nl}All I ask is that you clear out some demons so I can escape, will you do that?
They put me inside magic circles, they fed me things...{nl}It was horrible.
Thank you. Really, thank you so much!{nl}The others should be fine too... right?
I should escape from this place now.{nl}May the goddesses bless you!
Experiment Victim Fils
I may have survived, but what is it worth...{nl}I have no one now.{nl}
Run away while you can...{nl}They're doing horrible experiments here...
How can someone call themselves human and do something so... atrocious?{nl}Not even demons are this evil...
Thank you for bringing these to me.{nl}As soon as I escape this monastery I'm going to make a tomb with these objects...
Experiment Victim Hilbeth
How am I going to live now...?{nl}I have no will to be alive anymore...
I wish we'd escaped sooner.{nl}How can I live now without my family...?
You're... not from the Croa Village, are you?{nl}And you don't look like you're a Novaha monk, either.
I want to ask you something... All my friends, my family... my neighbors...{nl}They all returned to the goddesses because of the experiments.
I do want to avenge them, but most of all I want to mourn those who are gone. {nl}Would you bring me some of their belongings?
One thing I regret is not being able to return to the village.{nl}The merchants have no work there anymore, either. I miss our people already...
We're here now, but I think the Annex is too big.{nl}It'll be faster if we split up and look for my brother.
I'm not sure how I can cover such a wide area...{nl}Alright.{nl}
It's me who the demons want...{nl}They could easily catch me if I'm not careful and then I'll be just another burden on you.{nl}
I'll wait here, where it's safe.{nl}Please tell me as soon as you find my brother.
Anne
I really treasured that necklace...{nl}But if it helped Rose find us all the way here, it was for a good cause.
By the way, where is Rose?{nl}And Edmundas?
The thing about finding someone qualified is bothering me.{nl}He'll be all right... won't he?
Allonas
The memories of being taken by the demons still hurt.{nl}Some of us haven't made it back yet, either...
We're alive thanks to you and Rose...{nl}But I don't think the village will be the same again.
You found my brother in the Apega State Chamber?{nl}Then... why isn't he with you?{nl}
So he's strapped to some weird device?{nl}Let's go, then! We have to save him!
What on earth could this be?{nl}It wouldn't be this red if you threw a whole bottle of ink in it.
I... I don't trust what these youngsters are doing. No, sir.{nl}I know I can find a way if they would just let me, but they want to keep me out of it.
If it weren't for me they wouldn't have found any clues at all.{nl}I was the one who figured the problem was in the ruins in the first place.{nl}
And all these kids tell me is to stay put, to behave.{nl}This really.... This really is frustrating, you know.
What do we do... My brother is suffering.{nl}The wizard must have put him in this device so he couldn't escape...{nl}
He says the pain started when the wizard came inside the Apega State Chamber.{nl}I'll stay here and keep an eye on him. You go and find a way to stop this. Quick!
My brother is looking worse.{nl}I can't even go near him because of this barrier...
My brother... he's fine now.{nl}I was so worried about what might happen to him...
You saved my life. Thank you, really.{nl}But didn't you find something useful because of me? We're even, then.
I don't know what they did here, or who did it, but we can't let this go.{nl}Sigh, it's tough...
Rose... she's...!{nl}That's why I told her to run... Why didn't she listen to me...{nl}
So I was nothing but bait to get Rose to come here.{nl}And now this... What do we do...?{nl}
We came from a village downwards from here.{nl}We came to try and figure out what's causing the water contamination.
I know grandpa is trying to do the right thing but... {nl}it's dangerous with all these monsters around.{nl}I wish he could understand this.
My grandfather could be getting in trouble, please go find him.{nl}He could've just waited for you to go with him.... Sigh.
That wizard... He's going to do to Rose the same experiments he did on me...{nl}He's going to use her to spread the giant bracken spores.{nl}
Release me first.{nl}Then help me bring Rose back, I beg you...
I'm glad everyone's safe, thanks to you.{nl}I have to confess this was quite reckless, even with you around.
Wow, so the Hydra was the so-called vessel...{nl}I wonder what kind of person would put a gem on the Hydra, and for what?
There should be some device to shut this down around here somewhere.{nl}Please... before anything bad happens to Rose.
Thank you for releasing me.{nl}I'm so exhausted... But I have to save Rose.{nl}
Please. Help me save Rose.{nl}I know we've only just met and it's not right of me to ask so much of you right away, but please.
Rose... She's my little sister, my only one. I can't bear to lose her.
I know where they took Rose. The main monastery building... {nl}If you can lend me some of your strength, please come with me.
You... You don't seem like you're with that wizard.{nl}Please, don't ignore me... Help me.
I barely just escaped from the demons.{nl}But the experiments were hard on me... My body is too exhausted right now...{nl}
You'll find my bag of herbs in the Tebeti Small Corridor.{nl}Please... bring it to me.{nl}
My family is waiting for me.{nl}I should go back...
Thank you.{nl}Now if I can just gather enough strength to walk...
I'm still injured, but I think I can move now.{nl}I should get up and go rescue my family.
You say you're going to help me find my family? {nl}Really? Wow, I don't know what to say...
My family was taken to the Collapsed Grand Corridor.{nl}I hope nothing happened to them...
I promised them I would be back.{nl}They'll be all right... I'm sure they will.
That... That thing you're holding...{nl}
That's Anne's bracelet... Her parents...{nl}
I have one last favor to ask.{nl}I can't let these horrible experiments keep happening...{nl}
Please destroy the demon experiment equipment in the Errzze Oratorium.{nl}Please... I don't want anyone else to fall victim to this.{nl}
We have to stop any more experiments like this from happening...{nl}I don't want anyone else to suffer...
Thank you.{nl}How... How am I going to live now...
Monk Abels
It's... too late for me now.{nl}Please, traveler, will you spare me some of your time? I don't have much left myself...
All my life I have dedicated to my service here at the Novaha Monastery...{nl}I can't bear to see it tainted by demons as it is.{nl}
Please help me purify the monastery.{nl}Gather the holy relic fragments in the Gaile Chapel...
Please help me complete this final mission.{nl}I can't return to the goddess with the monastery tainted by these demons...
Are those the fragments...?{nl}My vision is becoming blurry but I can feel their energy.
There's... not much left now.{nl}
I gathered all the strength I have left to restore the holy relic.{nl}Use this around the monastery...
...I'm terribly sorry to the people of the Croa Village.{nl}I failed to protect them...
How I wish to see the monastery fully purified again... I'm afraid I won't have the time.{nl}I should rest...
Oh... You're here.{nl}I'm beyond grateful that you decided to do this favor for me...{nl}
Rose will probably have to go through the same experiments I did.{nl}
We could just go after the wizard right away to try and save Rose but...{nl}I don't think she would make it until then.{nl}
We need to stop the experiment.{nl}We need to find the wizard's devices and destroy them. {nl}That'll buy us time until we can get to Rose.
I don't know what this device in front of me is...{nl}But I saw the wizard put something black in it to turn it on, {nl}then suddenly the air was filled with something nauseating.
I felt something grow inside of my body, it was extremely painful.
Then the pain stopped, but the wizard became furious.{nl}He said something about finding someone who's qualified...
If Rose is the one they want, she'll be going through the same pain right now.
