Priest Irma wants you to charge the orb with power from the crystals in the Bird Room and the Supply Room. Walk near the crystals to have it absorb their power.
The orb seems to be somewhat restored. Show it to Priest Irma.
You have successfully destroyed the Cursed Idol. Go and tell Priest Irma.
Talk to Priest Irma at Ashaq Underground Prison 3F
Priest Irma believes it's time to take back the Demon Orders and has asked you to meet her at Ashaq Underground Prison 3F.
It looks like Priest Auranas needs your help. Talk to Priest Auranas.
Collect Twinkling Pearl Powder

Under the instruction of Bishop Urbonas, Priest Auranas has several emergency items prepared all around Ashaq Underground Prison. Go to the Watchtower and retrieve the shiny pearl powder left there by Auranas.
Deliver to Priest Auranas
Despite the bag being torn you managed to collect what is left of the pearl powder. Bring it to Priest Auranas.
Priest Auranas has created a sort of orb with the pearl powder you have collected. Talk to Priest Auranas again.
Defeat the demons marked by the Orb
According to Priest Auranas, using this orb will point out high-rank demons. Use the orb and defeat the demons signaled by it.
The demon subordinates look confused without their superiors around. Report to Priest Auranas.
Defeat the demons marked by the Orb
Priest Draznie looks deep in worry. Talk to Priest Draznie.
Defeat the monsters in the Special Prison District
Priest Draznie is looking for a safe place for the priests to take refuge. Defeat the monsters in the Special Prison District to make it a safe shelter for the priests.
Report to Priest Draznie
You have defeated enough demons. Go and tell Priest Draznie.
Priest Draznie requires your help. Talk to Priest Draznie.
Priest Draznie thinks it's time to use the trap prepared by Priest Auranas. Your job is to lure the demons into the trap set up in the Solitary Cells area, where they should be easily defeated.
You have defeated the demons with ease thanks to the trap. Tell Priest Draznie about it.
Priest Irma says there is another cursed idol here. Keep talking to Priest Irma.
Release the Altar Spirit on your way to the Second Watchtower
Priest Irma wants to release the spirit of the closest altar to clear out the energy of the cursed idol. With the power of the Revelators, release the spirit on your way to the Second Watchtower.
You have released the spirit of the altar. Return to Priest Irma.
The demons have noticed the altar spirit, but it is not enough to interfere with the energy of the cursed idol. Talk to Priest Irma again.
Release the Altar Spirit in the Prayer Room
Priest Irma believes your only hope lies on the blessing spirit of the last remaining altar. Release the spirit bestowed on the Confession Altar in the Prayer Room.
You have released the altar spirit. Ask Priest Irma whether the curse of the idol was lifted.
Priest Irma can feel that the curse of the idol is being dispelled. Keep talking to Priest Irma.
Destroy the Cursed Idol in the Second Watchtower
Priest Irma believes the Idol will have become completely harmless now. Go to the Second Watchtower and destroy the cursed idol.
The demons standing guard on the cursed idol attacked, but you managed to successfully destroy it. Return to Priest Irma.
With the cursed idol destroyed, you should be able to search for the hidden Demon Orders now. Talk to Priest Irma.
Demon Lord Marnox was hiding in the Penitence Room waiting to attack you! Defeat Demon Lord Marnox.
You have defeated Demon Lord Marnox. Ask Priest Irma if she is all right.
You have recovered the Demon Orders, but Priest Irma's condition has suffered. Talk to Priest Irma.
Deliver to Priest Urbonas at Ashaq Underground Prison 1F
Priest Irma wants you to go and deliver the Demon Orders to Bishop Urbonas. Bring the orders to the room in Ashaq Underground Prison 1F where Bishop Urbonas is hiding.
Bishop Urbonas cannot hide his surprise at the fact that you defeated Marnox. Keep talking to Bishop Urbonas.
Return to Orsha and talk to Inesa Hamondale
Bishop Urbonas believes the Lord of Orsha, Inesa Hamondale, will be worried about him. Return to Orsha and talk to Inesa Hamondale.
Priest Gelija is looking for someone to help to help with their research. Talk to Priest Gelija.
Collect Marnox's Insignia
Priest Gelija is looking to do research on the demons' command hierarchy. Defeat demons to collect Marnox insignias.
Deliver to Priest Gelija
You have collected enough insignias for Priest Gelija's research. Bring them to Priest Gelija.
Priest Gelija seems to have something to ask of you. Talk to Priest Gelija.
Retrieve Priest Gelija's Medicine Pouch
Priest Gelija is trying to help the injured but it seems they lost a pouch with medicine while running away. Find Priest Gelija's medicine pouch.
You have found Priest Gelija's medicine pouch. Bring it to Priest Gelija.
Priest Gelija is looking for a helping hand. Talk to Priest Gelija.
Purify the Cursed Idol with the Holy Water Cloth
While the cursed idol has been destroyed, its future still worries Priest Gelija. Cover any idol fragments with the cloth soaked in holy water to clear out their evil energy.
A lot of the evil energy has now been purified. Return to Priest Gelija.
Inesa Hamondale, Lord of Orsha, is honored to meet a Revelator. Keep talking to Inesa Hamondale.
Inesa Hamondale has asked you to return to Bishop Urbonas. Go see Bishop Urbonas and hear about the contents of the Demon Orders.
Defeat monsters in Paupys Crossing
The Swordsman Submaster has tasked you with defeating Red Kepas and Woodins in Paupys Crossing to prove your skills as a Revelator.
Defeat Red Kepas
Defeat Woodins
Hit the Sword Pell to prove your strength
The Highlander Submaster doubts you have the strength to handle a two-handed sword. Use the Sword Pell to prove your strength.
Defeat Woodins in Paupys Crossing
To judge your practical skills and strength, the Highlander Submaster has tasked you with defeating Woodins in Paupys Crossing.
You have defeated the Woodins as instructed. Return to the Highlander Submaster.
Collect Pokuborn Tusks and Dry Wood
The Peltasta Submaster has tasked you with collecting materials for a shield. Go to the Woods of the Linked Bridges to collect Pokuborn tusks and to Paupys Crossing for dry wood.
Investigate the piles of wood and collect %s
Obtain %s from Pokuborns
The Cleric Submaster has requested you clear out the Pokubus and Pokuborns terrorizing people at the Woods of the Linked Bridges.
You have sufficiently intimidated nearby monsters. Return to the Cleric Submaster.
Defeat Pokubus and Pokuborns
Set fire to the Flameholder
Recharge the Torch Gem's energy by defeating any type of monster. After it is full, set fire to the flameholder by the Krivis Submaster. This is a task you must complete on your own.
The Priest Submaster has asked you to visit the Cleric, Krivis and Bokor Submasters in Orsha to receive their blessings.
Defeat Gosarus in the Dadan Jungle
The Swordsman Submaster has tasked you with defeating Gosarus in the Dadan Jungle to achieve an even stronger level.
You have defeated the Gosarus. Return to the Swordsman Submaster.
Defeat Gosaru
To evaluate how much you have grown as a Revelator, the Highlander Submaster has tasked you with defeating Gosarus in the Dadan Jungle.
Defeat monsters it the Dadan Jungle with a shield equipped

The Peltasta Submaster wants to test your shield using abilities. Equip a shield and hunt monsters at the Dadan Jungle. Defeating demons will earn you extra points. Alas, this is a task you will have to complete on your own.
You have cleared out enough monsters. Return to the Peltasta Submaster.
Defeat Rafflys at the Dadan Jungle
The Hoplite Submaster has tasked you with defeating Rafflys at the Dadan Jungle.
You have cleared out enough Rafflys. Return to the Hoplite Submaster.
Defeat Raffly
Defeat Gosarus in the Dadan Jungle
The Barbarian Submaster wants to test your mind for combat. Defeat the Gosarus in the Dadan Jungle and submit proof of your hunt.
You have defeated the Gosarus. Return to the Barbarian Submaster.
Use the ointment to heal refugees at Lemprasa Pond
Worship all Goddess Statues around Orsha
The Krivis Submaster has tasked you with visiting the Lemprasa Pond, Woods of the Linked Bridges and Paupys Crossing and worshiping the Goddess Statues in all those locations.
Collect herbs for the ointment
The Priest Submaster has asked you to visit Koru Jungle, Knidos Jungle and Dadan Jungle and collect Wormwood, Hemostasis Herb and Moonlight Flower respectively in each area.
Collect %s at Koru Jungle
Collect %s at Knidos Jungle
Collect %s at Dadan Jungle
Collect materials and craft a Bokor Doll
Go to Dadan Jungle and collect Raffly Soul Crystals and Vubbe Warrior Mind Crystals.
Collect chunks of metal from Grummers at Dadan Jungle
The blacksmith doesn't have a chisel ready for you, but she can make one if you collect the right materials. Defeat Grummers at the Dadan Jungle and collect chunks of metal from them.
Deliver to the Orsha Blacksmith
You have collected enough chunks of metal, Bring them to the blacksmith in Orsha.
Collect %s from Grummers
Defeat monsters using Highlander techniques
The Highlander Submaster wants to find out how polished your Highlander skills are. Use your Highlander techniques to defeat any type of monster. This is a task you must complete on your own.
The Peltasta Submaster is ready to set you up on the path of a true Peltasta if only you pass this test. Defeat the Chapparition at Karolis Springs.
Defeat Sparnasman at the Novaha Annex
The Sparnasman that Hoplites fought long ago has returned. Defeat the Sparnasman at the Novaha Annex and bring back the Hoplites' broken spearheads.

The Krivis Submaster wants you to defeat the monsters that are terrorizing people. Go to Feretory Hills and, after draining out some of their stamina, use the crystal gem to purify them and collect the ashes.
Collect %s by purifying monsters
The Priest Submaster strongly believes in exterminating all evil forces of this earth. Go to Feretory Hills where evil energy is concentrated and defeat monsters there.
The Priest Submaster will be satisfied with your performance. Return to her.
Collect Sparnasman's Horn
The Dievdirbys Submaster has asked you to collect a Sparnasman's Horn to use as carving material. Go to Braken Monastery 64_2 and defeat Sparnasman to collect its horn.
Deliver to the Dievdirbys Submaster
Collect monster souls imbued with the Sadhu Master's spirit
The Sadhu Master has given you a task. Go to Feretory Hills and imbue monsters with the Sadhu Master's spirit, then defeat them and collect their souls. This task you must complete on your own.
You have completed the Sadhu Master's task. Return to the Sadhu Master's physical body in Orsha.
Talk to Mage Melchioras
Mage Melchioras seems to have something to say to you. Talk to Mage Melchioras.
After hearing that you're a Revelator, Mage Melchioras seems to want to tell you something. Listen to what he has to say.
Mage Melchioras says he has returned to this place to gather the Revelators and stop another Kruvina from being created in Delmore Castle. Keep listening to Mage Melchioras.
Use the compass to search for hidden artifacts
You have decided to help Melchioras. Visit the spots marked on the map and use the compass to find the objects under the protection spell. The compass is activated only near the cast.
Report to Mage Melchioras
You have found the objects under the protection spell. Relay their location to Mage Melchioras.
Talk to Revelator Mihail
Melchioras is going to analyze the protection spell; meanwhile, talk to Revelator Mihail.
Defeat demons and charge the Magic Concentration Orbs
According to Mihail, they need more magic concentration orbs to blast the Magic Power Supply Device. Defeat demons to charge the orbs.
Deliver to Revelator Mihail
You have filled all orbs with magic. Bring them to Revelator Mihail.
Mage Melchioras' analysis of the protection spell seems to have come to an end. Talk to Mage Melchioras.
Release the objects' protection spell
Mage Melchioras has asked you to dispel the protection spell placed north of the Amjene Sanctum. Use the amulet on the objects protected by the cast to release it.
You have dispelled the protection spell. Return to Mage Melchioras.
All preparations for blowing up the Magic Power Supply Device are now in place. Talk to Mage Melchioras.
Place the Magic Concentration Orbs on the Magic Power Supply Device
It's time to blow up the Magic Power Supply Device. Go to the Ishinti Crossroads and place the charged orbs around the device.
Report to Revelator Mihail
All the charged orbs are now in place. Talk to Revelator Mihail and blow up the Magic Power Supply Device.
You have destroyed the Magic Power Supply Device. Talk to Mage Melchioras.
Go to Delmore Manor
Melchioras wants to meet up at Delmore Manor, where the Kruvina device is located. Join Mage Melchioras at Delmore Manor.
Talk to Follower Andrea
Follower Andrea is preparing to deal with the monsters in the area. Ask her if there is anything you can help with.
Collect data from Pag Amplers
Follower Andrea is looking to obtain information on Pag Amplers. Defeat Pag Amplers and collect any data you can from them.
You have collected enough data. Bring it to Follower Andrea.
It looks like Follower Andrea needs your help. Talk to Follower Andrea.
Collect the diary of Delmore Castle resident Ardel
Follower Andrea was asked to contact a resident of Delmore Castle named Ardel, but all Delmore Castle residents are missing. Try and recover Ardel's diary.
Deliver to Follower Andrea
You have collected all the pages of the diary. Bring them to Follower Andrea.
Talk to Follower Nuodas
Follower Nuodas is feeling sorry for the missing residents of Delmore Castle. Talk to Follower Nuodas.
Follower Nuodas believes that clearing out some demons will probably help the residents of Delmore Castle. Defeat nearby demons.
You have defeated enough demons. Go and tell Follower Nuodas.
It seems Follower Nuodas has a favor to ask of you. Talk to Follower Nuodas.
Collect arrows from Charcoal Walkers
Follower Nuodas thinks the Revelators waste too many arrows. Defeat Charcoal Walkers and collect any arrows that can still be used.
Deliver to Follower Nuodas
As Follower Nuodas said, there were plenty of useful arrows to be collected. Bring them to Follower Nuodas.
Collect %s by defeating Charcoal Walker
Mage Melchioras seems to have split up from the group of Revelators. Talk to Mage Melchioras.
Mage Melchioras seems to be looking for a new way to neutralize the Kruvina device. Keep talking to Mage Melchioras.
Search for a Magic Power Supply Device at the Rampart Reconstruction District
Mage Melchioras believes there is a Magic Power Supply Device in the Rampart Reconstruction District. Go there and set up the crystal to reveal any hidden devices.
You have found the hidden Magic Power Supply Device. Return to Mage Melchioras.
Mage Melchioras believes there are other Magic Power Supply Devices. Keep talking to Mage Melchioras.
Search for a Magic Power Supply Device at the Buried Central Plaza
Mage Melchioras says he felt a new Magic Power Supply Device. Go to the Buried Central Plaza and set up the crystal to reveal any hidden devices.
It seems this time his prediction was wrong. Return to Mage Melchioras and let him know.
Mage Melchioras feels sorry for his lack of judgement. Keep talking to him.
Search for a Magic Power Supply Device at the Handicraft Workshop Road
This time, Mage Melchioras thinks there is a Magic Power Supply Device at the Handicraft Workshop Road. Go there and set up the crystal to reveal any hidden devices.
It looks like Yane is going to try and destroy the central device purely by force. Go back and tell Melchioras about this immediately.
Mage Melchioras looks livid after hearing about what Yane is planning to do. Keep talking to him.
Stop Revelator Yane at the Palma Central Plaza
Mage Melchioras says the Kruvina runs on human lives and gathering around it would be a fatal mistake. Go to the Palma Central Plaza and stop Yane from carrying out her plans!
Follow Yane into the Delmore Outskirts
Delmore Rephaim has kidnapped an injured Melchioras and escaped, the other Revelators chasing after him immediately after. Go to the outskirts of Delmore and join Revelator Yane.
Talk to Follower Bigs
It looks like Follower Bigs is in need of your help. Talk to Follower Bigs.
Obtain Useful Wooden Boards from Box Piles
Bigs wants to create a barricade to protect Melchioras once he returns. Go to the Kalbos Vacant Lot and Handicraft Workshop Road and look in box piles for wood boards to use.
You have collected a handful of useful wooden boards. Bring them to Follower Bigs.
Obtain %s from old chests and others
It looks like Follower Bigs needs your help. Listen to what he has to say.
Bigs hopes you will clear out the demons in the area for those who are now injured. As instructed, defeat any demons nearby.
You have defeated the demons as requested. Return to Follower Bigs.
Talk to Follower Wedge
Follower Wedge seems to be worried about Mage Melchioras. Talk to him.
Collect Thorn Mushrooms
Follower Wedge wants to make some medicine to help Melchioras recover his health later. Go and collect some thorn mushrooms from the Kalbos Empty Lot and Buried Central Plaza.
Deliver to Follower Wedge
You have collected enough mushrooms now. Bring them to Follower Wedge.
More than demons, Follower Wedge is worried about the monsters roaming about. Talk to Follower Wedge.
Collect Charog Sap
Follower Wedge wants to produce a monster repellent. Defeat Charogs and collect their sap to use as material for the repellent.
You have now collected enough Charog sap. Bring it to Follower Wedge.
Chasing Lord Delmore
Talk to Revelator Yane
Revelator Yane is in a hurry to chase after Lord Delmore accompanied by a party. Talk to her.
Ask Revelator Mihail to accompany you
Revelator Yane wants to split the group to chase after Delmore Rephaim. Ask Revelator Mihail to accompany you.
Chase Delmore Rephaim to the Outskirts Central Plaza
Follow Revelator Mihail and chase Delmore Rephaim up to the Outskirts Central Plaza.
Escape from Delmore Rephaim's trap
You are caught in Delmore Rephaim's trap. Fight demons to find the hidden magic core or defeat all demons to escape.
You have disabled the trap. Talk to Revelator Mihail.
Revelator Mihail is worried about Revelator Yane's party headed towards the Tagika Crossroads. Talk to him.
Join Yane's group at the Tagika Crossroads
Find Revelator Yane's group at the Tagika Crossroads and help them.
Revelator Mihail has disabled the barrier that was trapping Yane and her group. Ask Revelator Yane if she is all right.
Revelator Yane says she saw a suspicious light by the Government Ruins. Keep talking to her.
Go to the Government Ruins
Go to the Government Ruins with Revelators Yane and Mihail.
Mage Melchioras is trapped in the altar. Try and find a solution with Revelator Yane.
Revelator Yane seems to have figured out a solution. Talk to her.
Collect Demons Souls in the Shaman Doll
Yane wants to impart demons souls onto a shaman doll and replace Melchioras with it. Hunt demons and collect their souls on the doll.
Deliver to Revelator Yane
The shaman doll is now fully charged with souls. Bring it to Revelator Yane.
Lead to a Dead-end
Mage Melchioras is still struggling but he is trying to tell you something. Talk to him.
Chase Delmore Rephaim to the Odaginkas Vacant Lot
Mage Melchioras says Delmore Rephaim has escaped to the Odaginkas Vacant Lot. Go and chase Delmore Rephaim with Revelator Mihail.
Chase Delmore Rephaim to the Odaginkas Vacant Lot
Go and chase Delmore Rephaim to the Odaginkas Vacant Lot with Revelator Mihail.
Protect Mihail while he sets up the bomb
Revelator Mihail wants to blow up the obstacle that's blocking the way with a bomb. Protect him from the incoming demon attacks while he finished setting up the bomb.
Revelator Mihail has finished setting up the bomb. Talk to him.
Revelator Mihail has finished setting up the bomb. Talk to him.
Stop Delmore Rephaim
You've almost caught up with Delmore Rephaim now. Keep going and stop his plans!
Delmore Rephaim tried to use the power of the Kruvina but was ultimately defeated. Return to Revelator Mihail.
It's time to go back to where Melchioras and the Revelators are. Talk to Revelator Mihail.
It's time to go back to where Melchioras and the Revelators are. Talk to Mage Melchioras at the Tagika Crossroads.
Mage Melchioras is apparently still having difficulties moving. Talk to him.
Destroy all reserve Kruvina devices
Melchioras is worried about the backup Kruvina devices that are still around. Fill the crystal given to you by Melchioras with evil energy by defeating demons and place it on the devices.
You have cleared out all the reserve devices. Go and tell Mage Melchioras.
There still seems to be something concerning Mage Melchioras. Talk to Melchioras.
Inject demonic power into the Supply Device

Mage Melchioras has asked you to destroy the remaining Magic Power Supply Device in Delmore Manor. Go back there and defeat demons to charge the crystal with demonic power, then place it on the supply device.
The Delmore Manor is now free of the Magic Power Supply Device. Go back and tell Mage Melchioras.
It seems Revelator Yane has not yet fully recovered. Talk to her.
Revelator Yane wants you to help clear out some demons. Defeat demons nearby.
Report to Revelator Yane
You have cleared out some of the demons nearby. Go and tell Revelator Yane.
Revelator Mihail seems to have something on his mind. Talk to Revelator Mihail.
Collect Magic Amplifiers from Black Maizes
Mage Melchioras seems interested in the magic amplifiers. Obtain some magic amplifiers from Black Maizes.
You have collected enough magic amplifiers. Bring them to Mage Melchioras.
Collect %s from Black Maizes
Defeat nearby monsters

Believer Gintas supports you joining the Order and asks you to charge the Evil Thoughts Stone. It looks like a good opportunity to join the Order. Set up the Evil Thoughts Stone and defeat the dead to collect their evil thoughts.
Gintas says the once-believers of the Order have resurrected, possibly by the power of Margiris. Defeat the resurrected believers in the Seima Stone Chamber and then use the flint to burn the bodies.
You have received a fully charged Evil Thoughts Stone from Gintas. Take it to Margiris And you should be able to join the Order.
Benes has asked you to spread a ferret-repelling scent around the entrance to the Bellai Forest Workshop. Press the
Defeat Vikaras Mages and collect %s
Defeat Zaura, Empowered by Giltine
Elder Aloizard looks deeply concerned about something. Talk to him.
Elder Aloizard wants to return to where the village residents are but is worried about the monsters. Clear out some monsters nearby to help Elder Aloizard return.
You have defeated a good number of monsters nearby. Go and tell Elder Aloizard.
The village chief's granddaughter is looking for someone to help her. Talk to her.
Investigate the Wandering Sanctuary
The elder's granddaughter says the village residents are suffering with the red water incident but have no way to solve it. Help them out by investigating the Wandering Sanctuary.
Deliver the diary to the Elder's Granddaughter
You have found a burnt journal at the Wandering Sanctuary. Bring it to the elder's granddaughter.
Search for Elder Aloizard
The elder's granddaughter says he took off with a group of village youth and disappeared. Search for Elder Aloizard around the Anga Hall area.
The episode with the monsters was a close call. Ask Elder Aloizard and the village youth if they are all right.
Elder Aloizard believes there is something important happening at the Wandering Sanctuary. Talk to Elder Aloizard.
Look for the spot signaled by the Old Disc
Elder Aloizard says that when the earth shook, he saw the old disc glow red and point towards somewhere. Find out where the old disc is pointing to.
Deliver to Elder Aloizard
The object the old disc was pointing to was a red gem fragment. Bring it to Elder Aloizard.
Use the Old Disc on nearby monsters and acquire %s
Talk to the Elder's Granddaughter
Elder Aloizard took the red fragment and went to the Absenta Reservoir. The elder's granddaughter is looking to speak to you about the journal. Go and talk to her.
Talk to Elder Aloizard at the Absenta Reservoir
The burnt journal seems to contain important information. Go and find Elder Aloizard right away.
Collect Rajatadpole Meat
Samsonas believes the wrath of the goddesses is what caused the water to turn red. He proposes you collect some Rajatadpole meat to use as an offering.
Deliver to Samsonas
You have collected enough Rajatadpole meat to use as offering. Bring it to Samsonas.
It's time to make the offering. Talk to Samsonas again.
Make an offering to the Obelisk
Samsonas is going to use this obelisk and has asked you to use one in another location. Go to the left side of the Vishikas Great Hall and make an offering to the obelisk there.
Report the results to Samsonas
Oddly enough, the offering caused nearby monsters to attack. Go to Samsonas right away and warn him about it before he makes his offering.
Nikodemas is looking around apprehensively. Talk to Nikodemas.
Find the Village Resident at the Drava Chapel Lot
Nikodemas says someone from the village wandered off and hasn't been back since. It seems they were headed towards the Drava Chapel Lot; go and look for them there.
Talk to Napalis
You successfully defeated the monster that attacked from underwater. Ask Napalis if they are all right.
Defeat Rocksodon
Scalvis is worried about the monsters roaming around. Talk to Scalvis.
Scalvis is worried about the large number of monsters around. Defeat nearby monsters to make the area safer for the village residents.
The area seems safer now. Report back to Scalvis.
Talk to Elder Aloizard about the contents of the journal.
Investigate the Nesuga Small Corridor
Elder Aloizard says Modis once saw people with black hoods doing something at the Nesuga Small Corridor. Go to the Nesuga Small Corridor and see if you can find any clues.
You have found a burnt painting. Elder Aloizard could possibly know something about the images in the painting.
Elder Aloizard seems to have recognized the images in the painting. Ask Elder Aloizard about the painting,
Go to the Jeneuam Corridor and find the Hydra
A resident of the village came running, saying the Hydra has appeared. Go and check the Jeneuam Corridor, where the Hydra is said to be.
A colossal Hydra with a red gem on its body appeared but quickly fled. Return to Elder Aloizard.
The monster depicted in the painting is the Hydra. Ask Elder Aloizard about what to do next.
Talk to Hunter Modis
Elder Aloizard believes that, with your help, they might have a chance to destroy the red gem on the Hydra's body. Go see Hunter Modis and find a way to lure the Hydra.
When it comes to bait and traps, no one knows better than Hunter Modis. Ask Hunter Modis about how to catch the Hydra.
Collect Sawpent Meat
While Hunter Modis is making a trap to catch the Hydra, he wants you to collect Sawpent meat to use as bait.
Defeat Sawpents and collect %s
Collect Blue Herbs
You have collected enough bait. Now, collect blue herbs to disguise the scent of humans.
Deliver to Hunter Modis
You have collected meat to use as bait and herbs to disguise your human scent. Bring the items to Hunter Modis.
Talk to Hunter Modis
Hunter Modis seems to have finished all preparations to lure the Hydra. Talk to Hunter Modis.
Hunter Modis has set up a trap at the Heralve Vacant Lot. Place the bait on the trap to lure the Tyronas Hydra and defeat it.
After defeating the Hydra, the red gem on its body shattered to pieces. Go and tell Elder Aloizard about the Tyronas Hydra.
Hunter Modis seems to have a problem at hand. Talk to Hunter Modis.
Collect Markazi Flowers
Someone from the village accidentally drank the contaminated red water. Go to the right side of Svaigulys Hill in Letas Stream and collect Markazi Flowers to ease their pain.
You have collected enough Markazi Flowers now. Bring them to Hunter Modis.
Lanaldas is furious at the fact that the red water of the reservoir was the fault of someone's experiment. Talk to Lanaldas.
Collect lard from Black Rajapearlites
Lanaldas wants to burn down the laboratory as retaliation. Go and collect lard from Black Rajapearlites to make flammable oil.
Deliver to Lanaldas
You have collected enough lard from Black Rajapearlites. Bring it to Lanaldas.
The oil is ready now. Talk to Lanaldas before burning down the laboratory.
Set fire to the laboratory

Lanaldas wants you to burn down the laboratory to prevent future experiments. One is located in the Nesuga Small Corridor of the Absenta Reservoir, the other in the Wandering Sanctuary of the Pelke Shrine Ruins.
You have burned down all the laboratories. Go and tell Lanaldas.
If you're really set on helping Elder Aloizard, he will be waiting for you at the Collapsed Hall Lot. Go and find him there.
Rune Casters can command powerful magic through the use of Rune Characters.{nl}Rune Stones are merely tools to make that process easier.
Rune characters are rarely used now.{nl}But they shall never be forgotten as long as there are Rune Casters.
Mercenary Post Receptionist
Check for requests at the Mercenary Post
Check for requests at the Mercenary Post.
Carry out the Mercenary Post Mission
You've accepted a mission from receptionist Donnes at the Mercenary Post. Complete the mission.
Report to the Mercenary Post Receptionist
You've completed the mission. Report back to Donnes at the Mercenary Post.
Interrupt the Merog Shaman's Ritual
Jonas is the head of the family that protects the Royal Mausoleum of the Great King Zachariel.{nl}He is a very important person to our research team.{nl}
I heard a rumor that the Great King Zachariel erased the {nl}memories of all workers after building the Royal Mausoleum. {nl}That should be the spell casted on Jonas, though he is also a bit senile.
I'm not sure if that is the reason but the Vubbes suddenly rushed out of the Crystal Mine.{nl}Those Vubbes took all the villagers they saw into the mines.{nl}
That portal is a gate to lies.{nl}Laima has brought you to me because of that.
After Medzio Diena, maintaining the monastery has been no easy task.{nl}Apart from me and few other brothers, there was no one left in the monastery, you see.{nl}
The demons kept every single one of us locked inside the annex.{nl}We didn't know the demons' demands or their reasoning; all we could do was pray.{nl}
They say that there are barely any intact cities left in the kingdom.{nl}All because of Medzio Diena four years ago... It's a real shame.{nl}
On Medzio Diena, it was a nightmare because of the earthquake.{nl}It was still easier to get by back then than it is now...{nl}
And after the Kruvina device, my condition isn't the best either...{nl}If that's okay with you, will you help us set up the barricade?
It doesn't make sense no matter how much I think of it.{nl}How did they find this place?
Find the map at Ratas Fork

Rolandas says that a map showing the location of Great King Zachariel's inheritance is hidden somewhere. As its exact coordinates are unknown, you will have to search the entire area.{nl}Go to Ratas Fork and look for the map.
My old colleague who went to Sirdgela Forest told me that he saw a strange looking map.{nl}I am sure that it is the map we are looking for.
It is a real honor to be chosen as a member of the research team, {nl}but I am afraid of making mistakes.
The crops withered when you did what you were told to do? {nl}It's alright. I was told that the bad energy within the crops would go away like that. {nl}
Dried food has a long shelf life.{nl}You'll feel full even when you consume only a small amount of beef jerky.{nl}That's why we're accumulating a lot of it.
What?{nl}No way... You think Vaiga has sent his pawn?
I... I don't trust what these youngsters are doing. No, sir.{nl}I know I can find a way if they would just let me, but they want to keep me out of it.
Next time, I'll fight at the front line. {nl}I'm positive I can take it down.
Then we have no choice.{nl}As Erikas said, can you find Legwyn at Mires Grave using the Scroll of the Dead?{nl}I will stay here so that Erikas won't escape.

Attention! Please read.{nl}Should the purifier be disabled, toxic substances will fill Crystal Mine 3F.{nl}Please proceed with the following steps as quickly as possible in the event of a purifier failure.
1. Next to the purifier
Emergency Power Source
check it{nl}2.
: take it and find magic crystals on 3F that have yet to be collected.{nl}3.
: collect the crystal's magic on it!{nl}4.
: use it to restore the purifier{nl}5. After using,
: put it back!
Would you please help me?{nl}Something must have happened to make the Pantos like that.{nl}You saw that baby Panto eat the Plateau Sugar Beet I was carrying, right?

{nl}I'm guessing the adult Pantos started acting strange after eating the Sugar Beets that grow here.{nl}Get rid of all the Sugar Beet stems you see growing at the Spalva Junction.{nl}It's a shame but I'd rather the Pantos starve than eat those things.
I often hear from the watchers at the Gele Plateau that the soil here is being contaminated.{nl}With what, I'm not sure...
Did you destroy the roots, too?{nl}If someone comes to cover me I'll help you out.
If we're going to use a shaman doll, we need more information.{nl}There used to be nothing but Pantos here, but now I see other monsters hanging around.
{nl}If you find any Spion Archers, Leaflies or Malis at Gele Plateau, can you handle them?{nl}Also, let me know if you find anything new.
We've only recently started to scout this area, so we don't know exactly where they are either.{nl}But the last place we found is probably the last two I talked about earlier.
Hm... I see. It's not much yet, but we might be able to fix the shaman doll a little.{nl}I'll let Basil know. Thanks for helping.

While I was running from the demons I found some traps {nl}around this area that weren't working like they should.{nl}They're supposed to react to demons only, but they reacted to me, too.{nl}Then some Blue Vubbe Archers saw it and took a few of my traps for themselves.

{nl}If you're going over there, would you please collect some of my traps?{nl}I installed most of them in the Waiting Room and the Supply Room.{nl}You might be able to get some from the Blue Vubbe Archers over there, too.
The traps built here weren't all made at the order.{nl}Some I bought at a high price from a Sapper in Klaipeda, but they aren't worth the money.
I built a few good hundreds of them, so we're still far from collecting them all.{nl}If I get out of here, I need to go to Klaipeda and find that Sapper.
Do you know what's harder than running from Marnox?{nl}Trying to hide among the Varvs at the Felon Prison.{nl}I want you to just get rid of all the Varvs you can find.
If I get out of here I can talk proudly of having faced Marnox.{nl}But the thing with the Varvs is not something I want to talk about over dinner, {nl}or ever for that matter.
I think I just heard them.{nl}Are you sure you got rid of all of them?
{nl}They were so many; there's no way, huh...{nl}Still, thanks for clearing them out a little...

I think I'm going to need to camp out here for a few days, {nl}but I'm worried about spending the night here.{nl}Will you get me the blue coal I buried at Goram Shores and Saunu Brook?{nl}I buried it before Medzio Diena, but given my situation I really need to use it...

I bought it from the mine in the northern snowfield thinking I could sell it in Orsha...{nl}However, after Medzio Diena, everyone was busy reconstructing {nl}the city and cutting down the tree around it. In the end, no one was buying my items.
{nl}I ended up burying it in nearby Koru Jungle.{nl}I didn't mean to leave it there for so long... {nl}I don't even know if it's good for fire, because of all the humidity.
I think this will do to keep me safe for a few hours...{nl}Thank you!
For my father who is in Klaipeda, it may not be quite enough.{nl}I'll help you get to a slightly higher level.
Your test is going to Feretory Hills and defeating monsters.{nl}Use only basic attacks and Barbarian techniques.{nl}
And no helpers. Only basic attacks and Barbarian techniques.{nl}Easy and simple.
Uh... you say the statue only made the ferrets even more violent?{nl}
Now, pour the oil around the laboratories and set fire to them.{nl}We can't let this type of experiment happen ever again...{nl}
Dangerous Mine
I'll find the power
Justified Suspicion
I'll help you
I don't think that'll be necessary
Improvements
I'll find the other people
Conveying information
Collect the Faulty Goods
We should let that go
Days to Forget
I don't want to get my hands dirty
Camping Preparations
Check the Purifier in 3F
Check the Purifier in Crystal Mine 3F
Collect Crystal Magic
The purifier on the 3rd floor is disabled for lack of energy. Find magic crystals and charge the emergency power source with their magic, then use it to provide energy to the 3F Purifier.
Supply energy to the 3F Purifier
You have collected enough crystal magic. Supply their energy to the 3F Purifier.
Watcher Molly is waiting for your help at Srautas Gorge
Remove the Plateau Sugar Beet Stems
Watcher Molly believes the reason the Pantos started acting strange from eating the Plateau Sugar Beets. She requested you get destroy all the Plateau Sugar Beets.
You have removed enough Plateau Sugar Beets. Report to Watcher Molly.
Watcher Molly is waiting for help at the Gele Plateau
Hunt Monsters

Watcher Molly wants to gather information on the monsters in order to more effectively use a shaman doll at Gele Plateau. Defeat Spion Archers, Leaflies and Malis to learn how to handle these new monsters.
Report to Watcher Molly
You have collected sufficient information for Watcher Molly. Go back and report to her about what you learned fighting the monsters.
Priest Draznie is looking for help in Ashaq Underground Prison 2F
Collect Faulty Traps
Priest Draznie has asked you to collect some traps she set up a long time ago. According to her, most traps are set up in the Waiting Room and the Supply Room.
Return the Faulty Traps to Priest Draznie
You have collected a large number of traps. Bring them to Priest Draznie.
Priest Gelija is waiting for help in Ashaq Underground Prison 3F
Varv Extermination
Priest Gelija has asked you to clear out the Varvs that have been terrorizing the priests in Ashaq Underground Prison. They are often found at the Felon Prison.
Report to Priest Gelija
You have clear out enough Varvs. Report to Gelija.
Exterminate %s
A traveling merchant in Koru Jungle is waiting for help
Collect Blue Coal

The merchant wants to retrieve some blue coal they buried in Koru Jungle to help them make it through until the group has recovered. Go to Goram Shores and Saunu Brook and find the pieces of blue coal in the piles of dirt.
Deliver the Blue Coal to the merchant
You have collected enough blue coal. Deliver it to the merchant.
The Barbarian Master wants you to defeat monsters in Feretory Hills using only basic attacks and Barbarian techniques. This is a task you must complete on your own.
You didn't see him?{nl}His mind is not all that sound. Where could he be?{nl}
Niels sent you too?{nl}I am not going.{nl}I have to research these wild flowers.{nl}
I am not sure of what he meant by 'the worthy one'...{nl}However, the goddess said unto Zachariel and gave him{nl}the divine task of helping the one who will save this world.{nl}
There's a herb that only grows around Metos Field.{nl}Please bring me it.
Good job.{nl}You're pretty sharp, aren't you?{nl}
Alright, it's done.{nl}Take this to Davio.
This will be enough.{nl}Davio sent you, right?{nl}I still need one more ingredient to make the medicine truly effective.
To make the medicine, I needed to find the cause of Jonas' symptoms and it drove me crazy.{nl}Funnily enough, it was caused by a spell that was used long ago.{nl}

I heard a rumor that the Great King Zachariel erased the {nl}memories of all workers after building the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}That should be the spell casted on Jonas, though he is also a bit senile.{nl}
It will be completed once you melt it in the honey that you have.{nl}Take it with you.
We don't accept just anyone as a Peltasta.{nl}I will give you an assignment. First, defeat all Jukopus that are occupying Siaulai's Miners' Village.

I am happy to see that you are determined to learn the way of the sword from me,{nl}but I can't be sure that you are capable.{nl}I will test you by seeing how you face against the Vubbes at the Miners' Village.
Your will to learn from me is good, but first I have a favor to ask.{nl}We can continue our talk if you are up for it.{nl}
I heard the lost telescope lens from the Astral Tower is at the Miners' Village. {nl}Get me that lens before the other masters find out and I'll teach you my techniques.
I heard the Vubbes at the Miners' Village have a special type of venom. {nl}I'm sure it's the same venom used by the assassin Ebonypawn. Bring me that venom.
{nl}The Archer Master is not a mean person, so he will give you the book if you ask nicely.{nl}
It's not hard to teach you high level magic... but, you should help me before I teach it to you.{nl}I need to collect fire energy for my research, but I just don't have the time.
This is the symbol that I engraved on my father's sleeve...{nl}This is so precious to me... Thank you.
This is an opportunity for us. The Cockats are suffering from a disease.{nl}Please get enough tails from them to use for our research.
What if one of those flowers suddenly bit you?{nl}They may look beautiful to you, but I don't just see them as beautiful.
I must protect them...
Gesti... should not be underestimated.{nl}We need to find the hidden sanctum fast, but let's be cautious.
You need the Seal of Space in order to enter the hidden sanctuary. {nl}It's hidden in the Sventove Central Altar, but I just hope it's not too late.
We can't do anything about the destroyed altar, but the fragments still have power. {nl}Gather the pieces and insert them into the 8 pillars of the Sventove Central Hall.
Uh...
Is there nothing valuable here?{nl}I mean, I've been hired by Raymond, but...
In between this Gorge Area and Klaipeda is the Thorn Forest that is full of evil energy. {nl}It was just a normal and peaceful forest before but...{nl}
I don't know who it is but it's a good thing the Revelator stopped it. {nl}We might even have had another Medzio Diena otherwise.
Overlong Bridge Valley is home to many places where one can open spatial chasms.
Dementia? That's absurd.{nl}I'm perfectly fine. {nl}You're the crazy ones.
Just where did that old man go all by himself?{nl}His mind isn't even right...
You should prove that you are suited to use a sword if you want to reach a higher level of swordsmanship. {nl}Go and collect Red Kepa Skins at the Miners' Village.
While magic does not choose its wielder, I don't like a lazy disciple.{nl}Defeating Stone Orcas in Crystal Mine 1F will be a test of your guts.
If you can't bring me cores, you better give up now.
Defeat the Jukopus at the Miners' Village and bring me their cores as proof.
We should ask for more in times like this.{nl}I don't know what they're looking for, {nl}but they pay a lot when something is discovered at the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}{nl}
Ah, so you're the newcomer.{nl}Come see this thing behind me and if the matter inside solidifies, bring it to me.{nl}{nl}
I would feel more comfortable doing it myself, {nl}but I took an arrow to the knee before, and it aches quite a bit.
Hmm... So... The procedure is...{nl}Wash your body in the water, pray, and then...{nl}
Thank you. {nl}I should be able to work with this amount of divine energy.
Clymen... I can feel its presence at the Ishpirki Access Road.
Goddess Saule? {nl}We haven't seen Her in a long time.{nl}
The portal that leads to Goddess Saule doesn't open. {nl}I think it's because the Holy Pond is corrupted.
Is it the sacred object?{nl}It's been such a long time, I can't think of anything else.
I also wonder why they used such magic on the old man.
I had never seen demons use any herbs, but I'm sure whatever it is they're doing, it's evil.{nl}I was on my way to stop them when this happened...
The Chapparition will not bring back the lives of those who died.{nl}It's a sad thing.. But we can't just leave it like that.
What? You're not a reaper?{nl}But since you've seen my face now, I'm sorry but you will be cursed. {nl}
Wait a minute. No. No.{nl}Deliver this letter for me and we can pretend this never happened.
{nl}You'll have to deliver it to Ripper, the guard of Fedimian.{nl}Do not look at what's written in the letter.
I can release the Kartas Hunter from the seal by myself, but{nl}in order to preserve the power of the Crystal, we will need help from my vassals.{nl}
It could be... That they were threatened...{nl}Or they had a mission to complete even though they were being chased?{nl}
Attention! Please read.{nl}Should the purifier be disabled, toxic substances will fill Crystal Mine 3F.{nl}
Please proceed with the following steps as quickly as possible in the event of a purifier failure.{nl}
: Take it and find the unmined magic crystals spread around 3F.{nl}
: Restore in the Purifier.{nl}
- Attention -{nl}After using:
Would you please help me?{nl}The Pantos must have eaten something wrong to be acting like that.{nl}
You saw that baby Panto eat the Plateau Sugar Beet I was carrying, right?{nl}I'm guessing the adult Pantos started acting strange after eating the Sugar Beets that grow here.{nl}
Get rid of all the Sugar Beet stems you see growing at the Spalva Junction.{nl}It's a shame but I'd rather the Pantos starve than eat those things.
I often hear from other watchers that the soil here is being contaminated.{nl}With what, I'm not sure...
If we're going to use a shaman doll, we need more information.{nl}There used to be nothing but Pantos here, but now I see other monsters hanging around.{nl}
Good.{nl}If you find any Spion Archers, Leaflies or Malis at Gele Plateau, can you handle them?{nl}Also, let me know if you find anything new.
We've only recently started to scout this area, so we don't know exactly where they are either.{nl}But the last places we found are the two I talked about earlier.
Hm... I see.{nl}It's not much yet, but we might be able to fix the shaman doll a little.{nl}
I'll let Basil know. {nl}Thanks for helping.
Running from the demons I found some traps around this area that weren't working like they should.{nl}They're supposed to react to demons only, but they reacted to me, too.{nl}
Then some Blue Vubbe Archers saw it and took a few of my traps for themselves.{nl}If you're going over there, would you please collect some of my traps?{nl}
I bought them from a Sapper I met in Klaipeda, and they weren't cheap...{nl}Guess they aren't worth the money.
I built a few dozens of them, so we're still far from collecting them all.{nl}If I get out of here, I need to go to Klaipeda and find that Sapper.
Do you know what's harder than running from Marnox?{nl}Trying to hide among the Varvs at the Felon Prison.{nl}I want you to just get rid of all the Varvs you can find.
If you see any Varvs, just get rid of them.
If I get out of here, I can talk proudly of having faced Marnox.{nl}But the thing with the Varvs is not something I want to talk about over dinner, or ever, to be honest.
{nl}They were so many; there's no way, huh...{nl}Still, thanks for clearing them out a little...
I think I'm going to need to camp out here for a few days, but I'm worried about spending the{nl}night here. Will you get me the blue coal I buried at Goram Shores and Saunu Brook?
I buried it before Medzio Diena, but given my situation I really need to use it...

I bought it from the mine in the northern snowfield thinking I could sell it in Orsha...{nl}However, after Medzio Diena, everyone was busy reconstructing the city and cutting down the tree around it.{nl}
In the end, no one was buying my items.{nl}So I ended up burying it nearby in Koru Jungle.{nl}
I didn't mean to leave it there for so long...{nl}Not sure if it'll still light up, because of the humidity.
I've lost all of my Holy Stones...{nl}I don't know how much longer I'll be able to stay here.{nl}
If you happen to find an Orb Crystal when fighting demons, will you bring it to me?{nl}I can use it to create a makeshift Holy Stone and protect myself.
I'm still in pain from the beating.
It's not much... But it will have to do.{nl}Thank you so much!
You weren't thinking of ditching me and doing everything yourself, were you?{nl}Don't you have to be around here for that, anyways?{nl}
While you're at it, you could clear out some monsters for me, too.
Guess I shouldn't just trust whoever Niels recommends.
Thank you.{nl}If you finish the other job, would you work here with me for a few months?{nl}It's okay if you don't want to, though...
Epigraphist Deltran
Please help me!{nl}There are important records here that I must find.{nl}
But those monsters... If I move they'll come running right away.{nl}Please clear out the ones wandering over there!
I got out of Stele Road without my master knowing.{nl}If I go back empty-handed, I'll be in big trouble.{nl}
I could even be expelled from the Association...
Thank you for helping me.{nl}I wonder where all those monsters came from.{nl}
I know for sure there's something important in here!{nl} But please don't tell the other adventurers I'm here...
With that many monsters, taking anything is almost impossible...
Never have I seen such a dreadful place.{nl}The monsters corrupted by evil energy are interfering with our attempts of purification.{nl}
If you follow the word of the goddess, you know what to do.{nl}Defeat them all!
There's no time to wonder how this happened.{nl}We need to fix it before it's too late.
I will make sure to tell the other believers about your generous help.{nl}Thank you.
Please don't leave me alone here!{nl}If you go, the Lapasape Mages will come and take me!{nl}Please!
I don't want them to take me.{nl}I miss my mother...
Did you really get all of them?{nl}I can still feel them glaring at me from between the trees...
Herbalist Talas
It's useless.{nl}The demons won't let me collect the herbs I need from Badoca Hill.{nl}
Without those herbs I can't make medicine for the refugees.{nl}It would be great if you could help...
There's not much I can do with my legs like this...
Thank you!{nl}I should tend to my legs now.
The village priest asked me to collect some antidote from the Merog Stingers.{nl}I thought the villagers could help but, as you can see... it's hopeless...{nl}
If you see any Merog Stingers, would you collect some antidote samples from them?{nl}
For some time now the people coming to the shrine ruins are being chased away by Merog Stingers.{nl}They even stung and almost killed a few villagers...
Thank you!{nl}We should collect as much as we can until everyone has recovered.
Help!{nl}My spirits were taken away by monsters...{nl}
Please save them!
You need to observe the monsters carefully to find them...
Thank you.{nl}I pray that they rest in peace with the goddess...
I'm sorry... I'm so sorry...
Frail Owl Sculpture
I wish I could do something for the spirits, like you...
The spirits I need to collect are all scattered, in fear of the monsters.{nl}Would you find these frightened spirits and bring them back to me?
I miss the old, peaceful times...
If I wasn't hidden among the trees like this, who knows if the monsters wouldn't have taken me too.{nl}But I will guide the spirits for as long as I can.{nl}Thank you for helping.
Could you please... Help a bit more?{nl}The reason I am being chased by them is because I am getting rid of the defiling aura from the forest.{nl}
I think you'd be able to deal with them more effectively...{nl}Could you help me?
I want to finish them off as soon as possible and return.
Thank you!{nl}We should finish the rest of them off as well.
Historian Grenus
Hey there. Could you help me out?{nl}There are a lot of relics in this area that are important to my research, but I can't gather them on my own.{nl}
So here's my proposition... {nl}Why don't you go to the exploration sites that I've marked and dig the relics up.
I assure you that you will be mentioned in my papers if my research sees the light of day.
Well look at that, a kind traveler helping me more than any of my apprentices.{nl}Your name will be on my research papers when they're finished in a few years.{nl}Thank you!{nl}
Maybe I should look for another line of work before I get any older...{nl}I think I'll do some serious thinking once I finish this research..
What to do..{nl}I was planning on waiting at the gravekeeper's hut until the professor was well, but there are just too many monsters here.
{nl}Could you please deal with some of the monsters in the surrounding area?{nl}I beg of you.
I think I'll be leaving any strange things alone in the future...{nl}I never thought that something like this would happen.
Thank you.{nl}I hope that the professor will get better soon...
Settler Rodonas

I've heard that you've been helping people around here..{nl}I was wondering if you could help me as well?{nl}I have to reclaim some land that Gytis asked me, but I haven't been able to go anywhere near it because of the monsters...{nl}I'd be grateful if you could deal with some of them..
It's so sad that we have to be developing the land around Klaipeda...{nl}I'm worried that some of the monsters will come running towards us since they've lost their habitats.
Thank you!{nl}You've scared a lot of the monsters away..{nl}I think we'll be able to start working in just a bit.
What the settlement area needs is mercenaries to protect us... not more farmers...{nl}I can't see a single mercenary.

I'm sorry, but could you help me out a bit?{nl}I wasn't able to gather more than half of the materials required for my mission.{nl}Could you please deal with the monsters and get the dirty pouches that they are carrying?{nl}I'd really appreciate it...
I'm pretty sure that anyone asking for these are mages or alchemists...{nl}I'd like to tell them to try gathering this stuff themselves...
Thank you so much!{nl}I'll be able to make it back much more quickly thanks to you.{nl}Even if this is only the beginning...

Clear the Royal Mausoleum of the Guardians that overlook sinister presences and are trying to destroy the defense systems.{nl}That is the only way that you will be able to safely achieve your goals here.
The defense system is being destroyed.
The Guardians are being defiled at an increased rate.{nl}This has only delayed the destruction of the Royal Mausoleum.
You must retrieve the essence from the Tainted Guardians.{nl}You will be able to interrupt the destruction of the Royal Mausoleum by doing so.
Deal with all of the Tainted Guardians.{nl}That is the fate of the Royal Mausoleum Guardians.
Laterous

The people are scared because of all sorts of strange rumors...{nl}I need to find some people to raise a farm but people refuse to venture out because of the rumors and monsters.{nl}I'm getting more anxious by the day.{nl}You seem like a strong adventurer, so could you please deal with some of the monsters nearby?{nl}I'm sure that dealing with the monsters will help out with the rumors as well.
I am not leaving here no matter what anyone says..{nl}I've come here after ignoring all my family and friends that told be that this was a bad idea, you see.
Thank you so much!{nl}I'm sure that many people will be more eager since the monsters are gone.{nl}We'll be able to get a foothold now!
I thought that this was supposed to be a pleasant place to live instead of being infested with monsters...{nl}I still won't give up though...
Wandering Believer's Soul
One of the living all the way over here... The goddess must have sent you...{nl}Please help me... Strange figures and monsters are taking the spirits away...
I'll be taken away as well if something isn't done about it...{nl}Please! Could you deal with some of the monsters in the area?
I don't remember anything from when I was alive...{nl}Why did I even die?
Thank you...{nl}With them gone, I can now leave whenever I wish.
Why am I here... and why are they trying to catch me?
Pilgrim Seronia
I'm relieved to meet a person here.{nl}Could you deal with some of the monsters in the surrounding area?{nl}They're more than a match for me on my own..{nl}I'd greatly appreciate your help.

I don't know how I got all the way over here...{nl}I got separated from the people I came with since we were chased by monsters...{nl}I have no idea where any of them might be...{nl}I hope they are alright...
Thank you so much..{nl}I think I'll start moving once the monsters have thinned out a bit more.
This way leads to the cursed city...{nl}Where did we start going wrong?
Follower Nedluss

I've decided to stay here and help out as repentance to my wrongs against Melchioras.{nl}I've just found several suspicious spell devices on the Garden Watchtower.{nl}However, they're a bit too much for me to deal by myself.{nl}So I was thinking... could you destroy them for me?
I shudder to think of how many of those monsterous devices are still hidden...
Well done.{nl}I'm sure that there will be a few more to destroy if we comb the area but...{nl}I think we can call it a day.
I hope Melchioras gets well soon...

We'll need to know about the demons well in order to drive them out of this area.{nl}Defeat the demons and bring back their condensed magic.{nl}Melchioras may be able to do some research in order to find a fatal weakness.
I'm sure that they'll be easier to handle if we know their weaknesses...
I think that this will be enough to find a weakness or two.{nl}Thank you!

I am thinking of setting up traps around the Delmore Outskirts but...{nl}I wasn't able to do anything due to the Pag Emitters coming from all over.{nl}Could you deal with some of them if they come near?{nl}I'm sure that setting up any traps will be much easier if you help.
I'll be discussing where the best places would be to set up the traps with my colleagues here.
That's a lot of monsters!{nl}Now all that is left is to set up the traps without them noticing.
I'd like to stay and help Melchioras.{nl}I'm sure you feel the same, correct?

{nl}We should hand out the Maroulu Herbs that we found while searching the area to the people.{nl}Please look for some more from the Fortress Walls since we need much more.{nl}I'm sure we'll be able to help people recover.
An herb that helps people become enthusiastic...{nl}Isn't it incredible?
I think that this will be enough for one person.{nl}Thank you.
I've been put between a rock and a hard place thanks to you dealing with the Manticen..{nl}So you have to help me out.{nl}Get rid of the monsters around here since they're hindering my work.
I'll make sure to raise one of those that survive the clean-up to avoid getting defeated by other adventurers..
That was quite a sight... I get why the Manticen was defeated.{nl}Thanks for your help.
Farmer Deluma
The world has become a harsh place after Medzio Diena.{nl}There are more thefts of farming equipment...{nl}Monsters also break them often.{nl}That's why I've hidden them in the grass.
I have to retrieve the equipment now that it's time to start working again but..{nl}Could you by any chance help me out and get the equipment for me?
We used to be free from the fear of monsters and were able to trust people..{nl}The world has become so harsh.
We need a bit more for there to be enough for all the people but...{nl}Thank you for helping out!
I hope the people that agreed to help arrive soon...

I've been preparing for this experiment for a long time, but have no idea where it could have gone wrong...{nl}Maybe I didn't have enough ingredients...{nl}Please help me a bit more with my experiment.
I've hid my bag full of ingredients near Dumbliu Pond.{nl}You can gather insects or small animals with that bag.{nl}How about we use that? Please get me some more test subjects!
I'll go and prepare for the next experiment.{nl}It may take a while...
Thank you!{nl}I can restart the experiments sooner if I have more test subjects.
Lumberjack Luoval

I suppose you're a cut above the average since you've made it all the way here.{nl}I have to get some lumber from the Neryshkus Sanctum Ruins but there are so many monsters..{nl}I don't know if I'll even be able to make it back home...
Could you be bothered to deal with some of the monsters if you go by Neryshkus Sanctum Ruins?{nl}Of course I won't blame you if you're too busy..
Monsters have been showing up over here ever since all of the mercenaries and soldiers went off to Fedimian.
Thank you for helping out.{nl}There just seems to be no end of them...

Fedimian is one of the major stopping points for the traders heading inland.{nl}There will be many traders coming through here once this is all settled.{nl}That's why I want to create a trading post at Leipsna Chapel Site.{nl}I'd appreciate it if you'd clear the place up a bit from the monsters...

What if that never happens?{nl}The whole world will become infested with demons if Fedimian falls anyway..{nl}Do you think anyone will be able to trade?{nl}The only alternative to success is for mankind to fail so I am investing and hoping for the best...
It seems like you've done quite a job even if it's only a small step towards clearing it all up..{nl}Thank you!
Priest Rovli
They're all afraid of the ferrets...{nl}I'll defend this place by myself if I have to.
Believer Dreka
We'll start surveying this region in earnest once Goddess Lada recovers..{nl}Of course that is a long way off...

The villagers and other priests believe that the ferrets can be converted.{nl}It's all useless! What use is converting the ferrets after the shrine and village are destroyed.{nl}Please help me.{nl}Teach the ferrets a lesson by dealing with them to show that they can't come here!
I'm begging passing adventurers since I'm a priest but..{nl}I don't know how it came to this...
Do you think that they've learned their lesson?{nl}Thank you so much for helping.

I wish to present Godess Lada with Ceyral Saplings that are filled with the energy of life.{nl}That's why we've come all this way...{nl}But there are simply too many monsters in there for me to go anywhere near.{nl}Could you please go get some Ceyral Saplings for me?
I've gone through so much to get here..{nl}I should have brought my brother along...
I haven't been able to smell Ceyral for such a long time.{nl}Thank you so much for gathering this much!{nl}However, I do think that we need a bit more.

If you've come here to deal with the monsters, how about going over there first?{nl}You see... A few of my colleagues aren't able to get here because of the monsters.{nl}Could you possibly deal with some of the monsters?
How am I supposed to get to Orsha with these cowards?
Thank you!{nl}I don't know what's keeping them from coming though...

We need to retrieve as much as the management wants but...{nl}We've still got a lot of time left until the newcomers arrive.{nl}How about finding me some Manaryll Tombstones from Augalu Garden if you've got the time?{nl}You can just pick them up anywhere but I don't have the people to do it.
I have to wait here for my group leader's orders.{nl}I'd really appreciate the help.
Wow, that's a lot!{nl}I do think that we'll need a bit more, but this should be enough to fill a page in my ledger.
Yes? What is it?{nl}
Ahh, of course I know Zenoa.{nl}You're talking about that cute Dievdirbys right?{nl}
I'm sorry, but...{nl}I don't have any chisels prepared, and I'm fresh out of materials to make new ones.
We've gathered here to stop Delmore Rephaim, the lord of Delmore Castle.{nl}All because he's trying to create another Kruvina.{nl}
I should have stopped its creation... But I was a coward back then.{nl}Delmore Rephaim is trying to build that Kruvina once more.{nl}
I'm sorry, but could you collect some Charog sap?{nl}I want to make a monster repellant.
That was a really tough enchantment.{nl}I wonder how Yane did in Tagika Crossroads...
Thank you... so much.{nl}It should be impossible to create another Kruvina now.{nl}
Are you the Revelator Leja talked about?{nl}And that's... our food that got stolen.{nl}
Thank you for taking back our food but...{nl}I don't think I can trust you just yet.{nl}
Please understand.{nl}We were tricked by the demons once before, you see.
Leja said she had somewhere else to be and left.{nl}I can't tell you where she is going, though.{nl}
Like I said earlier, we can't trust you just yet.{nl}
We once had someone come to our village calling himself a Revelator.{nl}He was a man with a pale face and long hair.{nl}
We thought our Revelator had finally arrived and did as the man said.{nl}Truth is, in reality... he was a demon.{nl}
We believed the demon and because of that Goddess Lada was taken away...{nl}Even the ferrets turned violent.{nl}
We think it was because of the totem the demon made us set up.{nl}We all want to join forces and rescue Goddess Lada, but we're worried about the ferret attacks.{nl}
There is a totem that we don't even dare get close to because of its evil energy.{nl}If you really are a Revelator, then you should be able to destroy it with your divine power.{nl}
Show us.{nl}If you really are a Revelator, that is...
Please understand.{nl}I know Leja is glad the Revelator is finally here but...{nl}
We've been fooled before, we can't help but be suspicious.
You... you're a true Revelator, there's no doubt about it.{nl}I feel so sorry for how I treated you earlier... Please forgive this old man.{nl}
Leja went to Zeraha to try and find something to help you.{nl}She said Goddess Laima will have left something prepared for the Revelator.{nl}
There is a big statue of Goddess Laima there. {nl}It was sculpted a long time ago when She was still at our village.{nl}
Oh... that girl came.{nl}Can I tell you about what happened in our village?{nl}
Our village has always worshiped Goddess Laima.{nl}One day, she had a vision of a calamity that would strike the kingdom in a future far away.{nl}
So, to stop this calamity, She decided to leave the village.{nl}Maybe She was worried about leaving us behind, so she had Goddess Lada look after us instead.{nl}
But unlike what Goddess Laima predicted, our village remained peaceful.{nl}
Then, unexpectedly, Medzio Diena happened.{nl}It was the calamity in Goddess Laima's vision.{nl}
Medzio Diena didn't cause much damage here, but that was only the beginning.{nl}You see, not long ago our river turned red.{nl}
The river water caused terrible pain to everyone who drank it, and it made the fruit grow to an abnormal size.{nl}The fruit, just like the red water, was inedible.{nl}
As if that weren't enough, the demons then came and took Goddess Lada.{nl}Just as Laima predicted... chaos took over the village.{nl}
Leja probably told you... what Goddess Laima said to us.{nl}She said a Revelator would dream of the calamity and come with the light to chase away evil.
We aren't sure what She meant by the light, but...{nl}Our elders used to say that a warm energy filled the village when Goddess Laima was here.{nl}
It was all very quick.{nl}The moment that girl came to me, I felt the same warm energy our elders talked about.{nl}
The girl looked me straight in the eyes and, without a word, she nodded.{nl}Then she disappeared towards Zeraha.{nl}
Hurry and follow the light.{nl}This can only be a sign sent by Goddess Laima to guide you in the right direction.{nl}
Please, for Goddess Lada... and our village.
That warm energy...{nl}Until the day I return to the goddess I will never be able to forget it.{nl}
Go now.{nl}Follow the light and you will see the girl once again.{nl}
The totem is at the Banaga Forest Trail.
If you really are a Revelator that came here with the light to save our town...{nl}Then you should be able to take back the ferrets' hideout.{nl}
If you can prove that you are in fact a Revelator, I will tell you where to find Leja.
Here's the scent.{nl}Let's see now... About the ferrets...{nl}
Help...? It's not something I haven't thought about.{nl}The city closest to here is Fedimian.{nl}
I heard Fedimian was devastated after Medzio Diena, though.{nl}Even after four years, it's still being reconstructed.{nl}
And Goddess Lada, She said that no matter what happens to Her...{nl}She would never make Her presence known to anyone but the Revelators.{nl}
As you know...{nl}People now think that the goddesses have all disappeared.{nl}
But if they find out that the goddesses are still around...{nl}You can imagine what a shock that would be.{nl}
That's why only you, a Revelator, can save Goddess Lada.{nl}The goddess said so Herself, too...
Your face doesn't look familiar...{nl}Please don't cause a commotion and just move along.
I'm sorry I doubted you.{nl}It's just that our town has been hurt by fake Revelators before...{nl}
Goddess Lada being taken by the demons...{nl}None of that would have happened if we hadn't believed the fake Revelators.{nl}
And with our water turning red we felt more and more powerless...{nl}We should have realized our mistake and gone to the real Revelators, but...{nl}I'm so sorry.
What are you still doing here?{nl}You're going to miss the girl. Hurry and go after her.
Thank you. I'm so grateful to you and to Goddess Lada for having sent you.{nl}You are a blessing to our village.
I don't know what the demons did to those ferrets but...{nl}Seeing how they attack, avoiding a fight must be impossible, right?
The disc suddenly started glowing red so I followed it all the way here.{nl}I was chased away by monsters, but I clearly saw that it was pointing to something.{nl}
I have no idea about the rest.{nl}Any guesses?
So that beast has a gem stuck on it now, huh?{nl}I'd say you'd have to get the beast out and kill it to get rid of the gem...{nl}
That red water is no one's business but our village's.{nl}Outsiders would do well to leave us alone.
I'm sorry I was rude to you earlier...{nl}Please forgive this old man's insolence.
May the Revelator who dreamt of chaos defeat the evil forces and bring light back into our world...{nl}If the legends are true, this red water will soon be no more.
A dagger... The owner of the dagger...{nl}I don't think that fits anyone I know...{nl}
I suppose we will have to go to the Masters for advice.{nl}Where did they get such a dagger and why did they do this...
You've remembered something?{nl}How could you have not remembered something so important... Well, spit it out.{nl}
Gytis Settlement...{nl}I think I do remember hearing something about someone doing strange things over there.{nl}
Here you go, I'll give you the dagger so you can find who the culprit is behind this.{nl}It'll help a great deal if you find who did this.
Are you curious about the dagger again?{nl}I'm not exactly an expert in that field but... Well, whatever. Give it here.{nl}
What is this...{nl}You've just come back to find me right?{nl}
Yes, this is Ebonypawn's dagger.{nl}I don't know too much about evil energies, but it shows all of his habits.{nl}
Followed a mysterious girl from Grynas Training Camp...{nl}Yes. I do seem to remember something.{nl}
Please let me know if anything like this happens again.{nl}I'll give you as much information as I can manage. Thank you.{nl}
I've received nothing but help from you.{nl}I sincerely hope that you'll catch who ever did this...
Ebonypawn... I've never heard that name before.{nl}You said something about the Ranger Master?{nl}
I think I'll have to go visit sometime with something nice.{nl}Anyhow, thank you for the hard work. Farewell!
I am collecting the ocean's energy here to create an altar for the goddess.{nl}But the monsters... are causing me trouble.{nl}
Brother Daroul is fighting the monsters off but...{nl}They're just coming in endless waves.{nl}
Would you really do that for me?{nl}I can't express my gratitude enough..{nl}
I happen to have a good idea.{nl}I have something that might be usable as bait for the monsters.{nl}
If you bury the powder in this bag, it'll spread its scent to the surrounding area in a cloud of green smoke.{nl}Then the monsters will gather towards you.{nl}
I'd appreciate it if you could deal with the monsters near the Old Bridge and Kranta Skerries!
I can't offord to lose a chance like this.{nl}Monsters are petty distractions.
Oh no...{nl}I've managed to finish the altar thanks to your help, but a Crabil has appeared!
We've just run away from the Crabil ourselves.{nl}I'm sure that it is attracted by the ocean's energy.{nl}
I can't even go anywhere near the altar, let alone preform the ceremony because of the monster.{nl}It also seems to be getting stronger by the minute thanks to the ocean's energy.{nl}
We'll do our best to stop the altar...{nl}Could you possibly get rid of the Crabil?
I'll stop the altar if you can buy me some time.{nl}Here goes nothing!
Are you alright?{nl}I don't know how I can thank you enough...
My goodness..{nl}The Crabil has ruined all of the offerings that were meant for the goddess.{nl}
We won't be able to offer any of this to the goddess..{nl}This is quite troubling..{nl}
Ah well, I suppose it can't be helped.{nl}Could I possibly ask you to order some coral handicrafts while we repair the altar?
There are some precious corals growing near the Kranta Skerries.{nl}Please provide Joana, the Accessory Merchant of Fedimian with the blue coral for the goods.{nl}
I would normally craft them myself but the situation is less than optimal as you may see...{nl}I know it's a long way to go but I beg of you...
Hello!{nl}Please feel free to take your time!{nl}
Hmm? You've come here to request some coral accessories?{nl}Oh... It's been a long time since I've seen any coral.{nl}
The quality seems to be impecable as well.{nl}All right. I'll do it.
I would normally craft them myself but the situation is less than optimal as you may see...{nl}I know it's a long way to Fedimian, but I beg of you.
However, I also have a request since this is a hard task.{nl}I would prefer to receive some Gapcrab Shell as compensation.{nl}
Of course, I won't receive any that are cracked or dented.{nl}Do you agree to the conditions?
Well then, off you go.{nl}I'll start working assuming that you'll bring me some quality materials.
Gapcrab Shell from the Kranta Skerries.{nl}I won't accept them if they've been damaged too much.
Did you bring the Shell?{nl}
The Shell seems to be in good condition.{nl}I haven't seen such quality Shell for a while now...{nl}
I'll be able to use these to craft great accessories.{nl}Here you go, the coral accessories that you've requested.
Finally... The goddesses have listened to our prayers!{nl}They have been silent for so long..{nl}
This is all thanks to you.{nl}We would have taken so much longer without your help.{nl}
This is only the beginning.{nl}We must gather our strength and prepare for further hardships.{nl}
Thank you so much... for all the help!
Those useless monsters have destroyed the coral that was Goddess Jurate's blessing.{nl}I'd like to make them pay, but I must protect the altar... There is no way that the two of us can...
Please. The monsters found at the Kranta Skerries.{nl}Show them that they can't destroy the coral without getting punished.
Thank you so much.{nl}I'm thinking of tidying the place up once the altar becomes safe.
Hmm... Come to think of it... {nl}It's no use if the monsters come back after they've been driven off.{nl}
So I think that it may be better to just scare them..{nl}Could you possibly be asked to help us once more?{nl}
Please gather the monster's energy after dealing with them.{nl}They won't bother us again if we put it near the Cranto Coast.{nl}
Thank you once again for agreeing to help us.
Remember, monsters from other regions don't count.{nl}Please fill it with the energy from monsters from this region.
You've already filled it with energy?{nl}It would have taken me ages... Well, I won't deny that you've got talent.{nl}
I'll go and bury the talisman since this will only take a moment.{nl}Thank you for helping.
{nl}May the blessings of Goddess Jurate be upon you...
Thank you for helping us get back in touch with Goddess Jurate again.{nl}This was all possible thanks to your help...{nl}
We're thinking of taking care of the altar for a while.{nl}So we want to gather some of the ocean's energy in advance... Could you help us do so?
Go to Sniega Sentry and collect some special stones.{nl}You'll be able to spot which ones are special by spraying them with this divine water and collecting the ones that glow blue.
The stones that glow blue when sprayed by divine water.{nl}I just need those particular stones.
You've returned. Thank you so much.{nl}Let me take a look at the stones.
They all seem to be pristine.{nl}All we have to do is to place these stones where the ocean's energy is the strongest!
Ah, will you do that?{nl}It's near Polybba Marshlands and Sahguma Lagoon.{nl}
If you take a look at where the water is flowing..{nl}You'll easily spot where the ocean's energy gathers.
We'll be fine as long as there is enough energy from the oceans.{nl}I'm sure Goddess Jurate will be pleased as well.{nl}
I think we can finally relax a bit.{nl}The altar will be filled with the ocean's energy about the time when it stabilizes.{nl}
We are in your debt.{nl}I will pray for Goddess Jurate to bless your journey.
Come back anytime if you have any more clues about Ebonypawn.{nl}I will provide you with as much information as I can. Thanks.{nl}
I'll gather the Red Kepa peels.
For Safety
Monsters From the Settlement Clearing
Too Much For One Person
Vanished Glory
I don't think that's needed,
Nice Place to Live
That doesn't sound right.
Protect the Royal Masoleum
Hidden Magic Devices
That doesn't really matter.
Efforts Towards Redemption
Lost Pilgrim
Stay here and rest for a while.
Dangerous Distraction
Good Day to Recover
For What
Hidden Farming Equipment
Can-do Spirit
Habitat
Thinking Ahead
Violent Rampage
Hoping the Goddess Will Recover
Stuffy Colleagues
I can help you a little.
Find the Hidden Artifacts
Observing the Owl (1)
That's going to be difficult, sorry.
Talking about what you heard.
Memories of the Sleeping Owl
I'll hand you the sculpture.
Goddess Jurate's Loremaster (1)
Raising an Altar(1)
I don't think I can help you, sorry.
Raising an Altar (2)
I'll go and help you a bit more.
Raising an Altar (3)
I'll lead them so they won't be able to approach.
That sounds way too dangerous.
Retaking the Altar
I'll get rid of that Crabil.
I need some time to prepare.
Better Offerings
I'm sorry, I don't think I can help you any longer.
What Interests You These Days
Okay, let's do that.
That's too difficult for me.
Ceremony for the Goddess
Winning Favors (1)
I'll drive the monsters away from Kranta Skerries.
I'll do it, but I'm gonna rest for a while first.
Winning Favors (2)
I'll fill the talisman with the energy from monsters.
I have to go do something else, sorry.
Preparing for the Future (1)
I'll think about it.
Preparing for the Future (2)
I'll do it; I'll place the stones.
Sorry, I need to get going now.
Dagger's Owner
I remember experiencing something similar.
I'm curious about it as well.
The Operations Officer seems to have realized something about the Vubbe Cloth. Talk to him again.
The Hunter Master told you that he will acknowledge you as a Hunter if you help him find the books. Search for the books at Vubbe Outpost as the Hunter Master told you.

The Hunter Master says that the Quarel Shooter Master may be interested in trading the book for tough Glizardon leather. Go to Tenet Church B1 next to Gele Plateau by passing Srautas Gorge that is beyond the Miners' Village. Bring back the Glizardon leather from there.
